53a5(rgyud): 'gyur te// dgra bo gal te lag na ni// mtshon cha phyar te thog/ sa pa yang // ji srid khu tshur ma dkrol bar// mtshan cha gtong bar mi nus so// yi ge bdun dang rnal 'byor ma/ 
53a6(rgyud): drug gi yi ge 'di dag ni// 'khor lo drug la gnas par ni// lag pa'i dbus su dkod nas su// cho ga rig pas bcang bar bya// kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos// de yi gzugs gyur bzung
53a7(rgyud): nas ni// de ni 'gug 'gyur the tsom med// tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni// lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin te// bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes rdul dang ni// gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya// lan brgyar bzlas te rab
53a8(rgyud): bsgoms na// sa dag skye bo'i nor dang ni// bcas te dbang du 'gyur ba 'am// de ni 'gug 'gyur the tsom mong // sbyor ba 'di na 'grub pa ste// gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra// rdul de nyid ni bzung nas su/ 
53b1(rgyud): lcags phyed dang ni bsre bar bya// dur khrod ras la btums nas su// lan bdun ni bzlas par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdor sor brgyad tsam// brkos te dgra yi ming nas ni// bzung nas sa yi
53b2(rgyud): dgab par bya// gang gi ming bzung de bcings 'gyur// phye ma de nyid bzung nas su// 'o ma yis ni 'bad de bkru// slar yang 'gro la 'gyur the tsom med// phye ma de nyid bzung nas su// smyo byed lnga dang ldan
53b3(rgyud): par bya// ro yaM gos las bsgrub bya yi// ming bris nas ni gtum par bya// lan brgya bzlas te dur khrod du// sbas na skyes bu 'phral du ni// spro 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// phyung nas pa yi 'o ma yis// 
53b4(rgyud): 'bad de slar yang bkrus na ni// 'gro la 'gyur 'di ni the tsom med// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ 
53b5(rgyud): rdo rje dpa' bo'i 'khor lo gsungs/ zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ni/  gsum de bzhin kha drug pa// slar yang zla bar pad+ma ni// mang ba drug legs par gnas pa bri// de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni/ 
53b6(rgyud): 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// sngags pas lci bar bri bar bya/ bsgrub bya'i ming ni spel bar bya// rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams ni// thams cad sna tshogs bla na med// sangs rgyas kun gyi ga cha che// mdzes
53b7(rgyud): ma'i gdong can khyed la bshad / dbus su snga ma'i gsang sngags bri/ pi ng+ge'i mdab mar de bzhin gzhan// ri bo drug ni yongs spangs pa// rdo rje sa ni lte bar bri// gur gum sen rtsi rang khrag dang // ro tsan yis/ 
53b8(rgyud): grog la// chog bzhin du bris nas ni// dus gsum du ni bzlas byas la// mchod chen byas nas gzung ba bya// lan bdun du ni mngon 'azlas te// gos kyi ba mar btsang bar bya// lam du 'gron rkun po
54a1(rgyud): dang // stag sogs 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad du ni srung 'gyur ba// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// lte ba der ni thig le yis// bskor ba'i thig le dag kyang bya// a ri/ 
54a2(rgyud): tsataka bcud dang // lung bdag gis khyad par du// a she ka'i myug gu yis// dpa' bo yis ni ras mar bri// bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba yi// sngags 'di stong du de nas bzla// bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa
54a3(rgyud): dang ni// glang po che yis rkang rjes rdul// dur khrod thal bar bcas pa las// sgrub pos gzugs brnyan byas nas su// bcing bas bcings te de yi ni// snying kha ru ni gzhug par bya// me tog ser pos
54a4(rgyud): mchod nas ni// gsang ba'i gnas su sbas gyur na// dgra rnam das thams cad 'ching 'gyur zhing // brlag pa byed pa mi bza dad par// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan
54a5(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis gsungs// mkha'agro ma'i snying po'i sngags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// na mkha'i dpying sa gyur sa bon ni// kun tu 'od zer rab 'phro ba// ston ka'i
54a6(rgyud): zla ltar dri med pa'i// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis bya// rtsibs de rnams la sa bon gyi// yi ge mchog tu phan pa dgod// de yi lte bar dgod bya ba// rig pa chen mo'i yi ge che// srung ba rdo rje'i
54a7(rgyud): cho ga rigs// mkha 'gro ma kun cho ga bya// sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yi// dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming bri ba// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ru// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// gur gum dang ni
54a8(rgyud): re canas// gro ga 'am ni ras dgapa la// snying stobs can gyis bri bar bya/ las kyi cho ga mthing ba yis// thams cad du ni srung ba dang // sgrub pa po yis sngar bstan bzhin// bdug po rnams ni char
54b1(rgyud): gcod byed// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// las mchog de nas bshad par bya// gang zhing bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang byed pa'o// skye gnyis rdo rje'i rigs dang ni// gzugs/ 
54b2(rgyud): bzang bu mo gzhan yang rung // ka ra ba ra'i me tog dmar// rgyal gyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// go ro tsa nas bsgrub nas su// me tog der ni chur gnas la// sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// lan brgya
54b3(rgyud): ru ni bzlas par bya// chu bo chen por zhugs nas su// lte ba man chad chur bcug ste// lag pa thal sbyar dbus bzung nas// rig pa stong du bzlas par bya// snyim pa chu yis bkang ba dang // bcas pas
54b4(rgyud): sgrub pos btung bar bya// de nas de ni 'grub 'gyur te// sgrub pos/ ngag ni grub pa yis// rgyal po chung mar bcas pa dag/ yid kyis 'gugs 'gyur gdon mi za// ka ra bi ri'i me tog
54b5(rgyud): ni/ dmar po yang dag bzung nas ni// rig pa lan bdun bzlas byas la// skye gnas dbus su gzhug bya ste// me tog de ni kha sbyar nas// gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag par bya// 
54b6(rgyud): gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas// brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya// sgrub po rtse gcig yid kyis ni// me tog de ni blangs nas su// me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa// de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur// 
54b7(rgyud): brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang // yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste// mngon gyur sems ni ldog pa ru// skad cig gis ni dbang byed 'gyur// 'di ni mngon sum grub pa yi// don yod dbang du
54b8(rgyud): byed pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o// gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis su// rdo rje sems dpa'ang brlag
55a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // dngos grub myur du ster 'gyur ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ste// de bzhin gzhan yang pad+ma'o// kun nas rnam par 'phro ba yi// mkha' 'gro ma/ 
55a2(rgyud): yi sa bon dgod// dbus su rdo rje phag mo ni// shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs// yi ge'i dgod pas dgod par bya// rim pa de ltar brjod pa la// zhi la zhi ba'i yid kyis su// ro tsa na yis gro gar
55a3(rgyud): bri/ ma me'i gnas dang dur khrod du// gos chen de bzhin khro dang bcas// chags pa la ni dmar po'i gos// rgyas la gos ser de bzhin te// de dang der ni sgom byas nas// ci rigs par ni sprul par bya// 
55a4(rgyud): bu mo gzhon nu'i ro yi ni// gos ni 'bad de blangs nas su// tshe sa brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// de nyid las byung sol da pa yis// sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi la// sngags dang spel bar
55a5(rgyud): bris nas ni// lan bdun du ni bzlas nas su// gang gi khyim du sbas gyur pa// de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du// nyi ma bdun gyis 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi rkang pa'i sbubs dang // bum
55a6(rgyud): pa la sogs dag kyang rung // rus pa'i phur bu'i sbu gur ni// 'khrul 'khor 'di ni bcug bya ste// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za// las rnams kun la sgrub pa pos// cho ga
55a7(rgyud): dang ni ldan par bya// rang gis gzung ba'i sngags kyis ni// bskal pa bye ba brgyas mi 'grub// las 'di mchog tu shes bya ste// sngags gzhan rgyas pas ci zhig pa de dag thams cad spangs na su// 'di ni
55a8(rgyud): 'bad de 'azung bar bya// gang dang gang gi bsam gtan gyis// sgrub pos bzlas pa brnams par bya// sbyor ba de dang de dag gis// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// ji ltar nor bu dag pa
55b1(rgyud): ni// rdzas gang la rten de gzugs 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje mkha 'gro yang // yang dag bsam gtan mchog 'dzin 'gyur// bsam pa gang dang gis ni// mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor// de dang de yi
55b2(rgyud): dngos 'gyur te// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// de nyid bsdus dang 'dus pa ste// gzhan yang sngon dang tha ma yi// de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga can// bya ba'i rgyud rnams thams cad du// ji srid me
55b3(rgyud): yis 'jig gi bar// de der 'gro ba ston rmongs 'gyur// thams cad du ni spangs pa ste// brtson 'grus pha rol 'joms pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam ldan pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che// 
55b4(rgyud): myur du dngos grub skye 'gyur ba// 'phral du yang dag yid ches byed// sgrub pos phyag rgya'i sbyar ba yis// snyon mi rmongs par 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig mi ldan mi dag la// klog
55b5(rgyud): gam gal te byin gyur na// dam pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas/ ni// ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar 'gyur// g.yon gyi/ rgyud ni dmigs nas su// skye bo g.yon gyi spyod pa bya// thams
55b6(rgyud): cad g.yon pas byas na ni// myur du dngos grub 'grub 'gyur zhes// sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// rdo rje mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can
55b7(rgyud): gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las// dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas
55b8(rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba// snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// sgrub po'i bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i mchog/ ga bur dang ni gur gum dang // g+han d+ha gan d+ha pa ta ste// 
56a1(rgyud): / shing cha dang ni sug smel bcas// ku sum dang ni de bzhin chu// pi si ta dang kun du ru// de bzhin ri yi zhag dang ni// ri skyes dang ni sbu gu'i zhag/ dri yi mar khu so dang ni// de bzhin lag skyes/ 
56a2(rgyud): kyi ni rdul// gangs kyi chu dang snying po dang // rgya mtsho las skyes de dag ni// lus can rnam la phan byed pa// gang gang la ni gangs chu bzhin// de ltar bco brgyad rdzas rnams ni// bcud kyis len mchog
56a3(rgyud): phan byed yon// de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni// yon+tan yan lag cho ga bshad// tsam pa ka dang ba ku la// na ga ge sa ra ku mu da// ut+pal she phA li ka dang // sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang pri yang ku// ku su ma ni
56a4(rgyud): nyid dag go// shrI pha la dang po so 'cha'// ka pi ta dang la ku tsha/ slu ba dang ni brta ki/ a ru ra dang ba ru ra// ba la ta ka sgra ru ra// e la tsi dang pu na ka/ a ran da dang mar ci// de bzhin du
56a5(rgyud): ni pi bi ling // bca' ba dang ni shu dag dang // yung ba dang ni ru dang // bca' sgra dang ni sgo sgra dang // rlan can gyi ni do d-i// nA ga pa la dkar po dang // de bzhin rgan po gzhon nur byed/ 
56a6(rgyud): glang chen dgra dang ri mdzes dang // 'dzag dang byis pa stug po dang // ral pa dmar po smre byed dang // mtshan mo'i shing dang myur 'gro dang // kA tam pa dang gser shing ste// de bzhin du ni shi ri sha/ ka rany+dza dang
56a7(rgyud): shri khru dang // nim pa dang ni pi la si// de bzhin ga du ma dza ri// pa la sha dang tsan+dan gnyis// de bzhin a gar nag po dang // gur gum gur shing bye ra ka/ sbrang rtsi mok+Sha pus ka ra// me tog 'bras bu rtsa
56a8(rgyud): ba dang // shun pa shong dang ro nyid do// khu byug zangs kyi gtsug pud can// bya rog dang ni gar ra dang // rma bya ti bya phug ron dang // drang srong bu stobs 'phel bar byed// ra dang ri bong ri dgas dang / 
56b1(rgyud): sa li ga dang phag dang ni// khyad par du ni byi ba rnams// nang rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// me tog 'bras bu shun pa'i chang // de bzhin du ni 'bru yi chang // gzhan yang chang gi bye brag dag/ 
56b2(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i mchog/ 'od dag skyes pa bud med kyi// stobs rnams bskyed pa'i sman yin te// bza' dang btung dang gzhib pa dang // bldag pa dang ni mur ba dang // sna sman mge bor bsku
56b3(rgyud): dang // bkru ba dang ni dril phyis dang // bza' dang btang sogs de dag ni// rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog/ de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// rdzas dang bco brgyad dag tu sbyar// sbom po phra me'i sbyor ba rnams
56b4(rgyud): skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang // chung ngu la sogs dbye ba ste// rlung dang ma khris pa bad kon sogs// re re zhing yang gsum du 'dod// nag po dkar po sngo bsangs te// 'dzag dang de bzhin
56b5(rgyud): 'pho ba la'o// dgra dang mdza' bshes par ma ste// khams kyi sgra tshan bsdus pa yin// dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa// 'bras bu chen po skal ba gsum// lhang tsher dang ni dngul chu
56b6(rgyud): bzhin/ bdud rtsi yi ni snying po lnga// dus drug de bzhin drug cu ste// bdun po yal ga mdab sogs bcas// skam sa dang ni rlan can yul// mar dang mar nag bkru sman ni// rno dang dngul chu'i zas su sbyin// 
56b7(rgyud): rang skyur dang ni yung ba dag/ cha mnyam dngul chu'i 'bras bu ste// nyi ma'i 'od zer bsros nas ni// sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs pa glugs// thal sman lan tshwas bu gar sgrub// ro ni ska ba rnams dang yang / 
56b8(rgyud): lhang tshor dkar po'i skyo ma sbyin// dngos chu drug char bya ba mchog/ skyed byed don ni rga ba 'joms// cha ni tshad ldan 'ching byed de// 'bras bus bya ba byed par 'gyur// sngon du gser shog brub pa
57a1(rgyud): yis la rang skyon 'joms pa'i cho ga yin// de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang // thal ba'am rdul ni glugs par bya// dron mo blugs na skra dkar skye// glang chen mgo yi bcud blangs
57a2(rgyud): la// seng ge'i tshad du btso bar bya// de nas slar ni phyung nas su// arga'i shing gi khu ba glugs// tshes pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms// tsan+d+ra dang ni ra sa na// sgrog skra dang ni ker sa dang // a tra pa ti'i
57a3(rgyud): rus pa dang // de bzhin du ni me tog gzung // bya gri dang ni kun du ru// sa ri ba dang sen mo dang // nor bu zla 'od na ge sar// thigs pa'i rgyun dang ka te ma pa// tsa pa ki ri so pa dang // shi shu bil ba ud pa
57a4(rgyud): la/ rang skyur dang ni bcas pa ru// 'dzag dang dngul chu kha tshe/ sa bya// phyung na sbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur// khrag dang / dasmyo byed mtshan shing glugs// skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa 'joms
57a5(rgyud): rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed// rnon po thal sman bcas pa yin// bkrus shing bskus na gzhang 'brum 'joms// lte skyes ma snyings rdzas kyi las// bcud dang bcud len mar zhag
57a6(rgyud): bsngags// shi ri sha yi rtsas kyang gzag/ mgor gnas la skyes ldan par bya// mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gso// gsol te 'khrul na 'bras bu'i lam// tshad las 'das na dug tu 'gyur// de nas
57a7(rgyud): lpags pa shun pa dang // me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs// kha dang skra dang mngar ba dang // tshwa dang skyur po la sogs pas// khyad par du ni btso bya ba// kha med rdzar ni btso bar bya// kha dang bcas par sreg pa
57a8(rgyud): ste/ tshar bcad pa dang mnan pa yis// kha med pa dang thod pa'i dbyibs// 'od ma dang ni bya rig mchu// de dag btso pa'i zhi kha rdza// btso ba yi ni tshad bzhi ni// yi ba dang khros dang 'thor ba dang // bzhi
57b1(rgyud): ba chu ru 'bros pa'o// shin tu chos par gyur na ni// 'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang // khrol khrol sgra ni sgrogs pa yin// btsir dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang // de bzhin du ni brdung ba'o// sbrang rtsir bco dang / 
57b2(rgyud): bu bar bco// glang chen btso dang seng ger bco// rnon por byas te btse bar bya// mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur// blo gros 'khrul pa med pa yis// rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya// cha yi
57b3(rgyud): tshad byas gso ba ni// sbyar nas 'gyur gyi gzhin du min// de nas cha gzhan bcas pa la// gi ri kar ni'i phye ma ni// lugs las bzlog pa'i lam btsugs la// tshad ldan cho ga bzhin du btso// du ru ka
57b4(rgyud): dang po li ka/ tsa ka kra mar de'i sa bon dang // ba la ta ka shi dkru'i 'bras// pa ri tsa ta ku su ma// ud pa la ma li ka sa dpon// bar dar rus pa ka si dang // si ri sa sku sa bon dang // sbrang
57b5(rgyud): rtsi bo son pa la sha/ zhig rje'u ni tshes pa dang // de dag skyo ma bskyed phyir glugs// de dag gi ni rtogs byas la// yid la sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// bu mo'i bcud ni drangs
57b6(rgyud): te glugs// 'di yis rab tu bsgrub par bya// gzhan du nam yang ma yin no// bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni// mang po'i bar du brtag par bya// lhang tsher dngul chu shing chen ni// de tshe 'bras bu smin par
57b7(rgyud): 'gyur// bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni// byed pa po dang za bor 'gyur// lha yis rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tsha yi bar// stobs ldan bzung ba gnas su 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni tshad
57b8(rgyud): dang ldan// dngul chu rma bya'i mgrin 'dra dang // sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal ba'i gzugs// chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bani// sa li'i dri dang dri zhim dang // de bzhin chang dang chang min dri// cha gnyis dang ni
58a1(rgyud): cha gsum dang // bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing // bong tshod ran dang ring ba dang // yan lag rtsub 'dod mgrin pa ring // mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste// stobs ldan sngo bsangs/ 
58a2(rgyud): nu ma med// rked pa'i khyad par sngar bshad dang // sbrang rtsi lta bu'i dri dang ldan// sgrub po dbang po'i yon tan byed// de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te// rtsub dang gnyen dang yan lag mkhrang // stobs
58a3(rgyud): ldan zhes ni bya ba yin// de dang 'khyud las byung ba ni// rdzas ni yongs su sbyor byed do// rnon po dang ni lhang tsher lo// thun mong du ni bsten nas su// zha nye blugs pas 'joms par 'gyur// ro ni kha dang ska bar
58a4(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas rang sbyar nang du ni// lci bas bcos na nyes pa 'a byang // de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang // phag gi zhag dang tshi dal dang khrag/ bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byung // slar
58a5(rgyud): yang tsu ta dza ti na// tshwa dang dmar po nyid dang ni// pan dzi ra dang tsam pa dang // smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu cig/ de dang mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi chu// mnyes na nyes pa zad par 'gyur// de nas ma
58a6(rgyud): he'i rmig par ni// char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la// zangs kyi phye ma mkhor phye dang // smin sman phye ma blugs shing bco// chos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug/ de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin// de nas khrag ni
58a7(rgyud): cha bdun gyis// sbyangs na snum zhing stobs ldan la// slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni// mnyes pas snum zhing rtsu bar 'gyur// ra gan tsu ta'i shing dang ni// zangs dang yungs pa la sogs drug/ byin pas nyes
58a8(rgyud): pa tshar gcod 'gyur// de nas tsan+d+ha'i shing dang ni// sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang sen mo dang // thal sman 'bus zos shing phye dang // ma hA ha ta mo kA dang // pus ka ra dang brta gi/ sku ba sin du ba ri phye// bcas par mi
58b1(rgyud): yi nang du gzhug/ cung bang bzhag ste phyung nas su// rje yi gtun du mnye bar bya// 'od ma'i nang du thugs nas ni// btsodang rgod ma'i kha 'dra dang // ka ra nang yi chu yi dbyabs// bong bu'i gdong dang rnga maH/ 
58b2(rgyud): gdong // kha chen 'di dag bcing ba dang // tshar bcad pa la bsngags pa yin// gang yang 'khrul 'khor kha che ba// rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang // 'o ma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs dang // mtshon
58b3(rgyud): cha ral gri'i shugs 'dra ba// kang ka yi ni mgrin pa 'dra// nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags// gzhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la// bshad pa de dag rjes su gzung // bzhi cha lus pa btso yin
58b4(rgyud): te// phyed lus stobs chen btse ba yin// dngul chur rten pa'i dri ma ni// de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya// sbyang ba dang ni rtogs dpa dang // rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o// de nas lcang tsher rdul
58b5(rgyud): bye dang // bcas par rtsi yi nang du blugs// pan du zhes pa'i phyi ma ni// skyo mar bcas pa'i nang du btung // lhang tsher dang / la chu rnon po yi// cho ga yis ni so sor bcing // de nas cung
58b6(rgyud): zhig ngal bso bya// bzhag pa mai yi gnas sam ni// chu yau shing la brten par bya// lci ba 'am 'bras kyi phung po 'ang rung // rdo ba yi ni nang dag dang // ba lang ma he sogs pa'i lhas// bye ma yi ni phung
58b7(rgyud): por sgra// de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni// gzugs dang sgra dang dri ro sogs// tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag/ la la'i 'bras bu la la'i rtsa// kha cig me tog mdab ma dang // shun pa dang ni rus
58b8(rgyud): pa'ang rung // rnal 'byor pa yis longs spyod ni// rnam pa sna tshogs blta bar bya// bcos pa'ang bcos min yo byad ni// rnyed na rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de yang stobs can bcud bral na// sngo bzhin
59a1(rgyud): nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur// dngul chu ljang cher kha dog ni// sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te// khrag dang mkhris pa skyed byed yin// dmar pos khrag kyang skyed par byed// dkar
59a2(rgyud): pos zug zer skyed 'gyur zhing // srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin// ljang ser dag ni ma smin dong // ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing // nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching // nyes pa dag ni brgyar
59a3(rgyud): ldan pas// blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'// sde dang nag po bcud chen yin// de ltar bcud len rnam dpyad na// chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan// dngul chu'i 'ol se cig dang ni// rgya mtsho las byung
59a4(rgyud): nyis 'gyur ldan// bzhi 'gyur gyi ni me tog bcas// sna sman dablag pa'i mchog yin te// khrag dang dngul chu bcu 'gyur du// rim gyis spel te bza' bar bya// de phan chad ni 'bras
59a5(rgyud): bu med// pa lce chu bso bas rmongs pa dang // khyad par du ni pa sad kyang rung // sngar bstan pa yi me tog dang // byang chu ba sems dang bcas te bza'// thams cad du ni snga dro bza'
59a6(rgyud): cho ga'i rim pa 'di yin no// lhang tsher chu dang dngul chu ni// dgongs mo'i dus su blag par bya// zla ba la ni zla ba'i lam// nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste// de dang de nas sbyin par bya// de ltar yul dang dus dang ni// rdzas
59a7(rgyud): rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag/ yid bzhungs la sogs 'phel byed yin// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom
59a8(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha 'gro las// bcud kyis len gyi cho go'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyud du sbas
59b1(rgyud): pa nges par bya// yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// bde mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab// ye shes ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas/ 
59b2(rgyud): yul dang yul du mngon par skye// 'di ni mkha'agro ma zhes bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la// brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin// ku lu ta dang ma ru yi// yul du
59b3(rgyud): gnas pa ma me ste// sin+d+hu dang ni na ga rar// rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin no// lam pa ka dang so rany+dza ra// gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin// kha ba'i ri dang kany+tsi na// gang yod byis bcas mo zhes
59b4(rgyud): byas pany+dza la yi yul dag dang // gri ha de ba tA dag na// lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas// ka ling ka dang ko sa ler/ brtul zhugs 'dzin ni ma sha chen za// pre ta pu ri zhes bya dang // tri
59b5(rgyud): sha ku ni ra sbom dbang phyug/ khaN+Da ro ha zhes bya gnas// pu l+lI ra dang dzA lan+d+ha ra// tsaN+Da li yi bud med gnas// oM tAM dang ni kA ru yi// yul du bu mo chen mo ste// bI ko Ti zhes bya dang // 
59b6(rgyud): rA me shwa ri'i bu mo'ang 'dong // go da ba ri ar bu dang // mkha 'gro ma yi dbang phyug mchog/ gser gling ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// u r+yan yang ni de bzhin no// yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang // dpa' bo
59b7(rgyud): gnyis med khyab pa ste// kun kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma// yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang mchod cing phyag byas te// 'di skad ces gsol
59b8(rgyud): to// mkha 'gro ma yi khyad par dang // zhing skyong 'jigs pa chen po yi// mang dang zhing gi ming dang ni// gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang // gang du sgrub pa pos thos na// the tsom med par 'grub 'gyur ba// 
60a1(rgyud): de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad
60a2(rgyud): paba'i// gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i// gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa// legaso legs so lha mo che// sgyu ma chen por rang grol ba// bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// aT+TA ha se'i yul gnas
60a3(rgyud): pa// zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags pa ste// rgyal po'i lha mo'i skye gnas 'byung // rdo rje yi ni mtshon cha bsnams// yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de// ka ta pa yi shing la rten// dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i// 
60a4(rgyud): k+She tra pA la stobs po che// ko la kir ni dpal chen mo// gtsodags pa'i skye gnas las byung ba// gtsigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste// rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs su rung // grong
60a5(rgyud): khyer der gnas drag shul can// ri yi rtse mor brtan te gnas// me yi gdong pa zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la mdzes pa'i gdong // da ra nar ni bde byed ma// sme brtsegs chen po'i skye gan
60a6(rgyud): byung // lha mo ga yi mtshon cha bsnams// chos kyi dbang phyug gsol ba mo// zhing der gnas par grags pa ste// ta la'i shing la brten te gnas// gyen du 'bar skra zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la gtsigs
60a7(rgyud): pa che// de bI ko Ta ra rna mo che// stobs po che yi skye gnas 'byung // lha mo lag na mdung can te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ gnas der lha mo drag chen mo// b+ha Ta'i shing la brtan te gnas// k+She
60a8(rgyud): tra pA la lus chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu zhes bya// bi ra dzar ni phyi mo ste// ba dan gyi ni phyag na bsnams// zhi ba'i gzugs can lha mo tshe// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol pa// zhing der gnas
60b1(rgyud): pa me 'bar ma// a mra'i shing la brten te gnas// ha har dgod pa sgra chen po// sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed// e ru dar ni me lce'i kha// thod pa dge ba'i skye gnas byung // lha mo rdo rje
60b2(rgyud): shag ti bsnams// zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas// grong khyer der gnas lha mo de// gser shing la ni brten te gnas// dril bu sgra zhes bya ba yi// k+She tra pA la dpa' bo che// pre ta pu rer dmar ser
60b3(rgyud): te// 'jigs pa chen mo'i spyan dang ldan// lha mo gtun shing mtshon cha bsnams// gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba'o// zhing der gnas pa lha mo der// dza ti'i shong la brten te gnas// byin chen zhes
60b4(rgyud): bya'o zhing skyong ni// shin tu gcig shing 'jig su rung // e la pA da ring bong zhon ma// rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas byung // phya gran zhags pas 'jigs chen mo// zhing der mos pas yang dag
60b5(rgyud): gnas// phyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo de// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo// glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i// zhing / skyes mchog chen las skyes pa'o// kha che'i yul du ba lang rna// 
60b6(rgyud): gtum pa'i skye gnas las byung ma// rdo rje lcags sgrogs thogs nas ni// sgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson// gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo de// ri yi rtse la brten te gnas// sbu gu'i byin pa can zhes
60b7(rgyud): bya'i// k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po// ma ru'i yul du rim pa mo// 'jigs gdong dpa' bo'i skye gnas 'byung // lcags kyu zhags thogs lha mo de// zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas// yul der gnas
60b8(rgyud): pa'i lha mo de// dbye chen la ni brten te gnas// gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni// rmongs par byed pa'i bzhin yangs pa'o// na ga rar ni thong gshol ma// sme brtsegs yan lag skye gnas byung // ro langs
61a1(rgyud): // na ni 'od chen ma/ dpa' bo kun la dngos grub stsol// gnas der gnas pa'i babang mo de// A yi shing gi ldum rar gnas// swA yi byin pa zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che// pu NA ban+d+ha/ 
61a2(rgyud): / yul du ni// tsa mud+d+hi zhes bya ba ste// stobs po che yi skye gnas byung // kha T+wAM ga yis lag brgyan// lha ma spyod dang grol bar byed// sdig pa ma lus zad byed pa// bum pa ces bya'i zhing skyong ni// zhing de na ni yang
61a3(rgyud): / dag gnas// dzA lan+d+ha ra ni bzhin dang ma// chags pa'i rigs kyi skye gnas 'byung // rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni// bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster// grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo// khang pa brtseg mar
61a4(rgyud): brten te gnas// ral pa gsum zhes bya ba yi// zhing skyong shin tu gtsigs pa che// pre ta bu rir glog gi gdong // gtsigs b+ha skye gnas yang dgra byung // lha mo dbyig bshag ti thogs// bsam pa/ 
61a5(rgyud): thams cad rdzogs byed ma// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de// drag be'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi// k+She tra pA las smad pa min// 'ug pa'i gdong can 'jigs
61a6(rgyud): rung / so ba der ni lce'i gdong // zangs gri yis ni lag brgyan// sha chen gyi ni stan la gnas// bde ba'i dbang phyug rab ster ba// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo che/ shal ma li yi shing la gnas// bya ba kun mdzes zhes
61a7(rgyud): bya ba'iHk+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po// tsa ri t+ta yi yul du ni// ka rany+tsa gnas zhes bya ba// shag ti gtsigs pa'i skye gnas byung // shag ti yi ni phyag rgya thogs// dril bu chen po zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la stobs
61a8(rgyud): po che// sbrul dang ldan pa'i gyen skra can// gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad// u r+yan du ni lha mo che// gsang ba zhes bya'i skye gnas byung // lha mo rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs// shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i
61b1(rgyud): gzugs// sgra chen zhes bya drag po'i gzugs// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// gnas mchog der gnas lha de// a sho ka yi shing brten gnas// dza lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni// zhi ba yi ni skye gnas byung // lag na zangs/ 
61b2(rgyud): kyi phyar te thogs// dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo// gnas der gnas pa drag chen mo// gser shing la ni brten te gnas// skyed pa zhes bya'i dpa' bo che// bdud rnams thams cad 'jigs par
61b3(rgyud): byed/ k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma// drag cing sngo la stobs chen la// ral gri lag thogs lha mo che// dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo// lha mo chen mo gyen skra 'bar// sa la'i shing la brten te gnas// lhun po
61b4(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas/ ma ya pu ra/ 'dod ma ste// 'jigs pa'i gdong gi ste gnas byung // rdo rje shag ti dge ba thogs// grub po rnams la stobs ster baM/ 
61b5(rgyud): gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste// 'byung po'i shing la brten te gnas// der gnas 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i// k+She tA pA la stobs po che// pu tra nar ni a mra ke/ dgra rnams thams cad
61b6(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa// thong gshol dang ni ga ya thogs// sems can thams cad dbang byed ma// da ru'i shing la brten te gnas// sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed// brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i// 
61b7(rgyud): k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas// rgyal ba'i khab du dza na sa// khrag chen gyi ni skye gnas byung // rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag ldan// pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de// dzi li'i sgra 'byin
61b8(rgyud): 'jigs par byed// rna chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni// rtag tu de dang nye bar gnas// bod yul du ni lhan skyes te// rang byung gi ni skye gnas byung // chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs// zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs
62a1(rgyud): can te/ yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ khrag gi khyim la brten te gnas// longs spyod zhes bya'i dpa' bo che// k+She tra pA la thub dka' ba'o// ma la ber ni dbang bskur ma// tho ba yi ni phyag
62a2(rgyud): rgya thogs// sgrub pa po la rtag tu brtse// grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de// mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas// skyes bu'i dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i// zhing skyong
62a3(rgyud): sna tshogs dbang phyug yod// zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang // dpa' bo rnams ni dngos grub ste// rtag tu mtshan mo 'phyan pa dang // rtag tu mtshan mo 'du bar byed// mkha' la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba'o// 
62a4(rgyud): dngos grub yangs pa ster 'gyur te// sgrub pa po yi las rna mas ni// thams cad 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// de/ nas dngos grub kun ster ba'i// mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par
62a5(rgyud): bya/ me tog bdug pa de bzhin du// mar mai dri yi khyad par dang / gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod// sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs// bza' ba'i rdzas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud
62a6(rgyud): rtsi lnga yi mchog/ g.yon gyi char ni snod yin te// g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdor ning dang ni// khyad par du ni kha stong
62a7(rgyud): dang // sems can snod dang thang dang ni// khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag po drag chen po// lha sbyin mnyam du sten pa dang // nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang // rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams
62a8(rgyud): rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang // 'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag po bzang mo nag chen mo// nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang
62b1(rgyud): ni zla ba mo// drag du ljang dang 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma// 'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag me'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma// zod phreng phreng
62b2(rgyud): can kha TA ma// sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma// de nyid chen mo'i mang 'gro lnga// las kun rjes sgrub byed pa// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo che// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// 
62b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te// rdul meng rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yi// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig/ oM kA kA ka d+ha na b+ha ba ban+d+ha na kha bA d+ha na sarba duSh+TAn/ ha ne ha na/ g+hA ta ya
62b4(rgyud): g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya kar+yaM ku ru hU~M hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT dzaHswahA// / bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste// lha rnams thams cadatshim par bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni// las rnams
62b5(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par sgom// oM b+hak+Sha b+ha k+Sha/ sarba yo ge shwa ri ts+tsha nA/ hUM dzaHswA hA/ la sogs sbyor ba ji bzhin du// gtor ma'i/ las ni sbyar bya ste/ zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ bsad dang / 
62b6(rgyud): sdang dang bcing ba la// sgrub pos gtor ma'i de nyid kyis// las rnams thams cad bsgrub bya zhing // ye shes lcags kyu'i bye brag gis// rang 'dod lha ni tshim par bya// zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong // grong khyer ri
62b7(rgyud): yi rtse mo ru// 'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par// 'dus na sgrub po la mchog stor// gnas la sogs par rtag gnas shing // sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la// lha mo rnams kyis mchog ste bar// sgrub
62b8(rgyud): pa po la the tsom med// gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i// ro yo bsgrub pa bshad par bya// rgan po ma yin rma med cing // mdze dang shu ba la sogs spangs// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis 'byung
63a1(rgyud): po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // lha yi chu yis bkru bar bya// mar khu chen pos byug pa dang // bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi pas nas ni// dadabus
63a2(rgyud): 'bad pas gru gsum bya// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// zhes bya la sogs sngon bzhin brjod// ha hA hi hI hU hU he he// zhes bya'i rgod pa rnams par brgyad// sgrub pa po yis chos bzhin pa// me
63a3(rgyud): la gnas pa'i sa bon ni// rlung gi sa bon gyis phye ba// spyi gtsug du ni sbyar byas la// sa yi steng du mchod par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi dbus gnas par// 'bad pa yis ni myur du blta// sgrub pos bdag nyid
63a4(rgyud): bsam bya ba// skye gnas dbus su rim bzhin blta// 'bor phreng gi ni rgya mtsho ste// po nya 'od dang bcas blta zhes// mkha'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog
63a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpo' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro/ las 'du ba'i gnas nges pa dang // sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim
63a6(rgyud): par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang // lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa dang // de bzhin po nya'i khyad par dang // 'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che// ga
63a7(rgyud): gzhan lus srul la sogs pa// de bzhin sngags kyi phreng ba rnams// da ni khyod la bshad kyis nyon// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud dang ni ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor nyams dag 'bri bar bya// dngos
63a8(rgyud): grub kun gyi yon tan gnas// 'dod yon lnga yis rab rgyan pa// mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// ro la g.yogs pa'i ras sam ni// mtshon gyis brgyab pa'i ras dag dang // bu btsas pa yi ras dang ni// 
63b1(rgyud): ba glang ko ba la sogs la// dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis// sgrub po mchog gis 'dri ru gzhug/ tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// de nas 'bum phrag
63b2(rgyud): gcig bzlas pas// mngon sum du ni mdun gnas 'gyur// tshangs pa mo dang zhi ba mo// gzhon nu mo dang phag mo dang // dbang mo dang ni tsa mut+ti// tshogs kyi dbang mo sreg byed ma// rim pa gnyis pa yi'o// 
63b3(rgyud): dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang // lus ngan dang ni yi dgas gtso// sreg byed bden bral rlung gi lha// rim pa gsum pa yi'o// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // mig dmar dang ni gza' lhag dang // phur bu dang ni
63b4(rgyud): pa ba sangs// spen pa dang ni ra hu la// rim pa bzhi pa yi'o// tshadas pa khyab 'jug de bzhin du// ru tra skem byed sgo bzhir // sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung po chen po'i khams
63b5(rgyud): rnams dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang mar me ma// 'jib byed 'phrogabyed bcas pa'i gtso// 'byung po las kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs// sgrub pos tshi ga bzhin du sgrub// dkyil 'khor
63b6(rgyud): chen po'i sbyor ba yis// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dbus su kun nas zlum por ni// ri mo mdzes pas bskor bar bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni// ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul gyi// dbus
63b7(rgyud): su khro bo chen po bri// zhal cig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal// sku mdog sngon po drag chen po// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs// 
63b8(rgyud): yi dgas la zhon nyi mar bzhugs// sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad// gar dang ldan zhing stag lpags panabs// spyan gsum shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs// rdo rje 'bar ba ba dan gsum/ 
64a1(rgyud): / khrag gang ba yi gshor dang bcas// mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis 'byar// shar du mkha' 'gro ma bri ste// lho yi phyogs su 'phrog byed ma// 'jig byed
64a2(rgyud): lha mo nub tu bri// byang du lha mo 'bar ma'o// lha mo phag mo zhes bya ba// phyag bani yi ge hri las byung // sku mdog sngon mo grag chen mo// phag gi dngos can 'jigs par byed// mnga' dang de bzhin gzhu dang
64a3(rgyud): ni/ rgyal mtshan thod pa thogs pa'o// zhi ba mo ni phem las byung // mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo ste// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // kha Ta Da ru de bzhin no// gzhon nu ma ni hi las byung // kha dog ser
64a4(rgyud): mo phyag bzhi pa// mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan gsum mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin no// tsa mut+ti ni he las byung // mdog sngo la gra bi bzhi pa ste// kha Ta dang ni thod pa dang // go shor dang de bzhin
64a5(rgyud): Da ma ru// bam las byung ba'i tshangs pa mo// mdog dkar la/ ga pa bzhi pa ste// pad+ma dang ni thod pa dang // de bzhin gzhan na mda' gzhu'o// tshegs kyi dbang mo gaM las byung // sngo bsangs
64a6(rgyud): mdog ste lag bzhi ma// mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa dang // bgrang phreng g.yas g.yon lag tu thogs// khyab 'jug ma ni bam las byung // mdog ste lag pa bzhi pa ste// chang dang chu yi thod pa dang // 
64a7(rgyud): zhags pa kha T+wAM de bzhin gzhan// dbang mo i las byung ba ste// mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje shag ti thod pa dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid// thams cad gyen skra 'bar ba dang / 
64a8(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis ni rgyan pa ste// ro yi stan bzhugs sprin gsum dang // stag gi lpags pa rked dkris pa'o// shar sgo tshangs pa bri bya ste// mdog dkar lag pa bzhi dang ldan// thod pa dang ni
64b1(rgyud): bgrang phreng dang // ril ba spyi blugs pad+ma thogs// byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ste// mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan// mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dang ni dbyug pa mchog/ lho ru ru tra bri bya ste// 
64b2(rgyud): du ba'i mdog can lag pa bzhi// rtse gsum mdung dang thod pa dang // zhags pa dang ni bgrang phreng thogs// nub tu skem byed bri bya ste// mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// shag ti dang ni dbyug pa dang // dpa'
64b3(rgyud): be'i thod pa bgrang phreng thogs// dbang ldan khyu mchog stan la zhon// kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum thogs// gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po glang chen zhon pa ste// mdog ser
64b4(rgyud): lag pa bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan ga/ nyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// me ni lug gi stan la zhon// kha dadog dmar po la bzhi pa// me thab nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhan
64b5(rgyud): gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// gshin rje ma he'i stan la zhon/ kha dog sngon po lag bzhi pa// dbyug pa dang ni thod pa tho gas// gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o// bden bral mi
64b6(rgyud): re'i stan bzhugs pa// kha dog ljang ku lag bzhi pa// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o// chu lha chu srin stan la bzhugs// kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa// zhags pa dang
64b7(rgyud): ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag ste thar sbyar ba'o// rlung ni sha ba'i stan la bzhugs// du ba'i mdog can log bzhi pa// ba dan dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o// lus
64b8(rgyud): ngan gter gyi stan la gnas// kha dog ser po log bzhi pa// rin chen dang ni tho ba thogs// gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o// gza' dang skar ma thams cad kyang // rang rang dam tshig las byung
65a1(rgyud): nang rdzu 'phrul ldan nang stobs chen po// rang rang stan la gnas par bsam// ma mo rnams kyang kun gyi ma/ 'byung po'i rig pa gzhan de bzhin// las rnams thams cad
65a2(rgyud): sgrub pa yi// pho nya'i sgrub thabs de nas bshad// so sor stobs kyis tshar bcad pa// nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma// longs spyod la dga'i sgrub pa pos// pho nya'i las ni brnam par bya// 
65a3(rgyud): bo rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' sgom byas te// sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis// thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// dur khrod dang ni shing gcig tu// der ni dkyil 'khor
65a4(rgyud): brtsam par bya// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// de bzhin du ni lho phyogs su// drug drug du ni byas nas su// de nas ma/ chod pa brtsam par bya// gnas la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi/ 
65a5(rgyud): rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor// dri dang me tog de bzhi na du// mar me dang ni dri yi chu// dri yi chu yis bkang ba yi// bum pa'ang gos kyis mdzes par bya// nyin mtshan phrugs
65a6(rgyud): cig gnas gyur cing // de nas mtshan cig gnas par bya// gnas sogs yang yang phyag byas nas// de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya// dpa' bo yi ni ston mo yis// dang por slob dpon mnyes par
65a7(rgyud): bya/ de ltar byas pa'i sngags pa yis// phyi nas las ni brtsams par bya// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur te// bgegs kyis nye bar gtses nas ni// nges par dmyal
65a8(rgyud): bor ltung bar 'gyur// dam tshigs ldan pa'i dri mkhan gyis// 'byung po'i nyi ma la rnyed pa'i// bu btsas la sogs ras la ni// tshen rtsi khrag dang sres nas su// steng du skye ba'i nang bzhag nas// sgrub
65b1(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// yi dgas sen rtsi mar chen dang // sha chen gyis ni bdug par bya// de la dri yis bsgos nas su// de bzhin yi dgas me tog mchod// lha mo chen po mchod pa 'dis// 
65b2(rgyud): me 'bar ma ni mchog tu mnyes// shing gcig gi ni drung du ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum bzlas bya// rgyal la sogs pa'i dus su ni// slob dpon gyi ni 'dri ru gzhug/ sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// gzugs
65b3(rgyud): bzang bzhon pa phun sum tshegs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rgyan pa ste// gos ni ser po bgos par bri// lag gnyis gyen du thal mo sbyar// me 'bar ba ni kun tu 'ong // sgrub po'i mdun du bkra nas ni// 'bad de/ 
65b4(rgyud): cho ga bzhin mchod bya// me rtog dmar dang dri la sogs// sha skam dkyis ni bdug par bya// sha dang nya sha rdzong la sogs// 1dar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// rdzas lnga dag gi dngos po yis// 
65b5(rgyud): mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na ni// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/ gnyis pa la ni nya dri bros gsum par shing ni g.yo 'gyu/ ra to// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya bstan
65b6(rgyud): nas ni// sngags ni de la brjod par bya// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bor bzhag ste brjod bya ba// oM de be shwa ri hUM// phuHphuHphuHdam tshogs sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis bgrang ba
65b7(rgyud): yi/  dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas bzung bar bya// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa// byin gyis rlobs la bsgrubs shig/ de nas shin tu mdzes ma
65b8(rgyud): yis/ bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang // gser zho gnyis ni ster 'gyur te// zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya// 'dod la dga' ba'i 'bar byed ma// gal te grub par ma gyur na// drag mo yi ni sa bon
66a1(rgyud): gyis// gzir te 'bum du bzlas par bya// sa bon gyis ni gzir tsam gyis// mar me ma yi spyi bo 'gems// rtag tu sems can don brtson pas// 'bar ma chung mar bsgrub
66a2(rgyud): par bya// nyon cig lha mo shes rab che// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i thabs// thang ka khrus gnyis byas nas su// lhag par gnas te mchod gtor nas// de nas ri mo 'dri ru gzhug/ 
66a3(rgyud): dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis po ste// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// lag na bsdigs mdzub lcags kyu thogs// skra grol bas ni rnam par mdzes/ 
66a4(rgyud): me 'bar 'od zer shin tu gsal// ha ha ra dgod cing mig yo dan ma// sa la khrag gis byugs nas su// gnas der bris sku dgram par bya// me tog dmar po la sogs dang // dri dang
66a5(rgyud): bdug pa'i khyad par gyis// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma dga' / sha dang nya dang tsong la sogs// bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang / bor bya// rnal 'byor ma ni sgom zhing zlos// 'bum phrag gcig/ 
66a6(rgyud): gis 'grub par 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// khar bcug nas ni bgad par bya// oM DA ki nI hUM puHpuH// sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang po sa ni g.yo 'gyur te// gnyis pa
66a7(rgyud): la ni mdun du dgod// gsum pa mdun du snang 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni bka' nod do// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru ni bsgrubs pa yis// ci 'dod bka'
66a8(rgyud): ni bsgo bar bya// dgra rnams bsad cing smod pa dang // yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'o// las la sogs pa'i thams cad ni// g.yog me'i las kyis sgrub par 'gyur// gal te 'bum
66b1(rgyud): gyis gdon za na// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla// ra dag gi ni lpags pa la// 'bad de thad ka brkyang bar bya// 'jib byed ma ni 'dra/ 
66b2(rgyud): ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// lus la rgyan gyis rgyan pa dang // mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon par bri// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya// la
66b3(rgyud): gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// lci ba yis ni byugs bya la// me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// 
66b4(rgyud): khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong // bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs da dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang la sbyin// 'bad de bsamagatan gnas par bzla// oM A kaR+Sha yaHphu phaT// lag
66b5(rgyud): gnyis mnyam par byas nas su// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas// 'jib byed ma ni
66b6(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur te// dang po khyi ni ngu ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgo do// gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed// bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/ 
66b7(rgyud): bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smras// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems cad rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so// de nas nyi
66b8(rgyud): ma re re zhing // gser srang byed phyed ster bar 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla// sa bon 'di yos gzir tsam gyis// 'jib byed mo yi mgo 'gem so// 
67a1(rgyud): / chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su// kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya// ba glang la sogs ko ba ni// brkyang ste 'phrog byed ma 'drir gzhug/ lus ni skal gyis rgyan pa ste// kha dog sngon po 'bar ba
67a2(rgyud): 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par rgyan// gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes// ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs// ha har dgod cing rnam par gtsigs// khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ 
67a3(rgyud): dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/ sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos// 
67a4(rgyud): 'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bab// gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni bdun du gnas// bdud
67a5(rgyud): rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin// oM/ kr-i kru phuHphuHswA hA/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// de yi sngags ni brjod par bya// snying po'i sngags
67a6(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni// ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur// ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni// brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrod la// slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang // rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzhan
67a7(rgyud): yang rung // nga 'dod pa ni khrid de shog/ gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs// bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong // lha yi bu mo 'am mi'ang rung // ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru
67a8(rgyud): ni/ ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes mkha 'gro ru// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de ni rkang
67b1(rgyud): pa g.yon pa yin// mnan te lnga brgyar bzlas na ni// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma grub na// dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni// dum bu dum bur btub par bya// kri zhes bya dang gsod
67b2(rgyud): pa dang // hUM gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam// des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang // gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur// bstan pa'i
67b3(rgyud): las kyis ma grub na// ba la ta ka nag po'i shing // me sbar ba yi dbus su ni// khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni// nyi ma phyed na hUM zhes pa// brjod cing sbyin bsreg byas nas ni// ma' 'gro rnams
67b4(rgyud): 'chi 'gyur bas// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// de nasashang kar sgrub pa'i thabs// nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma// / dur khrod dang ni shing gcig dang // chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdo
67b5(rgyud): sgrub// dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis// tshon gyi dkyil 'a/ khor bri bar bya// sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshang dag tu// dpa' khaM yi ni ras la bri// gru gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/ 
67b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul du bya// sku mdog sngon po gla la zhon// lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// pho mtshan gyen bgreng zhi pa'i gzugs// ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan// zhal bzhi pa
67b7(rgyud): la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs// kha Ta ga dang thod pa nyid// de bzhin gzhan ni gshor dang ldan// bshang bcir ldan pas mchod bya ste// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// 
67b8(rgyud): sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas su// 'bum du bzlas par bsgrub par bya// oM ka pA la mA la a laM krita sha ra hUM hUM// A gan+d+ha A gats+tsha ru drA ya swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM AHru dra hUM hA/ 
68a1(rgyud): / swA hA// 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// gal te grub par ma gyur na// de nas de ni bsreg par bya// grub nas bya ba thams cad ni// byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min// de nas yang
68a2(rgyud): dag bshad bya ba// nor lha yi ni sgrub pa'i thabs// ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram// 'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag tu// sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bsgrub par bya// sor ni
68a3(rgyud): bcu gnyis tshad dag tu// khyad par du ni bsgrub par bya// kha dog nag po shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// 'khor lo dang ni dbyig pa bsnams// thod pa pad+ma de bzhin no// rin chen gyi
68a4(rgyud): ni cod pan dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// ba shang gci dang ni khu ba khrag/ mchod pa nyid du sbyin bya zhing // mi yi sha yis bdug byas na// dngos grub nye bar byed par
68a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ oM AHbadz+ra nA rA ya na hUM hUM swA hA// spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM ma ma tsakra sA d+ha ya sarba a su ra dau ma na hUM swA hA// stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis// lho ma
68a6(rgyud): yin ni kun gyi sgor// 'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur// sgyu ma thams cad ston byed de// dgra rnams thams cad 'dul nus shing // rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur// cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis// de nas
68a7(rgyud): tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste// chu yi 'gram ni dben pa dang // khyad par pad+mo'i tshal du sgrub/ kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas// zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // mchod phyir
68a8(rgyud): thogs kyis rnam par rgyan// pad+ma dang ni bgrang phreng dang // dbyug pa dang ni thod pa bsnams// sgrub pa po yi gtso bo yis// bris sku dag ni dmigs nas su// yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhim ni// gur gum tsan+dan
68b1(rgyud): la sogs pa// dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing // rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis// mchod pa'i cho ga rim de dag/ b+ha ga'i dbus sbyin par bya// oM brah+ma gats+tsha hUM AHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM b+hur+N+Na ba sta tA'i
68b2(rgyud): durba re Nu b+ha rgo de ba sa d+ha ma hi dI yo yon pra tse da ya ta// 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te/ zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang // nor bskyed pa dang mngon spyod sogs// las rnams zed
68b3(rgyud): nus 'gyur te// bzlas dang sbyin sreg kun gyis 'grub// khyod la yang dag bshad pa yin// nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo// bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub bri zabs// ma mo khyim ni nyams dga' bar// sgom pa dge ba
68b4(rgyud): byas nas ni// blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas// 'bad de bris sku dmigs par bya// kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba// skyil krung dpyid pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// 
68b5(rgyud): ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan// 'od zer dmar po 'barazhing 'khrug/ mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par dri// dgra sta dang ni gtun shing dang // mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin to// kha T+wAM ga dang
68b6(rgyud): lcags kyu dang // khrag gi gang ba'i thod pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje ral gri ste// gzhan yang sha chen thod pa bsnams// mu sun di dang ba dan gsum// shag ti dang ni bcu gnyis so// oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha sarba rA ma
68b7(rgyud): sA d+ha ya hUM hUM dzaHswA hA// // spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM AHga hUM swA hA// bzlas pa'i sngags so// stong phrag brgyas ni 'grub 'gyur te// de nas las ni brtsam par bya// lan cig bzlas nas thig
68b8(rgyud): le dag/ sngags pas byas na skal bzang 'gyur// rgyal po sgor yang mchod 'thob ste// dgra rnam thams cad zad byed 'gyur// bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang // 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar
69a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// cho ga'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis// ma mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs mchog/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// gza' rnams kyang ni sgrub par 'dod// oM sarba ti hri
69a2(rgyud): nak+Sha tra gra ha mang+ga l+ye b+h+yaHswA hA// gza' thams cad kyi sngags so// oM zhes bya ba dang po ste// swA hA'i mtha' can byin rlab ces// mkha'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog
69a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim
69a4(rgyud): par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldana'adas la lha me rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes de nyid khyad par dang // lus kyi
69a5(rgyud): mtshan ma ji ltar lags// rtsa rnams gang la brten gyur da/ nga // de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// nyon
69a6(rgyud): cig lha mo sgyu ma che// sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul pa// rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis// de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso// bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du// dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de// yang ngo
69a7(rgyud): mar ngo'i bye brag gis// nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin// dus ni myur dang ring ba dag/ yan lag mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas// dbug
69a8(rgyud): ni rnam par rgod gyur na// lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi// snga dro ro ha ta'i dus su// de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi gnas dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa// lce dang so yi
69b1(rgyud): mtshams dang ni// de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang // snying kha'i dra ba lte ba dang // brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang // mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs// dbugs ni chad cing
69b2(rgyud): chad gyur pa'i// lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru// 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed// nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni// 'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi// sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu// gang tshe dbugs
69b3(rgyud): nirgyur gyur pa// yon+tan gsum gyi le dag ni// zhag ni sum brgya drug cu ru// bgos pa yi ni tshad dag ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// lo gnyis ni dang ni zla ba dag/ dus kyi grangs su
69b4(rgyud): bstan pa dang // nyin zhag dag ni bco brgyad du// de yi tshad ni yang dag brjod// nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha'// gal te/ rlung ni rgyur gyur na// lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du// zla ba drug tu
69b5(rgyud): 'tshe 'gyur zhing // de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni// rig byed/ kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// 'tshe 'gyur du/ sa kyi grangs yin no// gal te nyin dgu rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis
69b6(rgyud): zla ba bzhi dang ni// nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni// lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin// gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis las ni mi 'tshe'o// gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu// sgo gcig nas
69b7(rgyud): ni rgyu ba dag/ lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ni// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag las ni// mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad// nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyun ni// lo gcig dang ni zla ba ni// dbyangs kyi grangs
69b8(rgyud): dang nyin zhag ni// dus kyi grangs las mi 'tshe'o// gal te nyin ma bcu gsum du// g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni// lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag/ rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma dgu las mi
70a1(rgyud): 'tsho zhes// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de/ lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni// nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las/ 
70a2(rgyud): 'tshe bar mi 'gyur de yi ni// tshe tshad nges par bstan pa yin// gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du// g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyu na// le gcig na ni gdon mi za// gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas/ 
70a3(rgyud): nas rlung ni rgyu ba dag/ de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag/ zla ba bcu dang nyi ma no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni// mi 'tshe bar ni ngas bshad do// gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu na// de nas
70a4(rgyud): de yi tshe tshad ni// zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag ni// bco brgyad dag las mi 'tshe bar// gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin// nyin zhag bco brgyad rgyu na ni// zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni// nyin zhag nyi ma'i
70a5(rgyud): grangs su ni// de yis dbus ni bshad pa yin// gal te nyin zhag/ bcu dgu ru// dri yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag/ ji srid 'tshe/ bar bshad par bya// zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni// nyin zhag/ 
70a6(rgyud): dus kyi grangs las ni// 'tshe bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za// gal te nyin zhag nyi shur ni// rgyu ba zla ba drug na ni// de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig/ nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu
70a7(rgyud): ba// zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni// nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tshe'o// nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na// zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las// mi 'tshe bar ni yang dag brjod// gal te nyin zhig
70a8(rgyud): nyi shu gsum// sgo gcig nas ni rlung rgyu na// zla ba bzhi pa nyi ma ni// dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho brjod// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang // zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni// bcu gcig dag las mi 'tshe'o// nyin
70b1(rgyud): zhag nyi shu lnga rgyu na// zla ba gsum las mi 'tshe'o// de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i// grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya// bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las ni// bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin// cha
70b2(rgyud): dang cha yis rim bzhin du// bar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// dus de dag ni bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus// shin tu phra ba ngas bshad
70b3(rgyud): pa'i khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni// de dag blta zhing yid ches bya// sgo ni steng du ltas 'bab pa// sna yi bar sha chang gyur na// nyin zhag bdun gyis the tsom med// cha shas dgu ni yang
70b4(rgyud): dag gnas// de bzhin sgra ni steng bltas las// mig gi chu ni chad gyur na// nyi ma ldan 'chi bar 'gyur// cha shas bcu ni she das bya ba// steng du bltas te 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yon
70b5(rgyud): dang 'gram pa yi// ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni// nyin zhag gci ga las mi mche'o// cha shas bcu cig gnas pa yi// gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yas par
70b6(rgyud): brten pa yis// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chad// cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas// lci yi skud pa nag mthong na// lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi// cha shas bcu gsum brten pa yi// 
70b7(rgyud): de bzhin steng na 'bar ba yi// steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na// 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren// srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brten pa ni// mgrin pa'i bla na gnas pa'i rtsa// / 
70b8(rgyud): steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyi// nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tshe'o// cha shas bco lnga gnas pa yi// steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la// brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na// zla phyed na ni gdon mi za// cha shas
71a1(rgyud): bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag/ lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa// sen mo'i khrag ni med gyur na// nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal// slar yang cha shas bcu bdun ni// gnas
71a2(rgyud): pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhin// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za// cha shas bco brgyad gnas pa yi// byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// de bzhin steng du bltas pa
71a3(rgyud): yis// nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis 'chi// bcu dgu yi ni cha shas gnas// chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas// de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// cha
71a4(rgyud): shas nyi shu gnas pa yi// pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// steng du bltas pa mchog dbang phyug/ mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni// grangs kyis 'chi 'gyur the tsom me// re'u
71a5(rgyud): mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la// bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag/ lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang // sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad kyis// zla ba la sogs
71a6(rgyud): / go rims bzhin// rims kyis rim gyis dbri bar bya// lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni// bsdus te 'tshe ba'i dus su ni// lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes// mkha'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha'agro/ 
71a7(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' gre las rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes
71a8(rgyud): bya ba rim par bye ba steni bu pa'o// snong gu po ma mtshan nyid da /  ni gang bar gnas pa 'i// e nAn sbyin migs de ltar ba//  rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te/ yis dpang la nyan par
71b1(rgyud): 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid// bshad kyis lha mo mnyan par gyis// sngon du bdag nyid sbyang byas la// phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya// gzugs med gnas pa
71b2(rgyud): mdog sngo ba'i// pad chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag/ slar yang gzugasu gnas pa ste// rnam pa kun gyis rgyan pa'o// cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang // go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas ni// kun
71b3(rgyud): da zla 'dra rtag tu dag/ rnam shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni// lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog/ rten tu gyur pa'i pad+ma gang // zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par rgyan// don cha dang cha yi gzugs// gong bu gnas pa zhes byar
71b4(rgyud): brjod// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gnas kyi mtha' ni da dag par bya// dag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi// gzhan du na ni don med 'gyur// dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na// dug dang rims kyis tsha ba
71b5(rgyud): 'phrog bum pa can gyis sgo btsongs na// sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur// 'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya// rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur// rnam shes dbrog pa'i cho ga dang // gzhan du
71b6(rgyud): / 'gro ba'ang bshad par bya// de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni// mkhas pa yos ni sbyang bar bya// gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas su// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi dbus su me yis ni// yang dang yang
71b7(rgyud): du dbye bar bya// a li ka lir ldan pa yi// sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du// 'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya// 'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis// bsnan dang ldan par bsam par bya// 
71b8(rgyud): 'jog pa snying gi rnam shes la// me tog lta bur bsnun par bya// rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung bzlas te// bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya// 'jug pa 'byung bar 'tshe bya ste// de kho na nyid mnyam par sgom/ 
72a1(rgyud): mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgom na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// de nas phyi rol lus la ni// sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul// nyi ma'i lam nas dang phyung ste// lha mo/ 
72a2(rgyud): cha shas ldan par bya// bsgrub bya'i snying khar zhugs nas ni// rlung dang me yis 'bar ba dag/ de yi rnam shes bzung nas ni// lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug/ bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus
72a3(rgyud): nas su// 'og go 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// ji srid zad par byas bar du// de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang // rims
72a4(rgyud): la sogs pas ma phog par// gong du 'pho ba mchog yin no/  // de nas gzhan lus la 'jug pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis// 
72a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis bcings nas su// rtag tu srog dang rtse la bar bya// khyod kyis gnas su sbyar nas ni// rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste// rim gyis sbyor bas phye nas
72a6(rgyud): su// cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis// sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// rang gi lus la sbyar bar 'dod// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis// mnyam par
72a7(rgyud): gzhag ste gang byed pa// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor bas mchod// gang gi ring nas thos gyur pa// de ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon// de bzhin mkhas
72a8(rgyud): pas gzhan sems kyi// bsam pa rjes su shes par bya// sgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi// sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur// gang gis lam nas bsams na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir
72b1(rgyud): ni the tsom med// 'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par// zhugs te nyan pa gnyis su ni// 'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni// me stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor// rlung gis bskyod/ 
72b2(rgyud): ba'i me yis ni// shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur// sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes mig gos
72b3(rgyud): mthong gyur pa// shin tu ring na gnas pa yang // sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong // bstan dang ma bstan gang ci'ang rung // de kun nga yis yang dag bshad// nyon cig lha mo sgra
72b4(rgyud): mche// dge ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang // gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis// thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba// mchog dang tha ma'i bye brag rnams// mdor bsdus nas
72b5(rgyud): ni bshad par bya// lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha// thigaler gzugs can mthe ris te// steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni// myur du 'gro ba byed par 'gyur// sne nas
72b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gnas su ste// rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha// gal te mig las ye shes 'gro// mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo las yi dgas te// de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o// 
72b7(rgyud): chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung // thar pa'i lam las gzhan du 'gro// sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis// sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi// 
72b8(rgyud): sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya// de la 'og gi sgo ru ni// chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam// chu dang chu min sgo la ni// ma yi sa bon 'bar ba ste// de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ 
73a1(rgyud): dbugs ni bum pa can du sgom// lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi mtha' ni rtsu ba can// rlung gi sa bon rtsa bar te// thig
73a2(rgyud): le sgra dang ldan pa yi// rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya// 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sgra dang sgra yis 'bul bar byed// dus la bab na 'pho bya ste// dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ 
73a3(rgyud): lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni// dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// de bas 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ni// mkhas pas 'bad de shes par bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngar bstan pa'i// 
73a4(rgyud): sngon chen bde ba phun sum tshogs// sgrub po rnams kyisasmin pa la// steng gi rtsa ba bza' bar bya// chu dang / skya reng ldan pa dag/ g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la// 
73a5(rgyud): zas na zhi dang rgyas pa ste// dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog/ tshe ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// brnyings dang smin pa 'joms par byed// lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis// 
73a6(rgyud): nam mkhar 'gro ba brjod par bya// rlung dang me yi bye brag gis// rkang pa'i 'khor lor sbyar byas te// yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas// nam mkha' la ni 'gro 'gyur zhing // mkha'
73a7(rgyud): 'gro kun gyis bskor nas su// lha yi lus kyi kun tu rje// ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar// de srid nam mkhar gnas par 'gyur// slar yang lugs las bzlog pa yi// kha dog
73a8(rgyud): dkar po'i pad+ma bsam// bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar na ni// rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed// rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba// rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar// rang gi
73b1(rgyud): kha nas byung nas su// bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim par bya// nyi ma bdun gyis dngos grub tu// 'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin// rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi// lus la thim par gyur
73b2(rgyud): pa dang // de yi sems ni bzung nas su// bdag la gzhug ste me la ni// bsams te rlung dang me sbar bas// de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur// tshogs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis// 
73b3(rgyud): mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste// nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang // mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang // lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te// sdig pas
73b4(rgyud): gos par mi 'gyur zhing // srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro// / ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yi// pad+ma dri med yi dad 'ong ba// de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni// ye shes
73b5(rgyud): sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam ste ra ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan
73b6(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las// gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang // seng ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung ba'i
73b7(rgyud): rim par phye ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa// g.yon du
73b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma nyid de// sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// g+ho g+hu// thal me spyi bor 'jog byed pa// 'bar byed ma'o mtshan ma'o// gu g+h+raM/ 
74a1(rgyud): mthe bong 'chir bar byed pa ni// 'jib byed ma'i mtshan ma'o// mu g+ha/ lag pa rnam par rdebs pa ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lu g+hA/ sna tser skyor mo rdebs pa ni// thugs
74a2(rgyud): bde mi bde 'dri ba yin// daMSh+TA/ sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa// rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// gan+d+ho daM/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa// nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o// a li ni da ha/ so yis
74a3(rgyud): lce ni 'chir byed pa// 'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o// b+hak+She ye// lag pa rtsa la 'ju byed pa// khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// dA ri ti/ lag pa snying khar nyed byed na// da ni nga yi yid 'ong
74a4(rgyud): ba'o/ ru tsa bi ta ba ta/ sna tsa khu tshur 'chang ba ni// med do zhes ste/ na pa'o// shU n+ya ta/ lag pa brkyang ste lhor rdebs na// phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o// tri ka sa ha/ lte ba ru ne
74a5(rgyud): nyenyid byed na// kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o// tsaN+Da li ka/ 'dzub mo mdun du sten byed na// zhe gnag gtum la drag pa'o// nI la dan+ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod
74a6(rgyud): pa ni dang lta ston// a na ga yu ta/ lce ni 'gril bar byed pa dag/ da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o// du ra ga ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni// chos grangs shes par 'dod pa'o// ta ra ga na/ tshes gcig nas/ 
74a7(rgyud): ni brtsams nas su// mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya// nyi tshed yi ge la sogs pa// sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg/ gi ri/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni// nyin pad dga' bas rol pa'o// sa ma tsha ya/ 
74a8(rgyud): 'dzum dang bcas par lta byed cing // lag pas lag pa bzung nas su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa// nor zas byin zhes bya ba'o// dzi na pa ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// da ltar
74b1(rgyud): grogs la 'dong zhes pa'o// salpa ta/ mthe bong yis ni srin lag la// reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o// so ma/ mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs// sUr+ya/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// 
74b2(rgyud): rdo rje mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkho 'gro las// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma/ 
74b3(rgyud): rnams kyi ngag gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // lha mos slar yang gar mdzad de// glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas// e ba sau ta ya
74b4(rgyud): ru Na ni b+ha dza ni te ma d+h+ya ma/ ga ma a ga ma d+ha d+hA ma ya ni sa/ ni ga ma sA/ ri gI ma b+hu ba ti si re re sa ri rI sa ni sa ma d+h+ya/ ma sa ra ra su ta ni sa ra sa ni// ra b+ha ga ma ya/ d+ha mA d+ha ma/ sa ra
74b5(rgyud): pa bA ma a a pa bA ad na mi te/ mo zhes bya'o// shar du me'o// gshin rjer ni bre'o// nub tu ni mi'o// byang du ni ku'o// me/ mtshams su d+hi sa'o// bden bral du ni ma ka'o// rlung
74b6(rgyud): mtsham su ni tu ku'o// dbang ldan du ni bi mo'o// i ni rgur pa'o// a ni zla ba la skye ba'o// u ni lha'i bla ma'i'o// e ni pa ba sangs kyi'o// o ni nyi ma'i bu'i 'o// a ni gza'i bdag po ri bong can no// 
74b7(rgyud): a ni nyi ma'o// gza' rnams kyis ni cho ga las// zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya// zla baM ka ka ra la dbang // nyi ma gdong lnga pa la ste// gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa// rA si gnyis gnyis la ni sprod / 
74b8(rgyud): sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod kyis bshad// skar ma dus dang nyi ma yi// bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal te// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa// lug dang ro ha ta sogs pa// gang gi 'chi/ 
75a1(rgyud): ba bshad kyis nyon// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya// zla ba dang ni tshes grangs dang // skar ma yi ni dus dang ldan// gdon dang nad ni de bzhin te// sgang gshong rA si tshad ma ni// gang
75a2(rgyud): zhig las ni skyes pa'i brjod// ba tra yi ni nyi ma la// dgun zla ra ba'i zla yi// gza' ni mig dmar dag dang ni// rgyu skar smin drug ldan gyur pa// de ni de yi 'chi dus yin// sus kyang bskyab par mi nuso// 
75a3(rgyud): khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la// lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang // smre zhing 'gul ba'i nad kyis ni// 'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya// de bzhin dgun zla 'bring po yi// gza' lag dang ni snar mar ldan// nyi ma
75a4(rgyud): bzhi pa de la ni// dgongs me'i 'chi 'gyur the tsom med// dgun zla tha chungs lha mo che// skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' da ni gza' lag bcas pa la// 'khrig pa'i mi ni gang yin pa// nyi
75a5(rgyud): ma drug la 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la/ skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni ba ba sangs 'jom zhing // nyi ma snga gro'i dus dus
75a6(rgyud): la nis karka Ta ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla 'bri bo'i gnyis lnga la// skar ma mchu dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni spen par ldan pa la// seng ge'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla tha chung bcu gnyis la/ 
75a7(rgyud): skar ma nag par ldan pa dang // gza' ni nyi ma dag la ni// skran dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni// bu me'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi la// skar ma lha mtshams ldan pa dang // gza' ni mig
75a8(rgyud): dmar ngag la ni// srang gi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la// nag pa dang ni mi dmar la// sdig pa'i mau ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla tha chung ches dgu la// skar ma gro bzhin ldan pa
75b1(rgyud): dang / gzhu yi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de dag nges par ldan gyur na// 'chi 'gyur bden par nga yis bshad// ston zla ra ba'i bdun pa la// skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la// chu srin
75b2(rgyud): mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// ston zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la// skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang // gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la// bum pa'i mi blud par 'gro// ston zla tha chung ba sgyu ma che// nyi ma dag ni brgyad pa la// skar
75b3(rgyud): mnam grur ldan pa dang // gza' ni spen par bcas pa la// nya'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// sngon du skye dus shes bya ste// phyi nas dus ni brtsi bar bya// gzhan du dus ni spro ba dag/ thams cad don med nyid du
75b4(rgyud): 'gyur// skye dus shin tu mnyam gzhag ste// zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya// tshe dang 'tshe dus la sogs pa// de nas de ltar lung bstan zhes// mkha 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// / 
75b5(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro las gza' dang
75b6(rgyud): nyi ma'i nges par 'chi ba tshar bcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // ltas kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// a li ka li mnyam
75b7(rgyud): byas la// sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya// dbyangs dang gsal byed dang po sogs// bltas te ming ni bzung bar bya// cha shas ldan la snying stobs can// de yi rigs ni shes par bya// mtha' yas la
75b8(rgyud): sogs klu rnams dang // nyi ma la sogs de bzhin gza'// mkha'agro ma sogs ma mo rnams// de yi rigs su rab tu grags// lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni// sngags rnams thams ca
76a1(rgyud): de las skyes// skye bo thams cad skyed byed ma// des na ma zhes bya bar brjod// a yig dang ni de bzhin A// ka tsaT dang yang dag ldan// ta pa dang ni ya sha ste// sde dgu
76a2(rgyud): yi ni yi ge'o// i dang slar yang lha mo I// de bzhin gzhan yang kha tsha Tha// tha~M pa dang ni ra Sha nyid// sde tshan gnyis pa yin par brjod// u dang lha mo de bzhin u// ga dza Da dang yang dag
76a3(rgyud): ldan dad ba dang ni la sa te// de dag sde tshan gsum pa yin// yi ge e dang de bzhin ai// de bzhin slar yang g+ha dz+nyA D+ha// d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin// 'di dag sde tshan bzhi pa yin// o yig dang ni
76a4(rgyud): oM yig dang // aM zhes bya dang tsheg drag bcas// slar yang da nyi Na na ma// 'di dgu sde tshan lnga pa yin// kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang // lhag ma lnga dang bcas par bya// de dag skye bo
76a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi// skye dang 'jig par yang dag gnas// yi ge bcu gnyis sgyu 'phrul che// 'tshe dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod// de dag rA si zhes bya ba// skar ma kun dang yang dag
76a6(rgyud): ldan/ zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis// de bzhin 'og dang steng du blta// brtan pa nyid dang g.yo ba nyid// gnyis po gnyis su brjod pa yin// rkyang ba dang ni sbyar ba ste// ring dang thung dang pham dang rgyal// de las
76a7(rgyud): steng gi rgyal ba ste// 'og ni 'chi bar shes par bya// nyi ma'i rgyu bar 'gro ba yi// gza' dang rA yis skar ma rnams// nyi ma la ni gnas te 'char// rA si gza' dang gsum par 'dod// dbugs rgyu ba
76a8(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// thams cad ra sir shes par bya// karka Ta dang glang po'i dgra/ de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang srang // cha shas drug dang yang dag ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur/ 
76b1(rgyud): sdig pa dang ni chu skyes dang // khyu mchog dang ni bum par bcas// cha shas lnga yi tshad dang ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// nya dang lug dang de bzhin du// gzhu dang zung du spyod pa dag/ 
76b2(rgyud): shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// snga ma bzhin du 'char bar 'gyur// slar yang ltas dang bcas pa yi// gza' rnams 'char ba bshad par bya// 'bras bu'i ming dang ldan par bya// ltas chen 'byung ba
76b3(rgyud): mnyam par gyis// nag mo dang / gtsigs ma dang / 'jigs su rung ma dang / rga las 'das ma dang // log 'dren ma dang / gtum mo dang / drag me'i gzugs can ma dang / dka' zlog lha mo dang / 
76b4(rgyud): rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub ma dang / gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / nag mo bzang mo dang / nag mo che na mo dang // nag mo sbom mo dang / dbang mo dang / zla ba mo dang / 
76b5(rgyud): drag mo dang / sdang ma dang / 'phyang ma dang / sum cu'i dbang mo dang / 'phrog byed ma dang / 'bar ma dang / 'jib byed/ ma dang // lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni// lhas chen nyi shu rtsa
76b6(rgyud): bzhi yi// ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ste// nyis 'gyur du ni byas nas su// dbang po'i cha dang yang dag ldan// ltas ni lhag ma bzung nas su// ltas ni shes pa nyid du bya// nag mo dang ni 'jigs
76b7(rgyud): rung dang // drag me'i gzugs dang dka' zlog nyid// nag sbom ma dang rgyal ma dang // drag mo sum cu'i dbang mo dang // 'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma// bcu po 'di dag rtsub par grags// bag
76b8(rgyud): ma len dang bkris dang // grong dang tsheng 'dus gzugs pa dang // lam du skrag dang thab mo dang // chen po'i sar ni dbyung ba sogs// ltas de las ni 'bras med pas// dge ba'i las rnams mi
77a1(rgyud): bya ste/ rigs de rnams la sgyu ma che// babang po'i las ni spang bar bya// dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na// drag mo'i las kyis smos ci dgos// lus la gnas pa'i dbugs dang ni/ 
77a2(rgyud): phyi rol gza' dang rA si ste// phyi dang nang du bcas pa yi// rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur// gza' gang yin pa dbyangs zhes bya// dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang // rA si nyid du shes par bya// dbyangs
77a3(rgyud): dang rA si de bzhin du// skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugs su blta// phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par// 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// g.yo ba 'char la g.yo ba'i las// brtan pa la ni mi
77a4(rgyud): g.yo bar// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste// phyi dang nang du bca sa pas gsal// mkha'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// // rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
77a5(rgyud): gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud/ kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gza rnams kyi rgyu ba dang sde tshan gyi ltas kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba
77a6(rgyud): ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // da ni gza' dang skar ma ru// bcos pa'i rgyu ba bshad kyi nyon// nyi ma rgyu ba'i nyin mo ni// thun phyed lnga dang bdun pa la// bye ba ci yang mi 'grub bo// zla ba yi na
77a7(rgyud): bzhi dang drag/ mig dmar gyi ni gsum dang lnga// gza' lhag gnyis dang bzhi pa la// gdon mi za bar 'joms par 'gyur// bla mas dang po gsum pa la// 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ 
77a8(rgyud): ngan spong gi ni gnyis pa dang // bdun pa la ni shes par bya// dal ba yi ni dang po dang // drug pa la ni 'chi bar byed// rigs de dag gi 'char ba yi// dus ni yongs su chad par bstan// de dag
