272b5(rgyud): byasa.u yig dbang po'i gzhu yi 'od// A yig yi ge drug pad+ha // glog gnyis dang ni 'dra ba'o// ri yig du ba'i kha dod ste/ phra mo lus ni spangs pa'o// 8 yig yi ge mun pa'i gzugs
272b6(rgyud): lo no pa reg pa shog pa mtshungs/  la yo ge mtshal gyi mdog/ oM ma yi ge dmar skya ste/ e sain+d+ha dmar mdogs// so yol go nyim dra/ 'od ze stong phrag rkyen du 'ab yi// mo yi maM ga drug 'bar ba// 
272b7(rgyud): nyi mo bye ba dang mnyam 'od// klu byed de bzhin du thig le// a yig sngon du bshad pa can/ zla ba gnyis dang cheg drag ste/ aHyig rgyal po de bzhin no// de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug/ las rnams kyi ni dag pa'i
272b8(rgyud): rgyu gyis dang grugs rdzos pa dang choms thal da kyi ste ci rmos padang 'khrugs pa sa myung du mas pa skye pa'i kha ma thal pa da myos pa dang / sa tha gang 'dun pa
273a1(rgyud): pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi las bsgoms pas// de ni rmugs dang dbang du'ong // yang dag rmongs dang rnam rmongs 'gyur// lus brlan pa dang sems pa bral/ dbang du 'ong dang dgug pa dang // ye shes
273a2(rgyud): shes bya can mchog go// bskrad pa dang ni gzhu ba'i las// rnam pa bdun du 'dod pa yin// sa yi zil gnon 'dzin bzhin dang // sngags min pa dang rmongs pa'i sems// skye ba 'di la nam du yang // de yi slar yang
273a3(rgyud): 'od mon pa'o// rnam par sdang dang thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o// 'jig rten kun dang 'thun med la/ skad cig gnas pa spangs pa'o// yid kyi las ni thams cad rnams// de phyir 'jog rten gsum gang
273a4(rgyud): 'gyur// bde ba kha yis bkug byas nas// dbugs med ri mo 'dzag ba nub// phyi mor yal ga rnams kyis bya// dam tshig dbang phyag ma'i gnas kyis// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no// gnyis
273a5(rgyud): stong mchog tu zag pa med// sangs rgyas ri mo steng 'og tu// pad+ma'i rnal can rab tu gnas// a li ka li mdor bsdus pa// bcud lin khams kyi lus las so// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha/ 
273a6(rgyud): zhal du yongasu 'gyur ba'o// de yi 'og dang gang gzhan du// yi ge thams cad nges par gnas// so sor snang ba ma byung bar// srung ba gyis zhes bdag gis bshad// sems ni rjes 'thun dbyangs su 'gyur// sems
273a7(rgyud): ni stong pa'i rang bzhin can// zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o// slar yang thams cad byed pa yi// steng pa nyid ni so
273a8(rgyud): sor dgod// thog ma gnyis ni rkang gnyis dgod// brla dang gsang ba rked pa dang / lte ba snying ka steng dang ni// mgrin pa dang ni rgan de bzhin// kha dang sna dang rna dag dang / dpral ba mgo ba rgyab tu te/ rang gi khams
273b1(rgyud): ming 'du shes kyis/ dbang la sogs pa'i las byed do// slar yang re re yi yang ni// las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid// stong nyid de nyid rig byed ga/ rgyun tu nang du bsgom par bya// ka yig la sogs ma yig mthar/ 
273b2(rgyud): lha mo bdag nyid chen mos nyon// gang gis sa gsum gyi ni lha// thams cad lha ma yin dang mi// sgrub po'i legs par nges par ni// de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur// de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// ka yig sogasu
273b3(rgyud): 'du shes so// bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni// lha dang bla ma dang ni sngags// rnam shes ye shes snying po dang // dus dang rgyu dang 'bras de bzhin// dbugs dang bcud len las dang ni// gter ma sa dang phyag rgya gzhan/ 
273b4(rgyud): dbang po dbu ma sgyu ma dang / 'tshams dang rigs rus de bzhin te/ lung ni rjes su rig pa dang // mig 'phrul 'dra ba rim ji ltar// de ltar de nyid las mdzes pa/ shes rab chen pos shes par bya// rang bzhin
273b5(rgyud): gyis ni brjod pa'i las// dus kyi me yi mdog can no// ji ltar dbang la sogs pa'i las// lnga lnga ru ni gsal ba yin// dmar ba gnag dang de bzhin dkar// ser dang ljang ku de bzhin no// sgrub po'i/ 
273b6(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i 'dod pa ni/ de rnams de nyid 'gyur gyis 'ong // ya yig la sogs dgu rnams kyis// ji lta'i tsho gas yi ge rnams// phung po khams kyi rigs rnams dang // yan lag dgu rnams brjod pa po'o// ji lta'i
273b7(rgyud): rim pas blo ldan gyis/ dgu dgu ru ni shes par bya/ las ni de rnams shes bya ste// 'dus pa bde mchog bla ma dang // bde mchog rdo rje mkha 'gro dang / 'byung ba de nyid 'dus pa dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed du bun/ dzi lta'i/ 
273b8(rgyud): tshogs gzhan du yang ngo // de ltar nges brjod 'bumo gsum las// phyung ba bdi mchog chung ngu ste/ a yig la sogs kAH yig mthar/ le'u rnams ji lta'i rim pa yis// de kho na nyid ldan par bya// sdom pa rgya man
274a1(rgyud): / mkha'agro skyes// mkha' mnyam nang du rab bshad pa'i// de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya// ji ltar dbus ma'i pad+mar ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsol bar sgom// sku yi rgya mtsho ser sna rgya mtsho dang
274a2(rgyud): 'dod chags rgya mtsho phrag dog rgya mtsho ste// phyogs bzhi por ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma 'dab ma rnamasu rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mtsho ma// pad+ma rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho ma// g.yon bskor du ni bsgom bya
274a3(rgyud): ste mdab ma bzhi la thod pa ni// rgya mtsho bzhi po yi ni gzugs// dngos kun bdud rtsir son pa'o// slar yang gra bzhi po rnams su// ji lta'i rim pas dgod pa ba// rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na// thar pa'i rgya mtsho g.yon
274a4(rgyud): bskor du'o// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dang chos dang yid da dang sems// kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste// g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya// sa dang na mkha' lce dang ni// rna ba thams
274a5(rgyud): cad rgya mtsho ste// ye shes zhes bya'i rgya mtsho dag/ sngon gyi rim pa/ sa dgod par bya// sgo skyong ma yi lha mo che// g.yon bskor du ni dgod bya ba// glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho// seng ge rgya mtsho ma he rgya mtsho'i
274a6(rgyud): gra la gnas pa'i lha mo ni// sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmi lam rgya mtsho ma// gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mtsho ma// kha dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin// byang chub chung ngu bdag nyid che'i// dkyil 'khor de yis shes par bya/ 
274a7(rgyud): dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni// sgrub thabs rim pas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni// pad+ma'i yu ba nges par 'thon// kha dog dkar po 'bar chen po// pad+ma mdab ma stong phrag can// de yi dbus
274a8(rgyud): su bsgom bya ba// ma' 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog ste// phyag stong pa ni rnam par sgom// zhal ni sum cu rtsa bdun no// zhabs bco brgyad kyis gar du mdzad// spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs mdog/ ral pa'i cod
274b1(rgyud): pan can gyi gzugs// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can// rgyab tu dbang phyug chen po 'dzin// lhag mar dpa' bo dang 'dabang mo// bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor// ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o// shes rab
274b2(rgyud): phyag g.yon du bshad de// g.yas par rgyun tu thabs yin no// khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs// gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang // bden bral dang ni thags zangs ris// dbang po tshogs bdag karti ka/ sgra gcan
274b3(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma dang // bla ma skyob pa bla de bzhin// nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu me// myos pa zhabs kyis gnon pa ste// rang rang khyim thab yang dag ldan// mdog dang mtshon cha yang bya'o// phag mo yis ni 'khyud pa ste// de'i gzug
274b4(rgyud): can nam phyag gnyis skyes// sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma// slar yang rang 'dra'i gzugs can ma'o// mdab ma stong du bya sgom bya ba// rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te// bcom ldan kha dog gang 'dra
274b5(rgyud): pa de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya// thung du ring po yon tan 'phar// a yig la sogs sde brgyad de// phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis bye ba// stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo //  rdo rje sogs shes bya ste/ 
274b6(rgyud): khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so// 'khor le drug bdag rnal 'byor can// de thams cad ni gar du mdzad// thams cad kyis ni ro la gnon// phyog gnyis pa 'am mkha'agro'i bdag/ thod pa kha TA kha 'dzin mo// bde
274b7(rgyud): chen rnam pa'i gzugs can ma'o// sangs rgyas thugs kha nas spro ba// 'khor lo gsum spro 'od zer phreng // grog ni 'og dang steng blta bas// sdom pa rgya mtsho dgugs par bya// slar yang 'od kyis dbyung ba ni// mkha
274b8(rgyud): 'gro rgya mtsho gnyis med bdag/ thams cad sdom pa'i sgrub thabs su// ji lta'i rnal 'byor gzhan bya'o// de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid kyis// phyag rgya'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// gzhung thams cad ni lta bar bya// gzhan
275a1(rgyud): / pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya// dam tshig gi ni spyod pa tsam// sdom pa chung ngur rab tu bshad// thams cad sogs ma bzhin dor la// thams cad sdom pa bzung bgyis// mche ba rnam gtsigs
275a2(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis// de'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang // sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya// 'og dang steng nyid mche ba gnyis// bde mchog mkha'agro rgya mtsho dag/ rang ming brjod
275a3(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags la// hUM phaT yi ge mthar sbyar gyis// yang dag ting 'dzin rdo rje yi// gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o// thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang // sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no// bdag gis
275a4(rgyud): bdag pos rgyud 'di ni// gsungs pas yang dag dga' bar 'gyur/ dar// nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas// phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar lags// khyod kyis 'og dang steng phyag rgya// rab bshad pa yi lha me nyon/ 
275a5(rgyud): mkha'agro rgya mtsho shes rab che// thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho'o// 'og/ dang steng du snyoms 'jug pas// de ni phyag rgyar sngon brjod/ 'gyur// zhal las nges par 'thon yu ba// ngag gis bsgos pa'i
275a6(rgyud): bdag nyid do// de ni mkha' 'gro spyod de yang // rnam par shes dang thams cad 'ong // zhu ba'i gzugs ni snying kha ru// 'od kyis thams cad sdom par gyis// de ni theg pa cher sdom pa// bdag nyid chen po ye shes
275a7(rgyud): gzugs// de ltar gnyis su byar med gzugs// de ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha 'gro rgya mtsho che// bcom ldan bdag pos
275a8(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// // de nas lha mos mchod byas nas// phyag byas nas ni 'di skad gsol// sems can rnams kyi sdom byung ba// bcom ldan bdag po nyid kyis gsungs/ 
275b1(rgyud): lha dgra yi ni rab sbyor bas// rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyon// byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi// bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig rtsa// sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i// rnal 'byor der ni rnam par spro// 'dod chags chags
275b2(rgyud): bral rnam 'dres pa// sdom pa skye 'gre'i gzugs can no// gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa// sngon gyi spyod pas sdom pa'o// ba yi na mkha' nam mkhor te// sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs// chos dang
275b3(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gang tshe sems ni 'gro bzhin pa// gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis// rang rig bdag nyid byang chub ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku thob 'gyur// 
275b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin skad cig rig med pa// gang gi srid gsum la thim gyi sa// de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste// lus can gzhan rnams kyi sdom min// rna lo 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa// de ltar de nyid nges/ 
275b5(rgyud): shes bya// nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi'ang // de yis sdom par bshad par 'gyur// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs ldan pa'i// a li ka l-i sogs sde tshan// dang po'i yi ge'i cha la sogs/ 
275b6(rgyud): / gang du ming ni nges par mthong // rigs ni de ru shes bya ste// ang ka'ang sems can yang dag ldan// mtha' yas la sogs klu gang dang // nyi ma la sogs gza' de bzhin// mkha' 'gro ma'i ming thog byas
275b7(rgyud): nas/ ma mo de rnamasu rab grags// lha rnams kun gyi bskyed pa dang // sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud nyid kyi yang ngo // 'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te// de yis ma la yang dag brten// rtsa ni dgu po 'gog po las
275b8(rgyud): srog rgyu rnamasu shes par bya/ a A ka tsa Ta ta pa dang // yo sha'i sde tshan yi ge dgu// i I kha tsha Sha tha pa dang // ra' gnyis par brjod pa'o// u A ga dza Dad pa dang // la sa sde tshan gsum pa'o// e aM
276a1(rgyud): // g+ha dz+nyA D+ha d+ha b+ha dang // wa ha sde tshan bzhi pa'o// oM oM a aH haN dang // nam de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid// bzhi po yongs su grags pa ste/ nyi can lnga rnams kyis de bzhin/ de ltar 'jig rten gyi de/ 
276a2(rgyud): sdud pa dang ni 'byin par gnas// sgra chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis// sa bon gzugs kyi tshogs dran pa// de rnams rA sir yang dag grags// rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i chas// 'og dang steng gi
276a3(rgyud): kho de bzhin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba gnyis// rgyu skar dang ni rA sir bshad// srog zung du ni de bzhin gshegs/ ring dang thung ngu rgyal dang pam// steng du de yi rgyal bar bshad// 'og tu 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam// nyi ma'i
276a4(rgyud): rgyu bar son pa kun// rgyu skar rwas gza' de bzhin// rA si rnam gsum spyod gang phyir// nyi mar gnas par 'char bar 'gyur// srog 'char ba dang yang dag ldan// rAs kun gyis shes par bya// karka Ta
276a5(rgyud): seng bu mo dang // bum pa ris drug yang dag ldan// 'char bar 'gyur/ dang shar ba yang // ji lta'i rim dag gza' kun gyis// dri sh+tsa ka dang rta nyid dang // ri dgas bum par yang dag ldan// cha shas lnga
276a6(rgyud): yi tshad kyis ni// gza' shar ba yis 'char bar 'gyur// ri beng lug de bzhin nyid dang // skan da ru ni song de bzhin// cha shas kyang ni bzhi pa nyid// 'char ba 'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur// zhag gi 'char ba ma lus pa 'a
276a7(rgyud): 'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan// nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar// yongs su rim pas nyi shu bzhi// gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'i// de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya// nyis 'gyur longs spyod bris pa dang / 
276a8(rgyud): dbang po rnams kyis cha dang ldan// thob pa rtag tu shes bya ste// bdag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo// bdag nyid kyis ni dgos kun dang // gzhan rnams la yang de ltar sbyar// de phyir phyi dang nang rnams su// dge dang mi dge'i
276b1(rgyud): las shes bya// sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni// rnam rtog med pas mtshon par bya// gza' gang de rnams dbyangs shes pa// dbyangs gang de rnams rA si'o// dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin skar// rang gi gzugs rnams
276b2(rgyud): kyang blta'o// dngos grub 'bras bu ster ba po// yang dag sbyor dang bral na med// g.yo ba'i 'char bas g.yo ba'i las// nges par brtan pas g.yo med 'gyur// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur// sems can
276b3(rgyud): rnams kyi bsod nams kyis// lha rnams grol ba'i rgyu nyid pas// lha yi dgra ni bsgom par bya// sum cu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo// rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso// kha dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbyibs// las
276b4(rgyud): rjes 'brangs pas bsgom par bya// lha 'am lha min sbyin byed kyi/ dragra ni 'khor lo sdom pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad snyoms ladrug pas// rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha 'gro lha yi
276b5(rgyud): dgra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor ma thams/ cad// 'dus par byas nas 'dri ba ni// lha dang sbyin byed sems can
276b6(rgyud): gyi/ sdug bsngal ster po ji ltar lags// gal te kun rang bzhin ston po// dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba// de nas bcom ldan lha la sogs// sems can kun ster po ci lags// 'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis// 
276b7(rgyud): gtso bi gsal bar mdzod cig kye// phag mo la sogs mang po yi// lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon// rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pas// lha dang sprin byed sems can gyi// bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med// byang chub chen
276b8(rgyud): bopor zhu las yod// rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid// bdag gi las kyi yang dag 'byung // de phyir dge dang mi dge blta// sna tshogs kun rtog 'o thob par byed// de yis lha dang sbyin byed rnams// gza' dang rA si
277a1(rgyud): rgyu skar can/ rang gi las 'bras la za ba/ ster ro gzhan du ci yang med// ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur// klu 'di yis ni dgyes par byed// a mi tA khA dza ni tA sa mAd+h+ya mA ga mA ga mA d+hAH/ ma
277a2(rgyud): bAny+dzari bA mAnya rig mA sA nya mA rI gi ma b+hu ya te/ sa rI ris riris kyis nI si~M nyi shru ta nis mAnyas nI/ shI ra b+ha ga mA d+ha rmA d+har+m+ma d+ha sAta pA ya ma pA bA ma dam te/ 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di 'dra grol
277a3(rgyud): babasgrub par bya/ a ba d+hU ti'i yang dbus su// rnam shes 'gro ba la mtshon pa// srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad// rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya// rnam par shes pa 'dres gyur pa'ang // khams thams
277a4(rgyud): cad kyi bcud yin te/ 'thungs pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dbang po rnams bgrod mtshan nyid las// rkan gyi phyog su gnas pa'i lce// a ba d+hU tir de rab bshad// cha shas can gyi
277a5(rgyud): ma yi/ bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// rtsa thams cad du bkang ba ste// yang dag rig pa'i gzugasu thim// mdobasdus pas ni khams lta ste// gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma
277a6(rgyud): brjod/ dbang chen la ni me yis sreg/ chu yos dbus su rab tu thim// myur du zhu nas dro bar 'gyur// rlung gi na mkha' la gnas so// chu yi tshogs ni skam byas pas// de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// sems ni stong nyid la
277a7(rgyud): son pa// stong nyid na mkha'i khams la'o// na mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// mkhas pas ye shes shes bya'i bdag/ de ltar 'od dpag med par sgom// rtsibs brgyad legs
277a8(rgyud): bar rgyan pa yi// shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya// bu med bri ba mau u ku/ d+ha si mi ro ma ka 'drer// rlung du traka bi mi dbang ldan du// rA si'i 'khor lo rim ji bzhin// de bzhin 'di la 'anam dgod// a
277b1(rgyud): i u e o a aHsa bon rnams/ bkra shis la sogs gapa' lda ni// shar la sogs par dgod par bya/ ring po de nyid du dgod bya// a aHnyi ma blar shes bya/ nyi ma zla ba 'di grol ba// ku la re la nya/ 
277b2(rgyud): ste/ gza' lhag gdong lnga pa 'dir gnas// mthar ni gang zhig lha ma yi// so so'i tsho gas za bar 'gyur// rA sau rnams kyis rgyan pa yi// 'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de// de ltar do la'i 'khor lo de// de ltar de la
277b3(rgyud): 'khor lor 'gyur// rgyu skar rA si dus dang zhag/ lug rnams ro hi ta sogs dang // zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// rgyu skar dus chod yang dag ldan/ ga/ 
277b4(rgyud): dang nad ni de bzhin te/ de lA rA si'i tshad kyis ni// skye ba'i las su brjod pa yin// kiN+Da ka dang bzang po'i tshe// mig dmar de bzhin smin drug ste/ de la 'chi bar shes par bri// gal te rnal 'byor
277b5(rgyud): med na'o// mar ga shIr Shi mgo dang ni// gza' lhag nyi ma la s+thA pa// mgul pa'i nad kyis nyin bzhin// khyu mchog la ni rtag/ tu 'chi// rgyal dang mri ga'i rgyu skar dang // gza' lhag 'khrig pa
277b6(rgyud): la 'chi'o// ku li ra mchu'i tshes brgyad kyi// tho rangs pa sangs la 'chi'o// gre dang mchu yi rgyu skar dang // tshes bcu smin pa seng ge la// nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste// gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang ngo // bu mo
277b7(rgyud): gnyis mar gal mas 'chi// sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang // gzhu dang phur bu'i ri mo dang // gal te sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa// srang la 'chi bar shes par bya// snron dang bcu gcig nag pa dang // phur bu sdig pa
277b8(rgyud): la 'chi'o// chu stong chu smad tshes dgu dang // gro zhin gzhu dang ba sangs 'chi// gro zhin tshes bdun zla ba dang // zla ba rgyal dang chu srin la nor med// khrums stong khrums smad bcu gsum pa/ zla ba mon gre bum pas
278a1(rgyud): / mdzad/ tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang // spen pa dang ni nya la 'chi// sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis// dus smra bas ni shes par bya// sa bon gcig las skyes yon tan// gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyiso// 
278a2(rgyud): rigs gnyis ni shes byas nas// de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya// sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas pas de'i rigasu skye'o// de'i 'bras bu shes bya ste// mtshan nyid kyis ni rjesu gnas// rA si sogs
278a3(rgyud): 'khor 'brel pa de// rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid// 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya// dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po// lhag mar mkha'agro ma sogs so// de ni rnam shes/ 
278a4(rgyud): skye gsal bar// las kyi 'bras bur de dran pa// thams cad bde ba ku/ na sbyor las// de tshe gnyis med la brten pa'i// 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa// bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungs so// zhes
278a5(rgyud): bya ba ni rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// // rdo rje 'od kyi rab sbyor bas// ye shes de kho nyid bshad pa// lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas/ de kho na nyid ye shes zhus// sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas/ 
278a6(rgyud): 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba// de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yis// rtse gcig pa yi yid kyi nyon// lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni// de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis te// de rnams kyi ni
278a7(rgyud): gtso bo mchod// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de// dkar po nag po'i phyogs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod// der ni rnying pa dgu po mchog/ lus mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid de
278a8(rgyud): gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so// dbugs ni rnam par spros tsam gyis// lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis na// snga dro re hi ta yi char// de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi
278b1(rgyud): phyogs dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsar// lce dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni// mgrin pa rtsib logs de bzhin du// snying gi gur dang lte ba dang // brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// 'doms dang ling ga dag de bzhin
278b2(rgyud): mgo bo dang ni spyi ba'i phyogs// mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du// dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o// lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te// 'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin// nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni// 'khor/ 
278b3(rgyud): lo dus bdag nyid can dga'// gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon// gcig brjod pa ni rgyan pa yin// der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te// sum cu drug cu rnams de bzhin// cha shas de ltar gyi ni tshad// mdor bsdus pa
278b4(rgyud): yis bshad par bya// nyi ma bdun ni yongs thob nas// gang tshe rlung ni 'bab bran// lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang / dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang // nyi ma rnams ni bco brgyad kyi// gang zhig tshad du yang
278b5(rgyud): / dag brjod// zhag brgyad rnamasu yongs gtong bas// rlung ni gang tshe 'a/ bab pa na// lo gnyis su ni yongs bshad par// de yi 'tshe ba yi ni grangs// nges par de'i tshe 'chi ba ni// de yi zla ba rig byed
278b6(rgyud): / grangs// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad// 'tsho ba yi ni dus grangs so// lha mo nyi ma dgur 'bab na// lo gnyis su ni de 'tshe ste// zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi// tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can no// lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis// lo
278b7(rgyud): gnyis su ni de 'tshe'o// nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin du// gang tshe rtsa ni rab 'jug na// lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas// zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis// nyi ma bco brgyad rab tu bshad// the tshom med par bshad pa'o// 
278b8(rgyud): zhag ni bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas// lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags// zla ba yang ni le'i grangs can// nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes// bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa// g.yas su bgrod par 'bab pa na// le ni yang
279a1(rgyud): / dag bshad pa ste/ zla ba yang ni rig byed grag/ nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// lha mo gang tshe bdun gnyis su// rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo na tshe ru yang / 
279a2(rgyud): dag bshad// zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag grags// nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis te// de yi 'tshe ba'i tshad yin no// gang tshe bco lnga nyi mar ni// rlung ni de bzhin 'bab pa na// de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba// lo gcig na ni the tshom
279a3(rgyud): med/ nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi// gang tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na// 'tshe ba zla ba bcu dang ni// nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nyin rnams kyi// tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o// nyi ma rnams
279a4(rgyud): ni bcu bdun du// nges par gang tshe rlung 'bab na// de tshe de'i tshad kyis ni/ zla ba rnams ni dgu dang ni// nyi ma bco brgyad na de bzhin// chi dra'i dus la the tshom med// nyi ma bco brgyad rgyu ba yis// zla ba yang
279a5(rgyud): ni brgyad na dang // nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs// dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o// gang tshe gcig dman nyi shur ni// dri la zhon pa/ spyod pa na// nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba// 'tshe ba zla ba bdun dang ni/ 
279a6(rgyud): nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad// dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdeng can// gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod// zla ba drug na tshe dang 'bral// nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnams su// gang tshe nyi ma rab 'bab na// zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho
279a7(rgyud): ste nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs// nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe 'bab// zla ba'i rig na tshe 'gro// nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu bzhi// zla ba rig byed du bshad do// lha mo gang tshe nyi shu gsum// rlung ni rgyun tu 'bab pa na// de ni zla ba
279a8(rgyud): bzhir 'tsho ste// nyi ma dus rnams su dran pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas// zla ba gsum du bshad pa ste// nyin bcu gcig na de bzhin du// 'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod// dus kyi grangs ni mdor sngas
279b1(rgyud): nas/ gong du sngon du bshad de'i phyir// bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang // bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni// cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas// bar gyi gsal bar byas pa yin// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs don du// dus 'di
279b2(rgyud): rnams ni rab tu bstan// rnal 'byor ma rnams shin phra mo'i// 'thun ma dus ni bdag gis bshad// lha mo de rnams kyis yid ches// khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro// sna yi sha ni rnam chad cing // steng bltas ma ni de
279b3(rgyud): bzhin 'bab// de yi 'tshe bar shes byas pa// nyi ma bdun na the tshom med// mig gi gos ni yang dag chad// gyen kha bltas ma mchog de bzhin// cha shas dgu la yang dag zhon// lngas lhag pa na 'chad de bzhin// go da
279b4(rgyud): bar+ya 'khur ba yi// ngos su steng du 'gro ba mo// nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste// / nub gcig gis lhag de bzhin no// rna ba g.yas la yongs te/ ngan nas// bzang mo steng du yang dag rten// bcu gcig cha shas la zhe ni
279b5(rgyud): te/ 'chad pa bco brgyad na de bzhin// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo/ lce la ri mo nag po can// lus can kun gyi 'chi ba ni// nam zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya// bcu gsum so yi bar du ni// gdong
279b6(rgyud): nag po ni reg de bzhin// nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyis// 'byung po rnams kyi bgrod pa yin// rgyun tu mchi ma 'bab gang rtsa// steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags// bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhon// bcu phyed kyis ni
279b7(rgyud): the tshom med// snying ka'i gzeb ni zhom pa dang // steng du lha ma de mchog ma// gsum dang lnga ru mdzes lha mo// zla ba phyed du the tshom med// lte ba'i dbus su son lha mo// bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs// sen so'i
279b8(rgyud): khrag med de bzhin zhag/ nyin rnams bcu ru the tshom ze// bcu bdun pa yi rtsa yang ni// brla yi steng du bskams pa ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags// nyin gzhan nyin la the tshom med// byin ba zung gi gang zhig/ 
280a1(rgyud): // rtsam steng du bltas ma de bzhin mchog/ bco brgyad pa ru shes bya ste// nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis// gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms// 'chi ba'o steng du kha bltas mchog mnyam pas
280a2(rgyud): 'chad par 'gyur ba la// 'di yis 'tshe ba the tshom med// mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma// steng bgrong mchog gi dbang phyug ma// bcu gnyis su ni yang dag grags// nyin rnams dus tshod the tshom za// bar gyi
280a3(rgyud): nyi ma gang bshad pa// bcu gnyis nyid la the tshom med// le yi rim pas de sbyangs nas// bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa yis ni// drug dang sum cu bco brgyad bcu// 'di na zla bas rim ji ltar// shes bya de ltar lha chen mo/ 
280a4(rgyud): rim gyi rim gyis dbye ba'o// lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar// ma che ba yir ni shes par bya// yang dag cho ga 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// rab tu sbyor bas sog bkang bas// sangs
280a5(rgyud): rgyas lus la 'chi ba smos// rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas// mdor bsdu sa pa yis 'chad par 'gyur// rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i srog/ snal ma bcu gnyis mthar bar du'o// sangs rgyas rjes
280a6(rgyud): su dran sbyor bas// 'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur// gsang sngags chen po'i 'di la ni// gnas nas kun tu bgrod par bya// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur// rnam pa dri za'i rig can no// rtsa yi kun nas 'gengs
280a7(rgyud): bzhin pa// dngos po kun la gnas pa yin// skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni// ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed// chos bdag med pa 'dzag par 'gyur// gang zag rnams la rgod par 'gyur// gnyis ka sgyu ma chen
280a8(rgyud): bo ste snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin// mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems// mtshams rnams kun tu 'chi ba yin// 'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs// rnal 'byor rnams la bde ster byed/ dkyil
280b1(rgyud): 'khor thams cad bzung ba yis// thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// 'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas// bde ba dam pa yang dag myang // rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs
280b2(rgyud): mtshungs ma// lha ni mngon rtogs gzugs can te/ shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// srog kun yang dag sbyor ba las// mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags
280b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba 'di rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o// // de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs// byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// mchod pa byas shing phyag byas
280b4(rgyud): te/ 'di skad du ni gsol ba'o// gtso bo lha rnams sgrub thabs dang // de rnams rang sngags bdag la gsungs// gang gi thams cad dbang gyur pa// gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags// lha la
280b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i sgrib pa'i thabs// rdo rje sku yi rgyal po nyon// gang gis yang dag cho ga yis// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'ju/ ga/ dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni// sku bsgom bya ba 'dir
280b6(rgyud): bshad de// de la ma mo lha rnams dang // pho nya 'byung po gza' de bzhin// lus srul po ni chen po dang // rigs pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod pa// dbus ma yi ni nang gnas pa// srid pa dag pas bsgrubs
280b7(rgyud): pa yin// dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'khor du ni rab 'bab can// ma mo dbang chen bsgrub bya dang // lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung po me la bsgrub bya ba// gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khyer la
280b8(rgyud): lus srul po ni na mkha' ste// rdo rje sku yi rab sbyor bar// ye shes dkyil 'khor cha yis ni// oM bi d+hU ti 'bab pa yin// dkyil 'khor lnga rnams kyi tha ma// de yi dus su gshegs par bya// dbalta
281a1(rgyud): / nas ni phyi rol du// ras bris la sogs dkyil 'khor dgod// nag pa'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// 'bum phrag bzlas pas de nas ni// ster
281a2(rgyud): 'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o// tshangs bzhi pa mo de bzhin gzhon nu phag/ dbang mo nyid dang tsA mut+ti// tshogs kyi dbang me de gdan mo// gnyis pa'i dum bur dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // 
281a3(rgyud): yi dgas dbang dang me stan can// bden bral dang ni rlung de bzhin// dum bu gsum par dgod pa pa// nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang // gza' lhag phur bu pa sangs dang // spen pa dang ni rA hA'o// bzhi par tshangs
281a4(rgyud): khyab 'jug de bzhin// drag po gzhon nu nges par sgor// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang // mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang // kam pe dzA khyab bdag de
281a5(rgyud): bzhin// 'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs kyis ni// rtag tu cho gabazhin bsgrub bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// kun nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri// ri mo sum bskor dbus byin
281a6(rgyud): bas/ brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya// pad+ma mdab brgyad bri bar bya// lte ba zab pa'i spyod yul can// de yi dbus su rdo rje sku// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs
281a7(rgyud): pa yi// bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po drag chen po// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// nyi mar gar mdzad re la bzhugs// sum cu rnams 'jig par byed// stag gi pags
281a8(rgyud): pa'i na bza' 'dzin// bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug gis ni brgyan// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du rim pa ji lta bas// mkha'agro
281b1(rgyud): kam po ji nyid ma// 'jib ma dang ni mar me'o// de ltar rdo rje sku yi don// mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya// lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur// pho nya rkang pa drug 'grod ma'i// snying kha gsang ba mgrin pa ru// 
281b2(rgyud): nyid rnam pa slar dgod pa// de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin pas// bsam gtan sems te gzhan gyis min// lha rdzas 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang lus skyes// las dang po yi sbyor ba
281b3(rgyud): yis/ phyogs bcur rnam par spro bar 'gyur// hrIHyig las byung ba'i lha mo// phag mo phyag ni bzhi pa ste// gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin du// rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid// kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo/ 
281b4(rgyud): phag gi mdong can 'jigs rung ma'o// pad yig gis bris zhi ba mo// kha dog dmar me 'od chen mo// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid// kha T+wAM Da ma ru de bzhin// hriyi yi ges gzhon nu ma// kha deg
281b5(rgyud): ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum// gzhu dang mnga' nyid de bzhin no// hoHyi yi ge sa tsA muN+Di// khwa dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma// kha T+wAM ga nyid thod pa dang // cang ti'u chang
281b6(rgyud): snod de bzhin no// oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo// kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma// pad+ma nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog/ gaM yig las ni tshogs dbang mo// kha dog ljang ku phyag bzhi ma// 
281b7(rgyud): rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang // bgrang phreng dang ni la tu'o// bI yig las ni khyab 'jug ma// kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi pa// 'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang // zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog/ I yig las
281b8(rgyud): byung ba dbang mo// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang // bsdigs mdzub bcas zhag de bzhin no// thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brjes sgra// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// ro la
282a1(rgyud): / zhon ma spyan gsum ma// rked par stag gi lpags pa dkris// shar sgor tshangs pa bri bya ba// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang // spyi blugs pad+ma de bzhin no// 
282a2(rgyud): byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no// lho ru drag po bri ba ste// du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa// rtse gsum thod pa de bzhin du// 
282a3(rgyud): zhags pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin// nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin// thod pa'i bgrang phreng 'dzin de 'dzin// dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa// kha dog dkar
282a4(rgyud): po phyag bzhi ste// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag gzhan tha/ la mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po glang po la zhen pa// kha dog ser/ po phyag bzhi ste// rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang // thal mo sbyar ba byas pa
282a5(rgyud): mchog/ me ru lug la zhon pa ni// kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa// me yi thab dang thod pa dang // skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar// gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa// kha dog nag po pago bzhi pa// 
282a6(rgyud): dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang // kun tu skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin// bden brel mi la zhon pa ste// kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kun nas skrag pas thal sbyar mchog/ chu lhar chu srin la zhen pa// 
282a7(rgyud): kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang // thal mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan// rlung du ri dgas la zhon pa// du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi ste// ba dan dang ni thod pa dang // de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin
282a8(rgyud): ba mchog/ lus ngan du ni gtor la zhon// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ rin po che dang zod pa 'dzin// thal sbyar byas pa'o de bzhin gzhan/ thams cad rgyu skar dang ni gza'// rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa sgom/ 
282b1(rgyud): gi dam tshig las byung ba// de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che// ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po rigs ma de bzhin gzhan/ de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// de phyir re re sgrub par bya// dur khrod la sogs gnas rnam
282b2(rgyud): su sna tshogs dam tshogs za rnams kyis// rnal 'byor longs spyod rtag dga' la// po nya'i las ni yang dag brtsam// zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis
282b3(rgyud): de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed// gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// de phyir rim pas mchod par bya// de nas dri sogs dbul ba zhing // sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la/ oM hU~M phaT
282b4(rgyud): sogs nang bcug pa'o// dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nas// drer ni thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas gzhan po rjes pa'i nang nga du// bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyi gzugs can te// ba dan gsum pa
282b5(rgyud): 'bar ba dang // rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/ gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzi na pa nyid// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar// lha/ ga ma sngon gi gzugs can te// lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don/ 
282b6(rgyud): nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom mod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag/ thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can// gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa// bcom ldan gzugs
282b7(rgyud): kyi 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o// de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yis sad mdzad nas// ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad// blo gros chen po dus co legs// kye rnal 'byor
282b8(rgyud): ma rnams khyed nyid dus// myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o// sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po// myu gu can gyi sbyor bas bshad// gza' dang sgyu skar tshes grangs ni// sems kyi dus su mngon par brjod// gzugs
283a1(rgyud): // med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu// 'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// de tshe myu gu can bsgom pa// sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid
283a2(rgyud): myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te// sems las byung ba myu gu can// rgyu skar rA si bza' sogs pas// gang zhig du ni myu gu skyes// de yis myu gu can nges byas// rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang bya// dge ba 'am ni
283a3(rgyud): mi dge kun// tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char ba// de rnams thams cad dus rnams// thams cad bde bdag nyid skyes sgom// ro tri ma ni rnyed byed pa'o// ma b+ha ma nad 'joms pas spangs// ku swa A dus byed
283a4(rgyud): gzugs te// tshes grangs de ni yongasu spangs// mo bu ma bzang dang dbakra shis so// ra bu A 'joms par byed po'o// b+ha bu b+ha dus daMkyi gzugs kyiso// b+ha pA gu rnyed pa byed pa po// mi gu d+ha ner la sog
283a5(rgyud): par mdzad// tra gu a dus kyis gzugs can no// bri shu pA dge ba rnams byed do// b+hi shu bA nad dang 'joms pa yin// b+hu b+ha shu gai shin rje'i mche can no// klu ma kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob/ 
283a6(rgyud): / b+h+ra ma A gdung byed pa po// pA ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can no// me'i gdan du mi ki ra// slar yang gshin rjer raN+Da spang // srin por bco lnga pa nyid dang // khyu mchog chu lhar spang bar bya// sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms
283a7(rgyud): nyid du// gter du rmi lam can de bzhin// bzangs po mig gsum pa nyid du// 'byung po'i nyi ma shar de bzhin// zla ba dang ni nyi sogs chas// de rnams res mo rab bshad pa// bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin// seMs
283a8(rgyud): g.yangs 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas// skye bo kun gyi ma yi ni// cha yi rgyu bar shes par bya// khyu mchog mi kau ra nyid dang // rmi lam bco lnga pa de bzhin// zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags// rim pa 'di rnams rnam
283b1(rgyud): par brjod// nya la me ru yang dag gnas// stong la rlung gi gnas su'o// de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa'i// phyogasu gdung byed yang dag gnas// zla ba nyi las byung ri mo// mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro/ zhi dang sdig
283b2(rgyud): pa bltas pa yis// shes rab can gyis des de spangs// mche ba dang 'phrad ma bltas pas// bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin// dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa// rA hA'i rgyu bar grags pa yin// dkar dang gcig shos
283b3(rgyud): cho ga yis// blo gros mthar thug pas shes 'gyur// rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed// skye bo rang gis byas pa yo// las 'di shes par ma gyur to// las de yis ni dus
283b4(rgyud): rnams ni// the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa// de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnams nyam su myong // yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur// de ni myu gu can du
283b5(rgyud): grags// kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ myu gu myu gu'i gzugs can no// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'khor lol nang son pa// gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs// ye shes myu gu
283b6(rgyud): rnam bsgoms las// las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur// thang bdag nyid sbyor chen las// sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa// rgyu rnamasu ni rtag bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje rgyu yis 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab
283b7(rgyud): tu byed pa dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas/ rnal 'byor mas 'di dris so// ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che// las dang 'brel pas 'byung bar 'gyur// sngon ni las ni rnam nyams pas// rgyun nyams/ 
283b8(rgyud): pas na 'od med pa// 'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis// snying rje mnyes gshin pas bka' stsol// sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang // sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bya yis
284a1(rgyud): / khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon// rdo rje ral pa can sbyor bas// las kyi nang du sgrub par 'gyur// re re yi ni sbyor ba yi// de ni rang 'byung du gnaso// shin tu dad pa la gnas pas// dbang po thams cad
284a2(rgyud): 'du bar bya// de yi ral pas rtag 'jig rten// ral pa'i ming gis 'ching ba yin// dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur// de phyir bag chags thams cad dang // dge ba'i las la
284a3(rgyud): zad par 'gyur// skye bo chen po de 'byung ba// gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung // dril bu'i sgra ni thob byas nas// de rnams mtshan nyid
284a4(rgyud): bshad par bya// rtse dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang // rtse lnga rtse mo gsum dpa can// de ltar la sogs dril bu che// rtse mo stong gi bar du// / sgra brjod pa yis dngos po yis// spros pa med cing yi ge med// 
284a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis mkha 'gro rgya mtsho dag/ de yi sgra las rtog/ pa yang dag byung // de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag/ gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad rtse
284a6(rgyud): can de rdo rje/ gang du yid ni rnam 'bro ba// chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can// de nyid du ni gsor bar bya// phyi'i dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dril bu rtag tu cha gsum can// lha yis
284a7(rgyud): yang dag rgyan par byas// re re yi ni lha'i bdag po// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o// lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan// dril bu de la
284a8(rgyud): pad sogs pa// ji ltar de rnams kyi ni rgyan// de bzhin dril du'i ska rags so// lce ni slongad nga gra rnams su// phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid// ji ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mtshon pa// de rnams zhal nas rtsem
284b1(rgyud): mthon// bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang / steng du rang rigs mtshan ma can// 'di 'dra ba yi dril bu che// tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin// de ni nang gi gzugs can bdag de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon cha// 
284b2(rgyud): thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che// rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam par bya// de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las// sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ral can dril bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par 'gyur
284b3(rgyud): rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du ni yang bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha 'gro kun// de tshe nang du mngon par gzhug/ thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las// rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje
284b4(rgyud): dril bu yang dag brten// bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan gyi sbyor bra che// dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon sum du
284b5(rgyud): bshad kyis// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis// lus can ku na gyi lus gang la// gdan ni stong phrag gnas pa ste// de rnam sa la yig dgod pa ni// ka sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin// yon+dan/ 
284b6(rgyud): la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/ khams re re la yi ge rnams// slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar bya// gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can// mtshams kun du ni gnas pa
284b7(rgyud): 'bar khams thams cad kyi bde gnas las// dpa' bo'i longs spyod 'thob par 'gyur// 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po// bdag med pa yi bdag tu bzhag/ 
284b8(rgyud): gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o// de ltar stong phrag gi ni lce// dpa' bo chen po'i go 'bang gnas// sman thams cad dang nye ba'i yin// sbas pa'i bcud len gsungs pa'o// phyi rol rnams kyi'ang yi ge/ 
285a1(rgyud): / bdag / de'i ming nyid du shes par bya// me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi// dang po'i mngon stong phrag can// de rnams kyi ni bcud len bsgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur// ji lta'i rim pa
285a2(rgyud): rigs sogs kyi// ka sogs thams cad sman tshon te// las smra ba yi rgyud gzhan du// der ni nges par gsal rigs pa// dang po'i mgon po rnams bsgoms nas// rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin// yang na
285a3(rgyud): grub rnal 'byor rnams kyis// bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba// des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnam pas yong sbyor las// bdud rtsi'i tshogs mtshams gzugs
285a4(rgyud): ldan pa'i// grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// 'dres pas mchod
285a5(rgyud): pa byas nas ni// grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba// ston pa rdo rje che ci lags// gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags// sprul/ pa gang du bzhud pa lags// chos nyan pa yi dus su yang // ci zhig
285a6(rgyud): gis ni brtan par byas// lha dang lha ma yin dang mi// ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong // mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsol// mngon par tshig mtshams mtshan nyid ni// ji
285a7(rgyud): ltar rim pas bshad kyi nyon// shin tu zab me'i don chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyis ma shes// sems can rnams kyi rang snang can// bdag gi nges par mdor bsdus pas// rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du// 
285a8(rgyud): khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can// lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi// grong khyer gsum rnams su 'byung ba'o// sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs// nges par las chung bar 'gro'o// yang na dus rnams
285b1(rgyud): thams cad du// ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong // sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas// sems kyang de yi gnas la'o// rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis// lha la sogs pa de rnams rmongs// de yis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// rab tu
285b2(rgyud): sbyor bas rtag tu sprul// rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul// 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste// hUM yi ge'i sgra yis ni// ston pas 'khor lo can ston byas// chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs pa ru// nyi shu'i lhan cig/ 
285b3(rgyud): skyes gdan du// ngag gi spyod pas mnyan par byed// der song nas ni de la thim// de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi// slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya// rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid// de'i mtshan nyid bshad par
285b4(rgyud): bya/ sems can kun la phan bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ni steng nyid dang // sngags dang rgyud kyis sbyor ba shes// sbyor ba bzo dadang sgyu rtsal sogs// 'thun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la// bu gcig
285b5(rgyud): pa ltar 'thun pa dang // gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhol// ji ltar smras pa de ban na byi da// 'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i ngag/ sems can kun la thugs
285b6(rgyud): brtse dang // lam du 'dzud pa de mthar phyir// kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang // bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol son// mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma// phyag rgya brda' ni byed pa po// de sogs yon tan rnams kyis
285b7(rgyud): gang / skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs// rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbu su// rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste// bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma// sgra rnams su ni sgra yis shes// rdo rje
285b8(rgyud): mdzad can khyab bdag/ 'phos pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes// dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin no// sems kyi nyam su myong ba ni// de phyir srin phra me'i rang bzhin// spar sha'i khamasu yang dag grags// de nyid kyis ni
286a1(rgyud): / khyer nas 'ongs// mkha' gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par// sa gsum de yi rang bzhin pas// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo// shing rtsin gzhan ni sog ma bzhin// 'di yis bgrod pa ma shes pas// byis pa
286a2(rgyud): mi shes pa yis bcings// mtha' yi bde ba gsung ba'o// bstan pa ston pa rdo rje 'chang // lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po// bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// 
286a3(rgyud): de nas gang gis sgrub pa po// 'grub pa'i bsam med sbyor bshad pa// de ni shin bzang rab sbyor bas// spyod dang rtul zhugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa// dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes
286a4(rgyud): bya/ phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid// spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags // kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la// dbang po grong khyer yang dag rten// grong de rnamasu spyod pa yang // yid kyis brtul zhugs bltan
286a5(rgyud): par bya// srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gang der bdag nyi da kyis 'gro bya// bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can// yang / dag me long la mthong 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas/ 
286a6(rgyud): lus ni lus la thim par gyis// sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas// phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags// phyag rgya lnga sogs lus la gnas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// bdud rtsi la sogs pa za// lhon cig
286a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rol ldan// chags pa'i sems kyis sgom pa ste// mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis// yid 'di la ni gos pa med// 'jigs med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan mo dur khrod
286a8(rgyud): sogs par 'gro/ sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na// rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya// blo ldan spyod dang rtul zhugs ni// bde ba can du de rtsen to// dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas/ phyi nas yid kyi rab tu bshad// srog zad ni mnyam
286b1(rgyud): sbyor bas// dbang po'i grong khyer bde ba yis// ye shes spyod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi ni// khyad par bshad kyis
286b2(rgyud): mnyan par gyis// rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas// de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la dang po lnga dang bdun// brgyad dang bcu gsum bco lnga dang // bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ 
286b3(rgyud): tha skar la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams tshegasu dran par bya// bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum// gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin// bang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum// mi yi tshegasu dran par bya// gsum pa dang ni bcu
286b4(rgyud): nyid dang // dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa/ bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grogs pa// srin po'i rigasu dran par bya// ra rigs gsum dang brgyad pa dang // klu ni bzhi
286b5(rgyud): dang lnga pa'o// drug pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// khyi yi dngos por bshad pa'o// / bcu dang bcu gcig byi ba ste/ byi lha de bzhin dgu pa'o// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// rtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o// bcu gnyis
286b6(rgyud): padang nyi shu lnga// khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob bo// thog ma tha ma bong bu yi/ rigasu de rnams rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// de na ma her mngon par brjod// thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug// rta yi rig
286b7(rgyud): su rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis// spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin// glang po yi ni rigasu 'gro// nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bzhi// mi ste stobs ni che ba yin// nyi shu gcig
286b8(rgyud): pa sre mo ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad// stobs dang bdag byed pa'i sgra skar// bshad kyis da lta mnyan par gyis// mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te// gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa yin// skar mar dus kyi
287a1(rgyud): // rtsa son par// 'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi// lug dang srang dang karka Da/ chu srin mthon po la dran pa// kin+da bum seng khyu mchog ni// brtan pa'i bya bar rab tu bstan// nya dang la khrig pa de bzhin 'di / 
287a2(rgyud): gzhu dang bu mo 'dren ma la'o// bla ma nyi ma sa'i skyes bu// ngan spong rA hu zla bud med// gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste// mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin// de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du// byang chub
287a3(rgyud): sras po mi 'gyu ro// rdo rje bzang por de bshad do// rab sbyor rnams pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems// dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan// byang chub sa bon rnams 'bab pa// byang chub sems nas
287a4(rgyud): kyi rig so// snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni// las kyi nyo ma mdzag pa yin/ yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan// rigs med rigs can kyang med dro// srid par rtse mo tsam du ni// bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa
287a5(rgyud): me long gi ni yul la zugs// gang 'dra mthong ste de med do// de 'drar byang chu/ ba sems dpa' rnams// bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can// / de yi nang du zhu ba'i sems// de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod ni// 
287a6(rgyud): nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbusu// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yin// gsang sngags mched pa sngon gyi can// dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid// dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs// 
287a7(rgyud): byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che// bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis// bde kun bdag nyid du skyed bshad// don dam pa yi
287a8(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyi rab 'jug pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// sa rnam la ni rab tu bshad// 'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo/ 
287b1(rgyud): ni/ sa yi dbus bya ba yin// thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya// de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni// srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can// yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po na// spangs nA/ 
287b2(rgyud): dbus ma'i gnas pa yin// stong par nges par thim byas nas// 'og dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru// rnal 'byor dbang phyug de srid ded// khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la// sems kyi
287b3(rgyud): spyod pa can ci smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa// dpa' bo chen po'i don can no// dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yi// bsnun dang sgrub pa la sogs spangs// 'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni// nyi ma dang po zad
287b4(rgyud): mod can// rdo rje'i lam nas langs pa'i sems// gang phyir brgyud pa'i rim dpas so// de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir// rtse ba'i sngags sogadas re'u mig can// dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams// sngags
287b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo 'god par bya// ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams// bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son// gang zhig gang gi mi nga sngon gyis// de dang de yi gnasu bri// gzhin gyi sngags kun
287b6(rgyud): 'di rnams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// skra la sogs pa'i bzlas kun dang // de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa can// sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang // de bzhin ye shes sogs
287b7(rgyud): bzlas can// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// de nas dpa' bos 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs byed chen po dbus rnamasu// me yi gzug can bsgom par bya// shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis// 'byung
287b8(rgyud): po'i tshogs de kun spyod pa// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang // drag po rengs par byed yi ge/ las dang rjes 'thun gzugs bsgoms te// 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod pa// 'chi ba slu zhing de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor
288a1(rgyud): // dang ni ldan par 'gro// nA da nA dar 'dzem bya zhing // thig le thig ler thim par bya// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bus gang ba// 'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis// 
288a2(rgyud): rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de// oM hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mtho'// ji lta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o// na ma/ shrI badz+ra DA kau ma hA bI ra bI re shwa ra ya/ ti b+hu wa na gaM ba kaM pA pa nA ya/ daMSh+To t+ka ta b+hI Sha Na b+hai ra bA ya/ sha ta sa ha
288a3(rgyud): sra ne tA ya/ bi d+yud dzi hA ya/ kaM kA la mA lA b+ha ra NA ya/ ko Ti la kA b+hu dzA ya/ dzA lA ba lI D+ha lag nA ya/ pa ru pu bA sho d+ya te shU lA la/ kalpAn tA d+ha mu gra ba pu tra ya/ pi ka Ta mu kha hA hA ra bA ya/ mA tri ga Na pa ri pU ri
288a4(rgyud): ta man+ta ye/ sa ha dza su nad ri bal+li b+ha ka rA ya/ hUM hU kA ro tsA ra Na mu khA ya/ ma hA sh+ma sha na pri yA ya/ sarba b+ha ta saM tra sa na ka rA ya/ ma da hI ka lpan+na gI te dzA ya/ dza Ta ka lA pa/ ma ku TA ya/ kha T+wAM ga ka pA la shU la/ 
288a5(rgyud): b+hin na d+hi ri Ne/ ma hA sa mu dra me kha lA ya/ b+ha g+ha tsarma ma ba ra d+ha NaM/ be tA la saM g+ha mardan ka rA ya/ ma hA bag+h+na ni bA ri Ne/ sha twA ni sum+b+ha ka rA ya/ tra sa he sra ma hA sA ha sr-i ka ro mA ba l+yAn+tarba rti ne/ sha/ 
288a6(rgyud): ta sa ha sra mu khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra pra b+hA ya/ ma hA pi shi ta ru d+hi ro ba sa hA ri ti Ni/ sarba mA ra ba la d+he si te/ sriSh+Ti saM hA ri kA ra kA ya/ sarba nA gA nA sho Sha Na stam+b+ha na bi drA ba NA ya/ an+ta mA la d+hA ri Ne/ su me ru ka pi ta nA
288a7(rgyud): dA ya/ kro d+ha bi gra ha d+ha ra NA ya/ ma hA kA she ti la kA ta ma ne/ bud+d+ha ko Ti sa ha sra kA NA ni ya/ dz+nyA nA mri ta baR+ShA pa NA ya/ sarba karma pre bar+t+ti nA ya ne/ ban+d+ha na ka rA ya/ sarbaM bi kalpa b+hany+dza na ka rA ya/ mun+ni ba li lagA sha ri rA ya/ 
288a8(rgyud): par kri ta yan+t+ra man+ta nI sha nA ya/ ma hA rak+ShA ka rA ya/ duSh+TA nA bi da la ne/ d+harmod ya ka rA ya/ kro d+hi s+pha ra sA ra NA ya/ in+d+ra dza la sarba satwA ta ma ne/ gr-i sta bA da pra bA/ da ma hA ma te// de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang
288b1(rgyud): / rab tu mang ba rgya che'o// sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming // sems can ming gis shes par bya// sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// khams gsum rnam su yongs bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
288b2(rgyud): pa kun gyi gtso// bcom ldan sngags pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o// // de nas mig la sogs dbang po// kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad// mig mi bzang gi rab sbyor bas/ 
288b3(rgyud): rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub pa// gang du byang chub sems gnas pas// der ni mig gis nges par lta/ rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog/ sems ni mig tu shes par bya/ rnga rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas// sor rlung ni
288b4(rgyud): dbab par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes dus// de yo ngasu thim nas 'gro/ dron mngon shes mig rnams kyi// sems 'di yis ni 'gro bar 'gyur// skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs/ yid kyis sgra ni nyan par
288b5(rgyud): 'gyur 'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni// lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya// lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bas// lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis// / lho yi mngon shes la brten nas// dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin/ 
288b6(rgyud): lus kyi reg pa'i rnam pa yis// mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya// sngon gyi bag chags dran pa la// de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro// nyin zhog mtshan mo mnyam byas nas// chu tshod drug cu nyid dang ni// chu'i srang
288b7(rgyud): drug cu tham pa dang // g+ha Ti kar yang sbyar bar bya// rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la// dbang su sor brgyad nyid yin te/ guny+dza drug cu'i tshad la ni// sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o// skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // 
288b8(rgyud): kASh+TaM mig btsums phye ba dang // se gol gtogs par shes bya ste// dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes pas so// pha rol phyin drug tshul bdag gis// chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya/ dus dang dus min sel ba'o// 
289a1(rgyud): // mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// mtshon cha tshan nyid rnal 'byor ma'i/ dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te// srog chags rnams kyis gang grod pa// bdag/ 
289a2(rgyud): med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur// 'dud pa rnams kyi phrad pas gnas// gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can// chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gror de
289a3(rgyud): shes bya// thur sel lam la rtag rten nas// slar yang re re'i nang du ste// srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis// mig ni lnga ru shes par bya// 'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag/ ye shes mkha'agro ma'i sbyor ldan// sa
289a4(rgyud): bon lnga rnams thig le yi// mngon shes byed pa sogs lnga da // de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor/ kun gyi mchog yin no// dngos po'i rang shes can ma lus// ring du yongs
289a5(rgyud): su spangs pa yin// thams cad lusu mnyam sbyor las/ lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa// dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa// bcom ldan mig gi 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed
289a6(rgyud): pa bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha mos phyog byas nas// de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas// stobs po che'i sbyin sreg ni// bdag po chen pos bstan du gsol// mkhas pas rgyun tu nang bdag gi// sbyin sreg
289a7(rgyud): bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas// khams rnams kun gyis dgang blag te// bde ba thab tu yang dag thob// nyi zla dgang gzar blag gzar ro// slob dpon gnyis med de med la// yang dag
289a8(rgyud): rig pa'i gzugasu sreg/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di med// gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do// yab shing rtsa ru yang dag grags// gang phyir sa li las skyes 'bras// tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin// 'di ru mar
289b1(rgyud): ni byang chub sems// khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes par bya// srogs sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o// gcin dang bshang ba dag de ltar// tsan dan dang ni gla rtsi'o// me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags// mchil ma lud pa 'bras
289b2(rgyud): / thug yin// bud shing so sems can rus pa'o// mdor bsdus pa yis lpags pa gos// me yis thab kyi dbus su ni// skra dang ba s+phu lha ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra me'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'bru ste de
289b3(rgyud): la sregs// rim gyis mkha'agro rdzogs son pa// mes gang ba'i sregs blugasu shes bya// dbang po thams cad gar byed de// de yis bag chags klu len no// sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo// snying rje sogs
289b4(rgyud): bas ston mo yin// srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi// stob sa po che ni bsgom par bya// las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ni// des mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog gi
289b5(rgyud): khams kun tu// yid ni de ru yang dag rol// gang tshe'i dus su/ bde gyur pa// de'i dusu rab tu gnas// sbyin sreg nang bdag/ nyid mthong bas// rmod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten
289b6(rgyud): 'das ye shes// de rnam dbus mar thob par bya// 'tshams rnam kun tu khong khro ba// sems chen po ni bsod par 'gyur// rtog pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni// de las byung ba bza' bar bya// mtshon bya mtshon
289b7(rgyud): byed rab bcom pas// gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni// de la thim par byed par 'gyur// kham kun yang dag sbyor ba las// ye shes gnyis byar med mtshan nyid// me
289b8(rgyud): yi gzugasu rtag bzhug pa'i// bcom ldan thab khung gis 'odi gsung // zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje bad 'du ba// ji bzhin bshad kyi mnyan par gyis// rin chen rdo rje
290a1(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// a ba d+hU ti can dngos grub/ rnal 'byor ma la yang dag rol// don dam pa yi nyams la gnas// de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni// gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyur ro// lus kyi
290a2(rgyud): nyam su mong bzhin pa// byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'od// ha yig drug dang ldan pa yi// sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod// a pa d+hU ti'i rtsal 'bab ste// steng du kha ltas dpral bar bson// srung ba'i dus blo ldan gyis
290a3(rgyud): rang gis lag pas rdo rje bzung // byang chub sems la rtsen byed la// rgas dang 'chi ba ring ba yin// srin pa'i skyon las goms pa yis// srid gsum de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas// nyin
290a4(rgyud): re re bsgrub par bya// de'i dusu gang mthong ba// dngos po kun la ltung dbar bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid// rtag tu bdag nyi du la 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du// bstan pa bsten pa
290a5(rgyud): por 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni// sems can don ni nges par bya// sku bzhi po yi rnal 'byor gyis// bden min bdag/ gis bshad mi bya// rin chen rje'i rang bzhin can// sbyor bskyis ye she
290a6(rgyud): gyen du bgrod// pho nya rnams kyi gtso nyid pa// 'dod chags me yis dgyes par bya// byang chub sems ni rtag bzung ba// lce yis pa yis lag pas min// lhan skyes 'phros pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mkha' lding phyag rgya
290a7(rgyud): nyid kyi gzung // phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te// de nas gtung bar bya ba yin// stobs thams cad kyang bza' bar bya// sA li skyes sogs 'bad pas so// sprin srog kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sogs pa gang gang
290a8(rgyud): byed/ de do'i thod par bya ba ste/ de nas sa bon 'dab par bya// de rnams rdzas kyi spang ba dang // gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya// de yos bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyur// ril bu'am ni skud
290b1(rgyud): pani/ dpa' bo rang nyid gis gsungs pa'o// b+ha ga'i dbus rnamasu bsgos pa'o// rin chen rdo rje can de sman// dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi ste// sprangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin// gang dang gang gi las kyi ni/ deng / 
290b2(rgyud): dor ming can sngags so// sa bon kun gyi yongs sbyor las// de ni rtag tu sman rnams te/ bcom ldan las kyi phyag rgya ni// rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o// 
290b3(rgyud): de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i// mkha' gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas// pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya// ha yig skye gnas dbus te// ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o// gri yig
290b4(rgyud): dbu ma'i pad+mar te/ wa yi yi ge snying kha ru/ rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa// dbyangs can mo dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid na thams cad 'brog/ gang yin gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur/ mgrin pa
290b5(rgyud): rtag tu tshigs bcad ni// mgrin par ngag tu gnas pa nyid// cho ba d+hA yi dbyibs 'dir ni// gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin// de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba/ sngon du ma'i gdan du'o// nyid rdo rje sems
290b6(rgyud): dpa' ste// khams gsum por ni bskor bar 'gyur// na mkhar nyi mas mdzes byas nas// byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs// rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog/ sems can
290b7(rgyud): kun gyi rmongs nyid dang // lam thong ba ni thams cad la// de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar// mtshon mo'i mun pa drag po phrog/ rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par// rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin// gang gi sangs rgyasu
290b8(rgyud): 'gro ba/ sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur// bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te/ sprin la sogs pa'ang nyams par 'gyur// kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par byed// rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid/ 
291a1(rgyud): mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du/ thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur// khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis// de tshes 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag med 'di rnams de lnga mo// yan lag gcig
291a2(rgyud): gis rol bar byed// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste// sbyin sreg a ga sog de bzhin// ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod chags kyi ni 'dod chags bsgo// me yis tshig la gdung
291a3(rgyud): bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags// bsten par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo // de nyid thab so yod kyi los// dge ba'i mtshan nyid can pa'o// nang du byed pa ma yin te// gus pa'i yid kyis dbu mar gnas// 
291a4(rgyud): rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes// de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje'am nga bsogs// sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba// de na dmas spangs pas sangs rgyas med// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas
291a5(rgyud): par kun tu dbye ba yod pa yin// lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste/ tshadam pa rnams tho co can// thams cad tshig ni rnam/ shes pas// ye shes can rnams de'i phye shes// mkha 'gro thams
291a6(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor las// na mkha' rnamasu bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par// rtag tu zhug pas 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan/ ba
291a7(rgyud): kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// na mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid de// 'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnamasu// gang zhig stong pa de srog chag khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste/ dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag
291a8(rgyud): gnas/ zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'o// rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/ rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang // de ni rab 'joms la brjod do// dus thams cad du g.yo ba med// g.yo ba 'am 'dir
291b1(rgyud): ni mi mthong ngo // don thams cad bdag nyid rlung // bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o// do lA hA ra sogs sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster po// sgra dang thig ler de shes bya/ 'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum// 
291b2(rgyud): de phyir na mkha'i snying po yang // mkha' gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya// rang gi dbu ma'i sbyor ba yis// srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin// de yang kun bzhi shes bya ste// me long du yang rab tu bshad// chos
291b3(rgyud): kyai sku la sogs pa'ang de// dmya la sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag med
291b4(rgyud): 'pho'i de'i dus rnam par bzhag med 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis dpas bgrod bya min// na mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi// de yi snying por rab tu bstan// de dag shes rab thabs gnyis// 
291b5(rgyud): gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do// srid pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyud// dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas 'dzi/ ga rten mtha' yas rnams// sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur// de ltar
291b6(rgyud): rnam bcas de nyid dang / rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun// gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur// dbu mar blta rnams kyis 'grub ste// ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa
291b7(rgyud): gal te sangs rgyas rjes chag yod// chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// tshul mtshan chos de 'dod pa dang // gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag
291b8(rgyud): nyid can// gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag/ tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mang smra bas ci bya ste// chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo // na mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa
292a1(rgyud): / bsgom par bya// shen pa smig ma mkhan la sogs/ bsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa// de kun do'i gnas nyams dga' bar// lam rjes skyobs rnams kyi grol 'thob/ nges par dkyil 'khor
292a2(rgyud): dbus rnamasu// gzugasu bsdoms pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob// rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid// stong nyid snying po gcig pu pa// bcom
292a3(rgyud): ldan rab 'joms rnam pa yi// rnal 'byor la shugs pas 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// // de nas lha mos mchod pas te// phyag byas nas ni 'di gsol to// rang gi rig
292a4(rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod// rang rig ye shes las byung ba// ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod par ra
292a5(rgyud): dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas// ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis pa ra na mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsum par mda'i dbyibs dang
292a6(rgyud): 'drang bzhi par dben gyi gzugs cano// lnga par rtse me lnga'i bdag nyid// drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin// bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs// brgyad par pad+mar brjod pa yin// dgu pa ru ni bcud len te// bcu
292a7(rgyud): par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste// bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no// bco lnga pa nyid ra hu ste// thig le zhes byas
292a8(rgyud): bcu drug po// rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni// rang gi rig par shes par bya// dpal he ru ka yi spyod pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi rnamasu sgrub bya// rgas pa med cing 'chi ba med// nad dang mdze sogs spang ba yin// lte bar
292b1(rgyud): shrI ya~M yi ger gyur// he yig snying khar dgod par bya// ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste// thod par ka yi yi ge'o// thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni
292b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med// gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid// dbu ma'i nang du rab tu bzhugs// 'khor lo bzhi yi mdape son nas// rang gis rig pa mthara' yas mchog/ rigs de rnal 'byor ma
292b3(rgyud): rnams kyi// byung bar rnam par shes par bya// sems chen po ni sang bzhin pas// don yod mthong bas 'thob par 'gyur/ rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du nges par gnas/ longs spyod sprul po'i mam
292b4(rgyud): nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong // bzhi pa rab mang bdag me dad pa// de phyir de rnams mtha' longs spyod// de ltar 'khor lo ga shing gnas nas// nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab de
292b5(rgyud): nyid rtogs byas nas// nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can// rdul gyi sbyor ba/ 'byung ba ste/ nag po'i phyogasu gang 'dor yang // bcu drug rnam sa kyi cha rnams kyi// nyi ma nyid ni bar bar du'o// stong nyid snying rje'i
292b6(rgyud): sbyor ba las// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus rnamasu// dpal he ru ka bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gnas skabs thad
292b7(rgyud): yang dag sbyor// gtso bo rang rigs bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar// rtag tu bzhags pas 'di gsung sa// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas lus sogs lha rnam
292b8(rgyud): kyis/ ston mo mngon par bshad par bya// pad+ma gar dbang phyug nyid kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung ngo // rtsa ni pad+mar yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis gor byed do// byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste// de rnams kyi ni
293a1(rgyud): // nang du bzhugs// rang gis rig pa bza' bar bya// snying rje la ba yis gtung bar bya// gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol// sgyu ma'i rjesu 'gro rnams 'grub/ thams cad de'i rang bzhin du/ bza' ba bza' ba med par
293a2(rgyud): byaHpad+ma gar dbang bsgom bya ste// ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya// pa yig gzhan gyi grong du 'gro// brtan pa thams cad tA yi yig/ na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te/ rta yig bde ba'i lha can yin// shwa yig rta la sogs
293a3(rgyud): pa'i stobs// ra yig dga' rol rgyu can yin// srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la// de yis rab tu sbyor bar bya// mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun// bde mchog phyi mar shes par bya// bgrod pa 'di rnams la rten nas// pad+ma gar
293a4(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug rang / he rukadang bde mchog nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' se/ gas gtso bo// pad+ma gar dbang phyug de yang // sbyor ba kun la shes par bya// pad+ma ye shes yang dag grags// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes
293a5(rgyud): can gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung // lha kun 'dir ni byung ba/ yin// shes po thams cad de la gnas// khams gsum/ du ni gar dbang phyug/ gar byed pa yi sku chen la// de nas rtags ni mtshe/ 
293a6(rgyud): par bya// na mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yin// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbusasu// lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol par gyis// 'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las// de rnams kyis ni dga' bar byed// 
293a7(rgyud): gang dang gang gis las rnams la// de dang de'i rabasgom par bya// sgrub po rnams kyi byang chub rtser// sangs rgyas thams cad du 'ong // de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas// gar byed bzhin pas pad+ma 'dzin// sdig pa thams
293a8(rgyud): cad rab 'joms shing // tshe son pa rnams gnas par byed// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur cing // rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid pa spyod// rang gis sems kyis dngos grub 'bob// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// gzhan/ 
293b1(rgyud): du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// sems can thams cad rab 'jug pa// 'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams// bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug pa// bag chags nang pa yongs spang nas// phyi nas rang bzhin bstan par ba/ 
293b2(rgyud): bza' ba thams cad mnyam sgor las// bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas// bcom ldan pad+ma gar mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pas 'od gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
293b3(rgyud): de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon// gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang // de ni ye shes chen por brjod// rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin// sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no// 
293b4(rgyud): spu khung rtse mo thams cad las// de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po// de rnams bu gar rab tu zhugs pa// 'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son// ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa// de bzhin du ni khams
293b5(rgyud): la zhugs// g.yo ba 'gog par byas pa yis// de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// gang mthong ba ni de mthong nyid// gdong gi/ gdong ni blta bar gyis// mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi// gzugs ni
293b6(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dab chu bzhin// srog chen po der shes bya ste/ shi ba'i dus las nges par 'thon// a gi yi ge yid la bya// dbus rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya// bdag nyid kyis ni hUM yig spro// gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan// 
293b7(rgyud): sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur// lus la gnas par mtshon par bya// haM yig mchog gi dang po yis// ye shes dngos po rnamasu sprul// chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus su// rnam snang mdzad kyi sgom pa'o// bdud
293b8(rgyud): tshe'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis/ sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya/ bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni// rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur/ 'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste/ 'dod na bde ba rnam par spro// de tshe rnal 'byor ma
294a1(rgyud): // mnyes nas// dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed// sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pa// rnal 'byor ma la mi bya'o// myur bar stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya// sna tshogs du ma'i
294a2(rgyud): skad kyis chos// de rnams lus ris can gyis nyan// rnam snang mdzad deng mi bskyod dang // rin chen dbang A re li ka/ don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs// shes rabo pha rol byon sogs
294a3(rgyud): kyang / de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig/ 'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang // bde 'gro rnamasu 'jug pa'o// blo ldan so sor sems can don// gnyis med dngos por byed par 'gyur// mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don
294a4(rgyud): du/ tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya// khams thams cad kyi til dmar ni// dogs pa med pas bya ba yin// rnam snang sbyor bas btung ba 'am// byug pa'ang de nyid kyis bya'o// de yis sna nas sbyin/ 
294a5(rgyud): par bya/ rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o// rdo rje 'chang gi gzugasu 'gyurarnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong // gnyis pa thams cad kun sbyor las// rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stsol// bcom ldan
294a6(rgyud): thams cad dag pa'i sku// rab grol mdzad pa 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas gsang chen bshad pa ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas pa min// rdo rje sems dpa'i
294a7(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// gnas thams cad du yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje mi byed ye shes te// sems dpa' snying po ston pa'o// stong nyid snying rje dbyer mdo pa/ snying rje sems dpar rab tu grags/ zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ 
294a8(rgyud): gnas rnams bgrod pa bstan par bya/ pu li'i ra las lte bar 'bab/ dz+wa lan d+ha ra ra yang dag gnas// su ran du ni kun tu spyod// ar bu der bza' ba dang tu can no// gong ba rir rol pa ste/ ra me shA ri rgyal/ 
294b1(rgyud): dang pa ma// de bi ko Ti ri rjesu 'dzin// mA la wer rnal 'byor ma'i gtso// kA ma ru bar tshig 'grub bo// o Der mngon sum dngos grub ste// tri sha kunar dbang rnams kyi// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ ko sa lar rnal
294b2(rgyud): 'byor dngos grub ste// ka ling kar phra me'i dngos grub skye// lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub// kAny+dzi bsad pa'i dngos grub bo// hi ma la yar 'thun pa 'grub// pre ta pu rir rang gi lta ba/ gri ha de ba tar bkas gnang ba// 
294b3(rgyud): lhan skyes 'pho med so raSh+Ta ra// gser gling du ni rang don 'grub// nA ga rer gnas kyi dngos grub ster// sin d+har stobs 'grub de bzhin du// ma rung 'chi med dngos grub bo// ku lu tar rang bzhin dngos grub tu// de nyid
294b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams la skye// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas// thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos// gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma dbus// khamasu gyur pa'i ro chen po// gsang ba'i tshig
294b5(rgyud): tu shes par bya// mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran// dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste/ thams cad bdag nyid yon gnas// rtog bzhugs gnyis med rnam pa ste/ sems can 'jig rten
294b6(rgyud): las ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis// nA de'i dbus las yang dag byung // de nyid du ni thims nas 'gro// gnas par de ni mngon par brjod// de ltar thams cad cho ga bzhin/ 
294b7(rgyud): dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag/ de ni nus par rab tu bshad// skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i// nus pa thams cad rab 'jug gis// dngos med ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis/ 
294b8(rgyud): dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa// thig lo'i gzugs ni sems dpa' che/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi gso// sgyu ma'i
295a1(rgyud): / gnas kyi dngos grub ni// 'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de ltar dpa' bo gcam
295a2(rgyud): yi las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya// nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'// thams cad gsang chen gyi gnas// gsang chen rgyas par bshad pa can// kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bshad khams kyi 'du
295a3(rgyud): shes ni// gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnams can// de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya// dpa'o nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi// re re'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// zlum po'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// thig
295a4(rgyud): le nyid ni bzhag par bya// de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// bskor dbas ting 'dzin rdo rje 'gyur// shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du// rdo rje'i 'khor lo sogs par 'pho// dkyil 'khor du ni lha tha~Md// 
295a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya// bdun cu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya// nyi na zhag rnamasu yongs 'pho bya// re re yi ni srog 'gyur ba// sum cu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni// nyin zhag
295a6(rgyud): la ni shes par bya// lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa// de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/ rnal 'byor de dngos bsgom rnams la// sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor// 'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo rnams// gnas sogs
295a7(rgyud): nyi shu bzhi can la// thi dang long spyod bdag bye bas// dus dang dus tshod za bar byed// 'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin// rnal 'byor ma chog dang dpa' bo// de ni bdag dang bdag gi rim bzhin no// sangs
295a8(rgyud): rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du// bdag dang bdag gi spyod yul med// yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa// gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o// de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten mongs de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas
