295b1(rgyud): / dngos grub mi 'thob bo// rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du// de dang de yi mchog ye shes/ 'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni// sgyu ma'i 'jig rten la bshad do// kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig pur bstan// 
295b2(rgyud): lha dang lha minas gsum 'joms pa la phyag che la// dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi shes te// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par gyis// gang zhig las thams cad pa'i gzugasu bsgom par byas/ 
295b3(rgyud): srid dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa ga la ci// sgyu ma gti mug gis ni ri mor gnas// sems can thig pa da dung nyams par ga la byed// de ltar yongasu dgyes pa'i mgur bcom ldan rang nyid kyis gsungs so// de
295b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// byang chub dus blang bar gyis// dpa'o// thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bdo pa'i ma chog/ rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos
295b5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyu/ da kyi rgyal po las de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud/ thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang chen thams cad pa zhes bya
295b6(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang // rdo rje mkha'agro khyab pa'i bdag/ bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa// khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul/ 
295b7(rgyud): dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can// dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs// chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur// chos dang chos min pa yi gzugs// chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis med// bdag gis sprul
295b8(rgyud): pa'i dngos po yis// 'jig rten kun gyi'ang 'don can te// bdag nyid chen po ster ba po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa// khyod kyis dam tshig bsten pa ste// gzhan min dam tshig nyid las byung // bdag gis
296a1(rgyud): / bsod nams rjes sgom pas// byang chub tu ni yid bsgrubs so// ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs// de yis sems can don mdzad pa'o// hUM gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// nga rgyal can gyi bgegs
296a2(rgyud): skrag 'gyur// khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni// de rnams la ni skye 'chi med// bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du brtsen// byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod// khyod dang thabs gcig 'dres par 'gyur// gong bu gcig tu gnyis med
296a3(rgyud): bzhugs// de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che// mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad// dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid// mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed// phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas// gnas pa yi ni mchod
296a4(rgyud): par dran// bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa// gnyis med mchod dpa gsum pa'o// bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag/ 'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa'o// de lta'i mchod pa la brten nas/ 
296a5(rgyud): thams cad byas pas las rgyal por// 'gyuraro rdo rje mkha 'gro na/ gru gsum du ni mnyes pa ste// sngon du dkyil 'khor byas na sa ni// lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du// pad+ma yi ni bskor
296a6(rgyud): nas snod// sdog pa rnams kyis bzung bar bya// sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni// skra grol ba yis gtor mo sbyin// rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni// kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya// de yi lag par son pa'i dpal/ 
296a7(rgyud): gang su yis kyang dbrog mi nus// ji ltar bde bas bde ba bzung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya// sman gyi spyod pa'ang bsten par bya// snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur/ 
296a8(rgyud): byazhing / dbang po rnams ni mi rtag par// bsgom pa snang ba med pa yis// rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas/ rdo rje pad+ma snyoms la gro bas/ phyag rgya ning gi bdag nyid mchog/ stong pa nyid gnyis med rnal 'khyer
296b1(rgyud): pas// dngos po thams cad spang bar bya// don dam can de nyid 'dir bya// rtag tu byang chub sems dran pa// man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis// man ngag thams cad mtshon par bya// ji ltar sa cig thob pa yis// sa thams
296b2(rgyud): cad ni thob par 'gyur// de bzhin man ngag thams cad kyang // man ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur// byis pa rnams dang rgan po dang // rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du// mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// 
296b3(rgyud): mkhas pa yI ni bya ba yin// mi mnyam pa yis dngos grub 'joms// dmyal ba la sogs ltung bar 'gyur// rgan po yon kun gnas pa// de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ster// khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir// byis/ 
296b4(rgyud): pa rnams dang de bzhin yang // gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// me tog bskor ba la sogs bya// kun tu smod pa'i ngag mi bya/ 'dod na da'adod min sbyor bral ba// mabyin par yang blang bya zhing // rtag tu srog
296b5(rgyud): chags bsad par bya// sems can rnams la brdzun smra zhing // ma sogs rnal 'byor ma la bgrod// 'khor lo mchod pa rgyun tu bya// bza' bya lnga la sogs pa sprin// de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa// dus tha
296b6(rgyud): du bgegs med dang // grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong bas// bsam pa gzhan ni rab tu 'jug dpa' bo thad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rdo rje mkha'i grwa de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos
296b7(rgyud): 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las bstod pa dang // mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyisu med pa'i dam tshig bsten pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // rgyud 'di
296b8(rgyud): rab tu byung ba ni/ ma byu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ mtshan nyid thams cad yong su rdzogs/ mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spa sa/ sum cu bdun bdag nyid rnal 'byor/ gnyis med ma 'a 'gro rgya mtsho dang / dra ba'i rgyud ni rgyud chen
297a1(rgyud): / po 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs can te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// dus thams cad du zhal na gnas// yi ge kun gyi za ma tog/ 'bum phrag sum cu drug dang po// mkha 'gro rgya mtsho rab bshad/ 
297a2(rgyud): chen por chung ngur gsungs pa'o// ri rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi// mkha 'gro thams cad kyis gsung so// mtha' yas shing ni mu med nyid// rtsod pa'i dus kyi sa'i nang du// bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs// shAkya seng ges
297a3(rgyud): gsungs pa'i rgyud// rnal 'byor pha rol son pa'o// nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de// 'chang po skye bo gzhan kyang ngo // legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba'i// de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnas
297a4(rgyud): kyis bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo// ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis// rdo rje'i gnas rnamasu bsdu so// gcig la gcig gis/ bzhed pa ni// gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs mdzad// bcom
297a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// tshig 'di la ni mngon par dga'// sI ga pa rnams las grol bar 'gro// srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos// dpa' bo thad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 
297a6(rgyud): rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// dpal mkha'agro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang // ye shes dang / sdom pa dang / bya ba dang / 
297a7(rgyud): de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / mkha'agro rgya mtsho las 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzog so// // dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i/ 
297a8(rgyud): gtsug lag khang chen po rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus deng sang 'gran zla med pa// snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can / phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus
297b1(rgyud): ba'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing char gyis tshim par mdzad pa/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shAkya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong d+haR+Ya
297b2(rgyud): yon gyis mnyam cing bsgyur ba'o// phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun te/ zhus gtugs legs par bya'o// mkha' mnyam pa de rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas
297b3(rgyud): rnams kyi sku// des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bas ma dbang gis// gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'/ de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs nas// g.yul ngor 'jug
297b4(rgyud): dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam// de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brang nas/ kho bos gzhan do ngan nus min na yang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur// 'di la gzhung dang / 
297b5(rgyud): bla ma rang gis blo gros skyon gyis ni// sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // mkha' gro'i tshogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs// 
297b6(rgyud): 'di la thob pa'i dge bo dri med cung zad des// 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig/ bdag gis srol ba tod tsam 'di la// sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyis// skad gnyis smra bas gzigs pa na// skyon
297b7(rgyud): du gyur snang bcos par zhu// phrag dge sgo nas mi 'phye zhing // rje su yi rang ba yang mdzod// rdzogaso// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sam pa ro tan+t+ra rA dza sa na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba zhes
297b8(rgyud): byeba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ dpal he du la phyog 'tsha'o// di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig ma bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thoms cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo
298a1(rgyud): // b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang
298a2(rgyud): phyag bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag po gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 
298a3(rgyud): log pa thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yis// bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang // rdzogs pa yang ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan lnga las
298a4(rgyud): mnyan par 'tshal// rlung dang me dang chu dang sa// de bzhin na mkha' ji ltar lags// rnam pa lnga ni ji ltar lha// gtso bo yul drug de ba bzhin ci// phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi// sku gsum byin rlabs ji lta
298a5(rgyud): bur lha yi sku ni ji ltar lags// gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsung sa// zla ba nyi ma ci zhig lha// lam lnga po ni ji ltar lags// lus kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// de bzhin rtsa yi gzugs ni tse// 
298a6(rgyud): yi grangs kyi tshad ni du// de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci// sbas pa'i dam tshig gi ni brda// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi// gnas la sogs pa'i brda du zhig/ ji ltar sa la sogs pa
298a7(rgyud): 'thob ra mtshan ma ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur// khyed kyi las ni bcu gnyis gang // sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur// bgrang phreng dag ni ji ltar rigs// bzlas pa'i grangs ni du zhig lags// lha yi rnam
298a8(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor ci// dkyil 'khor bri ba du zhig mchis// sngags kyi dngos grub ci zhig lha// gzhon nu ma yi mchod pa ci// bya dang bya min nyi ma gang // gtso bo myos byed gtor ma ni// bdud rtsi lnga sogs ji ltar
298b1(rgyud): lha/ lcags kyu lnga sogs ji ltar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad gsol// thig gdab pa ni ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar sa ni yongasu sbyang // srung ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar 'gyur// slob dpon gyi ni bya ba gang // ji ltar sles
298b2(rgyud): ma yongasu bzung // dbang bskur ba yi grangs ni du// bzhi pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// dus kyi nges pa ji lta bu// de bzhin 'chi ba bslu ba gang // dus bzhi'i ming ni bu zhig mchis// gling bzhi pa ni ji ltar lags// dus
298b3(rgyud): dang dus min dngos grub ci// spyod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud du ni// rnal 'byor rgyud ni ji ltar 'gyur// mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du// rab gnas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin
298b4(rgyud): dang // sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur// bcud kyis len ni dzaM/ daltar lce// mos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur// gsang sngags ji ltar 'byung 'gyur lta// sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur// tshor
298b5(rgyud): bcad pa ni ci zhig lha// gtso bo rjes bzung ji lta bu// bcom ldan de nyid rnams ni tso// stong pa nyid dang snying rje gang // stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// ji ltar de bzhin nyid rang bzhin// chos rnams thad
298b6(rgyud): yongs shes pa'i// sgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs// dpal bde mchog 'byung ba'i rgyud las zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gsang ba
298b7(rgyud): 'byung ba 'di zhus pa legs so legs so// de nas de'i phyir bskyed pa yi// rim pa'i sgom pa yang dag bshad// sna tshogs las kyi rang bzhin gyis// skye gnas bzhi po rnamasu 'gyur// sgong skyes mngal
298b8(rgyud): nas skyes pa dang // drod gsher dang ni brdzus skyes rnams// dang po khrung khrung rma bya dang // ne tse bzhad tshogs sgong skyes te// glang po ma he ba lang rta// bong bu mo sogs mngal nas skyes// srin bu 'bru dang phye ma len
299a1(rgyud): // nya la sogs pa drod gsher skyes/ lha dang dmyal ba'i sems can rnams// de bzhin par de'i srid pa dang / bskal pa dang po pa la sogs// 'di rnams brdzus skyes sems can no// shar gyi lus 'phags
299a2(rgyud): ba lang spyod// de bzhin byang gi sgra mi snyan// gling gsum po yi mi rnams ni// longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tshe// blan rmongs bye brag mi phyed cing // rtog med rnam par spyod med pa'o// 'dzam bu'i gling du legs skyes pa/ las
299a3(rgyud): kyi sa paro rab tu gragaso// legs byas nyes par byas pa'i las// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// skye ba sngon gyi rnam smin 'dir// skye bo rnams la snang bar 'gyur// rgyags dang ser sna gdug sems rnam so// g.yo sgyu
299a4(rgyud): mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang // chags sdang gti mug la sogs kyis// rims dang nad la sogs pas gzir// 'dzam bu gling pa'i gtso bo mchog/ yul dbus ni skyes pa ste// sngon gyi dge ba la ltos
299a5(rgyud): nas/ dbang po rno 'bring rtul por 'gyur// mi ru skyes pa 'bras bu 'dam pa dang po ste// rang gi khyim nas nges 'byung rnyed pa gnyis pa yin// rab tu byung nas dge ba sgrub pa gsum pa ste/ rtse gcig
299a6(rgyud): yid ni thob par gyur pa bzhi par gsungs// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te// thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi// bag chags rab tu bsags byas pas// de phyir sngon byas las kyis
299a7(rgyud): ni skye dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung // tshogs pa me rnyed de srid du// zhag bdun par de'i srid par gnas// srid pa bar de'i sems can ni// 'gron po'i bgrod pa ji bzhin du// 'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis// 'gro ba
299a8(rgyud): drug tu rab tu skye// pha ma'i kun sbyor sogs ni// srid pa'i skye bos mthong gyur nas// rta la zhon bzhin rnam shes ni// rlung gi gzhon pa zhon na su// skad cig thang cig nyid la ni// shin tu myur bar 'ongs gyur nas/ shin tu
299b1(rgyud): dga' dang bcas stobs kyis// kha yi lam nas 'jug par 'gyur// rtsa ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// rab bskul de yi skad cig la// a li ka li zhu byas pas// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// khu ba khrag dor
299b2(rgyud): dbus su ni// thig le'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// dang po'i rnam pa nur nur po// mer mer po ni gnyis pa yin// ltar ltar po skyes gsum pa ste/ de bzhin bzhi pa gor gor po// rlung rnams kyi ni bskul tsam gyis
299b3(rgyud): sha yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur// zla ba lnga gyur sa bon las// yan lag lnga ni rab tu skye// zla ba bdun na skra dang spu// sen mo rtags ni skye bar 'gyur// zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang // lus kyi yan lag 'byung bar 'gyur// 
299b4(rgyud): zla ba dgu na yang dag rtogs// zla ba bcu na sems dang ldan// nur nur da rang bzhin mo bskyod pa// mer mer po ni ron chen 'byung // 'od dang / dag med mgon ltar ltar po// gor gor po ni don yod grub// mkhrang
299b5(rgyud): 'gyur rnam par snang mdzad de// rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa yin// chu khrag ni mi bskyod pa// sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag med/ gong bu rin chen 'byung ldan te// ro cog 'dres pa rnam snang bzhugs
299b6(rgyud): skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas// g.yon nas khu ba zhes bshad de// g.yas nas de bzhin khrag yin no// de dag gcig tu 'dus gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin// 
299b7(rgyud): las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas// rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nasu// chos kyi 'byung gnas sgo ru ni// gdong ni nges par phyogs par 'gyur// ku ga yasu ni brten na su// cog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas// dku
299b8(rgyud): g.yon yang dag brten nas ni// shes rab stor ni mngon phyogs 'gyur// mkhas pas ben lhung ba'i rim/ sa kyi skang cig yang dag mi tshan// g.yas nas rmu ni rgyu ba gang / thams cod duni skyes bur 'gyu/ 
300a1(rgyud): g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang // nges par bud med rnams su 'gyur// gnyis ka'i dbus rgyu'i sa bon gang // rtag tu ma ning 'gyur ba'o// chu khams pa yir shes par bya// me yi khams ni ma yi'o// 
300a2(rgyud): lpags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni// ma las skyes shes bshad pa ste// rgyus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams// phe las skyes shes bshad pa yin// drug po 'di dag bsdus pa'i lus// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa// 
300a3(rgyud): gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin te// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du// phung po nges par skye ba yin// srid pa bskyed pa'i rim shes pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i phyir// 
300a4(rgyud): 'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i// de nyid gsungs pa rnams kyis bshad// 'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim pa der dbye ba ste gnyis pa'o// de nas gang zhig gshes tsam gyis// myur
300a5(rgyud): / du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la rten nas// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rdzogs pa'i byeng
300a6(rgyud): chub rim bsgrubs pas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsung so// dbang po dman pas bsnyed rim gyi// dkyil 'khor sgom zhing bsam par bya// dbang po rnon pos skad cig ni// rnam pas sems tsam dkyil
300a7(rgyud): 'khor bsam// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgoms pa ni// khams gsum gzhal yas khang bdag nyid// srog chags rnams ni dkyil 'khor ba// de dbus skad cig rnam pa
300a8(rgyud): yis// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor pa'o// oM AHhUM gi sngags kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te// mtho ris sa stengs 'og tu// skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur// skad cig rnam pas
300b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor te// skad cig rnam pas gsang sngags 'don// dbang po kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog/ khams bzhi pa dang phung po lnga// de bzhin yul drug bdag nyid ni// khrag 'thung lha
300b2(rgyud): mo'i ye shes te// de la tha dad mi brtag go// dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyas btab// de bzhin mkha' mnyam stong pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin nyid bdag nyid// thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te/ zung du 'jug
300b3(rgyud): pa rnam rtog bral// dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yin no// rnam par mi rtog sbyor bsams kyang // de tshem rtog bsam mi khyab// de yang rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa med// de nyid dngos dang
300b4(rgyud): dngos min bdag/ rtag tu srid pas 'byung bar mdzad// sna chog sa spros pa'i rtog pa med// rtag tu 'byung ba bde ba mo// skye ba me/ da pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de las skye ba yang dag 'byung // bems pa/ 
300b5(rgyud): min phyir bdag nyid rig/ mi shes rnam par mi mthong bas// gzugs med gang du'ang mi gnas shing // 'gyur po med/ cing brtan pa'o// kun rdzob skye bo 'byung bas na// chad pa min phyir/ 
300b6(rgyud): dngos med min// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang dngos su// chos thams cad lhan cig skyes// bdag byin rlab par rab 'byung ba// mi shigs 'jig pa med pa ste// skye ba med pa'i re myong bas// sgom pa yang ni de
300b7(rgyud): nyid de// stong nyid so sor rtogs pas na// bsam gtan shes rab du yang 'gyur// chos kun yongasu shes pa yi// sgom pa de nyid sgom med pa'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba che// phyag rgya chen po mchog de
300b8(rgyud): bzhin// de nyid chos la 'jug pa'i phyir// de rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa// bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gos// gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e ba ma yi ge la rab gnas/ 
301a1(rgyud): sru dang gsung dang thugs kyi las/ rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa'o// smom pa byang chub ba de mchog / bltar med brjod du med pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ 'dus pa chen po'i mchog sa/ 
301a2(rgyud): tebadag byin khri ba'i rim pa 'di// bla ma'i dran gyis gsal bar 'gyur/ 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim por bye ba ste gsum pa'o// / de nas de ba'i byung ba bzhil// mtshan
301a3(rgyud): nyid yang dag bshad par bya// dngos po dag ni ma lus gang // de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin te// sa de la ni dngos po rten// mes ni thams cad 'tshod par byed// chu yis 'ju bar byed pa ste// rlung gis lhan cig bskyod par
301a4(rgyud): byed// nam mkha' yul gyis stong par gnas// der ni thams cad de las skyes// gang du gcig ni gnas pa der// bzhi po kun kyang nye bar gro nas// rtsa shing ljon pa 'khril shing sogs// bems po lta bu'i
301a5(rgyud): rnam shes tsam// gang dag 'gro drug sems can rnams// rnam shes bcas pa lta bur gnas// de ltar srid pa'i dngos po kun// blo dang ldan pas shes par bya// sems can rnams ni 'tsho ba
301a6(rgyud): na/ yan lag nyid lag thams cad kyi// rlung gi thams cad bskyod par 'gyur// skad cig de la me drod 'dor// chu ni rtag tu bskams gyur nas// de nas tshor ba med par 'gyur// lus la sogs pa'i sa khams kyi
301a7(rgyud): sra ba nyid tsam gnas par 'gyur// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba dag/ thams cad du ni 'byung bar 'gro// lha dang lha min mo rnams ni// 'byung ba med par skye mi 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten skyong la sogs// thams cad la ni/ 
301a8(rgyud): lhan cig gnas// rig byed grub mtha' thams cad kyis// rtag tu 'dod cing sgom pa ste// gang phyir thams cad kun tu 'gro/ sa stengs skyes po kun la gnas// 'byung ba bzhi po gtso bo mchog/ bstan bcos
301b1(rgyud): kun las yang dag bshad/ rlung ni srog tu yang dag palta/ mo ni 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid de// chu ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo nyid// sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas/ de la rtag tu gnas pa'i lha// rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste// lha lnga/ 
301b2(rgyud): yi ni rnam pa ru// rnam shes don yongasu 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam par shes// me long lta bu mnyam nyid dang // sor kun tu rtog pa dang // de bzhin pa bsgrub pa dang // chos
301b3(rgyud): dbyings shin tu rnam dag ste// ye shes 'di dag rab tu gnas// rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung // 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// de bzhin mi bskyod pa nyid de// rnam lngar re cig rdzogaso byang chub// gzugs
301b4(rgyud): dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya chos de bzhin// yul drug tu ni shes bya ste// 'di dag rnam par dag par bshad// khams ni bco brgyad shes bya ste/ de dag phung po'i rang bzhin nyid// yi ge mchog
301b5(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// mi la sog/ sa po bsgom bya ste// mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni// thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnam 'phrul yin// ngo bo nyid gsum rnam dag
301b6(rgyud): don// 'od gsol ba yi go 'phang 'gyur// sgra dang rna ba rnam shes ni// dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid// sna dang dri dang rnam shes kyang // de bzhin rnam dag shes par ba// ro dang lce dang rnam shes ni// don dam nyid
301b7(rgyud): du rnam par dag/ lus dang reg pa rnam shes kyang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bor skyes// yid dang chos dang yid rnam shes// snying po nyid du rnam par dag/ rnam shes drug ni kun gzhi ru// 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa
301b8(rgyud): yin 'od gsal ba yi go 'phang thob/ he ru ka dpal yang dag gnaso// yul dang yul can sbyor ba yis// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog gnas pas// yul ni rnam dag shes
302a1(rgyud): par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// gcig la de bzhin gsum du brtags// skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum// sku gsum rnam par grol ba gsum// zhal gsum yig/ 
302a2(rgyud): gsum lha gsum te// khams gsum pa yi rang bzhin nyid// dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum// lam gsum du ni bstan pa ste// dam tshig gsum dang dge ba gsum// de bzhin skra dang gsung
302a3(rgyud): dang thugs// shes rab dang ni thabs nyid dang // de yi sbyor ba gsum pa ste// chos kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis// ji ltar gsang sum mthong ba dang // 'khor sum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// sngags gsum
302a4(rgyud): gyi ni rang nyid nyid// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi// rtsa gsum gyi ni rang dgi dngos// phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi chos// lha la sogs pa'i bad dag nyid nang // phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni sangs
302a5(rgyud): rgyas thob// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du// lha ni mngon sum dang migs par bya// rnam pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin// lha mor yongs su brtag par bya// dang po'i lha yi rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems
302a6(rgyud): dpa' rnam par bzhugs// gnas dang zhing la sogs pa'i brda'// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa// de bzhin gnyis med mnyam sbyor la// lha rnams yang dag 'phro ba ste// tshad med lha ni 'phro ba las// dkyil
302a7(rgyud): 'khor tshad can rnam par brtag/ lha yi rnal 'byor bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rol pa'ang bsam mi khyab// mkha'agro dra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor// de dag mi phyed de bo nyid// sgom
302a8(rgyud): pang yis bshad pa yin// de dag thams cad gnyis med thob// gzung dang 'dzin dang rnam bral ba// rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa ste// phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin 'gyur// bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid na// 
302b1(rgyud): 'bang mchog ces yongasu grags// 'di ni 'byung ba bzhi dang rnam pa lnga dang // yul drug lha'i rnam par dag pa rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas zla ba nyi ma yi// rab tu phye ba yang
302b2(rgyud): dag bshad// g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin rgya ba ste// g.yon du rgan nas bzung nas ni// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'jug pa'i// zla ba'i rtsa ni 'og bltas par// a li zla bar yang dag 'bab
302b3(rgyud): g.yas su lte ba nas bzung nas// rkan gyi gnasu rab 'jug pa'i// nyi ma'i ce ni steng gnas te// ka li nyi mar rtag tu 'bab// sna yi sgo ni gnyis po nas// rtsa gnyis rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa g.yon 'jug pa'i lam
302b4(rgyud): yin te// g.yas pa 'byung ba'i lam yin no// nyi shar nas brtsams ji srid de// nub kyi bar ni nyin mo ste// nub pas nas brtsams ji srid de// shar ba'i bar ni mtshan mor 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan
302b5(rgyud): mo zhag yin te// me la ci thun zhes brjod pa yin// thun bzhi nyin mor shes bya ste// de bzhin mtshan mo'ang thun bzhi po'o// zha ga gcig la ni 'pho ba yi// yan lag bcu drug rnams yin
302b6(rgyud): te/ thun ni byed phyed rtag tu rlung // sna yi bu gar yang dag rgyu// yang de'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum gyi thun phyed la/ zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste// de nas zhag gsum nyi ma'i rlung // go rims
302b7(rgyud): 'dis ni ji srid du// yar chos bcoM lnga'i bar du'o// mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum du snga dron// nyi ma'i rlung du grags pa rgyu// de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga'i bar// thun ri yo ni bzhi cha
302b8(rgyud): rnams// chu tshod du ni brjod pas na// nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis shes par bya// nyin nag cig la dbyig gu ya~M/ drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni// rtsa dang chu chod byed dbyug gu/ 
303a1(rgyud): thun gyi brgyad cha zhes su bshad// sna sgo'i rlung ni 'byung 'jug la// dbugs gcig tu ni rab tu grags// rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas// dbugs drug srog tu shes par bya// srog ni lnga
303a2(rgyud): bcu tham pa dang // dbugs gsum rkang pa'ang de dang ldan// nyi ma byang du rgyu dus kyi// nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yin// nyi ma lhor ni rgyud dus kyi// mtshan mo'ang ni de bzhin 'gyur// dbyug gu re re'i 'phel 'grib ni// dus
303a3(rgyud): kyi dbyibs shes par bya// dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas// 'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib yin// dbugs kyi sum cha de'i bzhi tsha'o// drug chas nyi ma re rer 'gyur// thun ni phyed phreng rgyu ba las// phyin ci log tu
303a4(rgyud): 'bos 'gyur na// rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas// mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag brtag/ nyi ma gcig gnyis gsum dang / bzhi// lha dang drug tu gang tshe rlung // phyin ci log tu rtag rgyu na// de tshe
303a5(rgyud): rtsod pa chen por 'gyur// zla phyed rtag tu log par rgyu// nad ni chen po/ yang dag 'byung // zla ba gcig tu log par rgyu// snying sdugaganyen ni brlag par 'gyur// phyed dang gnyi su log par rgyu// zla ba
303a6(rgyud): drug na 'chi bar 'gyur// thun mong dus su shes par bya// gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ste// mnyam po bdun du nyi ma seng // gang tshe skye ba'i nyin zla ba/ de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus// 'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin/ 
303a7(rgyud): ne mi ni khyim gang las skyes pa// gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir// der ni nyi ma mnyam bdun so// mnyam po bdun zhes bya bar bshad// nyi ma'i lam nas thams cad du// rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag/ 
303a8(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang // mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya// dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung // bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na// dus de'i skad cig rdzogs pa ni/ 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom
303b1(rgyud): med nyi phyed dang por byas te nyi ma rdzogs dang de bzhin nyin zhag gcig gi bar// de las zhag gnyis zhag gsum dang ni de bzhin zhag bzhi yi bar dag tu// rlung ni gang zhig rtsal brten te g.yas pa min
303b2(rgyud): pa'i nyi ma'i lam nas rgyu// de las sa dang nyi ma phyogs dang bkra shis drug bzhi 'di dag shes par bya// lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lngar nyin zhag 'di dag lnga lngar spel bas bgrod par 'gyur// de las re res spel
303b3(rgyud): pabs bcu ni sum 'gyur ji srid gsum gyis lhog pa'i bar// de las rgyas pa'i dus su gsum mig zla ba'i lo dang drug gsum cu zla'i zla// lhag ma tshes dang phyogs mda' yon tan zung dang zla ba'i zhag tu
303b4(rgyud): 'tshe ba yin// re'u mig sum cu bdun bcas pa'i// 'khor lo rin gsum bris nas ni// tshe dang srog gi rlung dag dang // nyin na/ ngag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// zhag lnga nas ni nyi shu lnga'i// bar bar
303b5(rgyud): gyi ni nyin zhag la// grangs ni bcu drug ma bshad gang // de rnams tshang bar brjod par bya// zhag ni drug bdun brgyad dgu mi / rim pas gal te rlung rgyu na// yon+dan ldan yang nyin zhag ni/ 
303b6(rgyud): nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gsum na'o// drag po nyi ma yan lag sa'i// zhag ni rim pas rgyun ni// yon+dan ldan pa 'ang nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gnyis na'o// zhag ni bcu drug de bzhin du// bcu bdun dang / 
303b7(rgyud): ni bco brgyad dang // bcu dgu yi ni rim pa yis// rlung rgyu yon+tan can yang zhag/ bcu gnyis gnyis 'gyur ma tshang ba'i lo gcig na ni skyabs med gang // de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du// the tshom med par 'gro
303b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur// nyi ma nyi shu gcig gnyis gsum// nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyu na// yon tan ldan pa'abazhag drug ni// mchang zla ba drug na 'chi// re'u mig sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i// rim gnyis 'khor
304a1(rgyud): / lo bris nas ni// der ni tshe yang yan lag rlung // grangs kyi mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// 'chi ba'i rtags ni 'di dag kun// rnam pa thams cad shes byas nas// blo ldan 'chi ba bslu ba yis// gal te
304a2(rgyud): brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod// rtsa ni yang dag sbyang byas pas// de srid rlung ni sbyangs 'gyur te// so so'i rim bzhin rnal 'byor pas// yang dang yang du mnan par bya// g.yon pa'i bu gar bcug nas ni// rba ni bsdams nas
304a3(rgyud): mnan bzhing // de bzhin du ni g.yas par rlung // bkug de dal bus mnan par bya// sems can rnams kyi zhag gcig la// rgyu ba'i dbus kyi grangs kyi tshul// brgya phrag drug gis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa
304a4(rgyud): gcig go// dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid de// chus ni don rnas yang da dag 'byung // me yi rlung ni rnam rgyus pas// bkres snyim dug da nga sdug bsngal nad// bya ba thams cad nyams 'gyur zhes// rdo rje
304a5(rgyud): 'dzin ma mchog gis gsungs/ rlung gis rtsod dang skyo dang rmongs/ nor nyams nyon ni mongs par byed// dbang chen nor dpe 'bru la sogs// rnyed pa thob dang sprad byed pa'o// chu yi rlung ni rnam rgyu
304a6(rgyud): bas/ 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pas// de yi sbyor ba mchog gtso bor// rdo rje sems dpa' gang gsungs pa'o// rlung ni bcom ldan he ru ka'i// rang bzhin nyid de sum du 'gyur// g.yon pa shes rab reng
304a7(rgyud): bzhin te// g.yas pa snying rje'i bdog nyid do// gnyis po mi phyed sbyor bar yang // gnyis ka nas ni rnam par rgyu// de bas de nyid rig pas der// dge mi dge sogs shes par bya// dug sogs gzhom dang lhag
304a8(rgyud): ma ni/ bkra shis dpal ni bskyed pa la// shes rab bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// rab tu dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// g.yul ba sham rol rtsed ston mo dang // bcad pa dang ni dbug pa dang // sreg par ba
304b1(rgyud): ba'i las la ni// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// gzhan yang gnyis bdag rdo rje can// the tshom 'gyur ba shes bya ste// dge dang mi dge nges med par// rlung rig pas ni 'dir mtshon pa// mgon po ji ste
304b2(rgyud): a lir rgyu// 'ga' zhig ka li ra gnas 'dri'am// ka la'i rgyu la a lir gnas// de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur// gang nas mgon po de rgyu ba// der gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na// de yi don kun yang dag
304b3(rgyud): 'grub// gnyis kar gnas las the tshom 'gyur// rlung gi bdag nyid kyis mgon po'i// sku gsum por yang shes par bya// 'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te// gnas pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'byung ba
304b4(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku zhes bshad// 'di dag sku ni gsum por bzhed// 'dri ba po 'am rang gi'ang rung // chos skus thams cad dge ba ste// longs spyod rdzogs pa the tshom 'gyur// sbrul pos 'thab
304b5(rgyud): mer ston pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yi srog rtsol ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor gnas// g.yon dang g.yas kyi gnas gang na// rim pa ji bzhin rnam par rgyu// g.yas nas rnam par rgyu ba'i
304b6(rgyud): 'od/ me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// nas kyi me tog lta bu'i mdog/ de ni 'od dpag med pa'i lha// g.yon nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od// rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// khe dog ljang ku ltar snang ba// lha ni
304b7(rgyud): don yod mchog yin no// gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i 'od// gser gyi 'od ltar snang ba ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung // rtag tu rin chen 'byung ldan rgyu// 'og nas dal bar rab rgyas pas// kun da zla ba lta
304b8(rgyud): bur dkar// chu yis dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ste// 'od chen rdo rje mgon po'o// lus kun la ni rjes 'gre'i rlung // sems kun rab tu 'jug byed pa// mgon po rnam par snang mdzad ni// 'byung bar rab tu grags pa
305a1(rgyud): pa yin// rnal 'byor ma ni mnyam gzhag pas// 'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bar bya// ji srid 'bum la sogs pa'i grangs// skra dang bral bar rtag tu bzla// sgrub po sgra dang bral bar ni// 'bum
305a2(rgyud): bzlas yongasu rdzogs pa na// tshe nyes pa yang lo lnga ru// 'tsho bar 'dir ni the tshom med// rtag tu nang par langs nas rlung // stong phrag gcig tu bgrang ba ste// de bas rlung gi rnal 'byor la// rtag tu mnyam gzhag
305a3(rgyud): gnas par bya// yang na bum pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu 'chi bdag las rgyal ba// bdag nyid rig pas rkang mthil bar// kun tu rlung gi dgang bya ste// bum po can la brtan byas nas// dbye ba gsum gyis
305a4(rgyud): gzhom par bshad// tha ma sum cu rtsa drug tsam// de yi nyis la gyur 'bring de bzhin// sum 'gyur chen por shes bya ste/ bum pra can des rgyal bar bya// bum pa can lngar shes pas nas// bdag
305a5(rgyud): nyid skyil mo krung bcas te// lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni// de nas lan drug se gol brda ba// ji srid sum cu rtsa drug/ bar// de srid bum po can gyis pa// sum 'gyur chen pos gzhom
305a6(rgyud): pa ni// rgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pas so// brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod pas ni// brtsod pas de nyid kyis rgyal bya// bum pa'i sbyor bas rgyal bas na// 'chi bdag las ni ring du 'jug/ bum pa can ni shes byas
305a7(rgyud): nas/ 'gog la brtan par gnas pa na// de la bskal pa stong du yang // 'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur// snying gi chu skyes dbus sen rlung // hUM yig dkar po'i rnam par ni// gang gis mnyam par gzhag bas
305a8(rgyud): na de la yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur/ rlung gis 'khor ba'i steng du 'gro// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu bgrod// snying ka yi na chu skyes la/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das par gnas// steng dang 'og du rgyu ba'i rlus
305b1(rgyud): kha sbyar du ni yid kyis byas// de yi sbyor bas goms byed na/ des ni brtan pa'i go 'bang 'brog/ rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa 'am// gang zhig shes kyang mi byed pa/ de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshogs// du
305b2(rgyud): mas gtses pa'i srin bur 'gyur// gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i drung // blo dang ldan pas rtag bya ste/ rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlab rlung ni kun tu 'gro 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i man ngag gi
305b3(rgyud): rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o// // de nas lam lnga bzang po mchog/ rnam par nges par rab bshad pa// bdag gzhan don ni phun tshogs pa'i// sgrub pos dge dang mi dge brtag/ me dang rlung ni nyid dag dang // de
305b4(rgyud): bzhin dbang chen dang ni chu'i// dkyil 'khor yang dag rgyu ba las// / zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ de bzhin bsad dang bsku dad pa yi// mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya// de yi sbyor ba mi
305b5(rgyud): shes pa// de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur// mes ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ kha ste// rlung gis nor rnams nyams par 'gyur// dbang na gyis ni rgyal srid 'gyur// chus ni nor dang 'bru rnams bsten/ 
305b6(rgyud): g.yas pa na ni rgyu ba'i khams/ bon za'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba ni// pad+ma'i mgon po'i 'byung ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog
305b7(rgyud): ldang zhing gsal ba ni// las kyi mgon po 'byung ba'o// gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog ltar gsal ba ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// rin chen mgon pa'i rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i
305b8(rgyud): khams// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// khams rnams kun ni yang dag bsdus// rten dang rten pa'ang yang dag 'dzin// rnam snang mdzad ni rlung chen te// 'chi
306a1(rgyud): pa'i lus las rnam par rgyu/ rlung gi de nyid mi shes par// las dang las min mi 'grub te// rlu ni thams cad bgrod 'gyur bas// rtog ge ba yis mi shes so// rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas
306a2(rgyud): sngags kyi de nyid bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa// rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed// 'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste// sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob byed pa// rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang ba ste// 
306a3(rgyud): byang chub rgyu yi thabs yin no// 'di ni lam lnga nges par brtan pa'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o// / de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo ni// rim pa bzhin du rab bshad pa// lus kyi rjes
306a4(rgyud): 'gro ba'i rtsa// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gyur// rtsa rnams dang ni nye ba'i rtsa// de dag gnas la bsten pa ste// brgya las nyi shu lhag pa'i rtsa// gtse bo zhes ni bya bar brjod// tsa yi gnas
306a5(rgyud): dang yul rnams ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs yin te// de rnams dbus kyi rtsa gsum gang // thams cad khyab cing brten pa'o// mgor ni pul+li ra yin te// so dang sen mo 'bab par gnas// 
306a6(rgyud): spyi gtsug dzA lan d+ha ra te// sgra dang spu ni 'bab par gnas// ur+ya rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa// lpags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab// mgo rgyab ar bu de yin te/ sha ni yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa// go da bar+ya rna ba g.yon/ 
306a7(rgyud): rgyus pa yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa// sprin dbus ra me shwa ri ste// rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa'o// mig ni de bi ke Tir gnas// mchin pa 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// mA la be ni dpung pa gnyis// snying 'bab pa yi rtsa gnas so// 
306a8(rgyud): mchan khung kA ma ru pa ste// rtag tu mig mi 'bab pa'o// nu ma gnyis ni o tre ste// rtag tu mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa/ tri sha ku ne lte ba ste/ tsar ni glo ba 'bab pas gnas// sna rtse ko sa la yin te// sgyu ma'i
306b1(rgyud): phreng ba 'bab pas gnas// kha ni ka ling ka yin te// rtag tu gnye ma 'bab pas gnas// mgrin pa lam pa ka yin te// rtag tu lto ba 'bab pa'i \u0f7f// kany+tsi snying ka'i gnas yin te// bshang ba 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// 
306b2(rgyud): 'doms par hi ma la ya te// mtshogs ma' mtshams ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// pre tra pu ri mtshan ma ste// bad kan 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// gri ha de ba bshang lam ste// rtag tu gnag ni 'bab pa'o// brla gnyis so rat+na
306b3(rgyud): yin te/ rtag tu khrag ni 'bab pa'o// byin pa gnyis ni gser gling gnas// rdul 'bab pa yi rtsa yin no// rkang pa'i sor mo na ga ra// rtag tu tshol 'bab rtsa zhes bya// rkang pa'i bol ni sin d+ha ste// mchi ma 'bas
306b4(rgyud): pa'i gzugs can ma// ma ru de sha mthe bo ste// rtag tu mchil ma 'bab pas gnas// ku lu ta ni dbus mo ste// rtag tu snu nu 'bab pas gnas// de dag dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa// la la nar ni
306b5(rgyud): sil ha 'bab// g.yasu khrag ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// ras na zhes grag sa pa yin// dbus kyi char ni yang dag 'jug/ snying ka'i rgyu/ skyes dbus son pa/ chu shing snye ma'i me tog bzhin// 'phyang ba
306b6(rgyud): / kha ni thur du bltas// til gyi mar me ltar 'bar zhing // byang chub sems ni mnyam 'bab ste// a ba d+yA tir shes bya ste// lhan cig skyes pa ster byed pa'o// la la na la sogs pa'i rtsa// rtsa rnams kun gyi gtso bo
306b7(rgyud): ste/ de bas 'dir ni gzhan bsten pa// gang ga sin d+har gzhan 'jug bzhin// cig gyur ka ka mu kha ste// de nyid skye gnas gzhan ma yin// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin gyis// lus la brten par shes
306b8(rgyud): par bya// bud med rnams la'ang gtso bo gsum// la le na sogs rtsa rnams yin// shes rab rang shin la la nA// ra sa na ni thabs su gnas// dbus nas a ba d+hU ti ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o// long
307a1(rgyud): spyod rdzogs sku la la nA// ra sa na ni sprul pa'i sku// a pad+ma ti chos sku ste// sku gsum por ni bshad pa yin// rtsa rnams de dag thams cad ni// lus ni dge bar byed pa ste// de yi tshogs las yang
307a2(rgyud): dag byung // gong bu lho yi bdag nyid do// gzugs las 'das pa gong bur 'gyur// gong bu las 'das lha nyid de// de phyir bsam mi khyab sbyor bas// de bzhin nyid bdag kun tu 'gro// sgrub pos cho ga gang gang gis// 
307a3(rgyud): gong bu las 'das go 'phang gnas// des ni de yi bdag nyid du// gyur pas sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'di ni rtsa yi 'khor le'i thabs rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gang zhig shes
307a4(rgyud): tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba yi// dam tshig rnams kyang / da rim pa bzhin// yang dag par ni bshad par bya// rang gi khyim 'am gsang ba'i gnas// dben zhing yid ni dga' ba dang // ri bo
307a5(rgyud): tshang tshing ri sul dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dam// chu bo 'dus pa'i dbus su ni// bla med 'brasas bu 'dod pa yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// yon
307a6(rgyud): bdag dad pa chen po yis// zhing skyes gnas skyes grags skyes ma'i// rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa// slob dpon lha kun spyan drang bya// khyim pa'am ni dge tshul 'am// de bzhin dge slong slob dpon te// slob dpon
307a7(rgyud): kha cig 'jig rten pa// bstan la gnas pa'i dge slong ngam// kha cig yon tan ldan pa 'am// de bzhin mngon shes thob pa'ang rung // 'di rnams nang na yon bdag ni// gang la dad pas gtso mchog bya// slob
307a8(rgyud): dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis// kyi 'kho ge tshus te/ slob dpon dbang bskur ston ldan// 'jig rten rnams kyis ma smad cing // mi dge bcu yongs spangs pa ni// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor bya// rtag tu yon bdag blo
307b1(rgyud): ldan gyis// snying rje med cing khro dang gdug/ khengs dang brkam chags bdag nyid bskyed// mnyam par ma gzhag gis mi bya// gang zhig khyim gnas longs spyod bsten// gshol 'dzugs dang ni tshong pa dang // rmongs
307b2(rgyud): pas dam ches 'tsheng ba ni// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor min// 'di ltar yon tan kun ldan zhing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin// dul zhing brtson 'grus yang dag ldan// sred pa med cing nga rgyal
307b3(rgyud): med/ rtag tu sems can bsten par ni// ltos bcas rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // zod pa'i rgyan la dga' ba dang // rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa'i// mkhas pas g.yon gyi phyogasu ni// g.yon pa'ang rab tu bzhag
307b4(rgyud): par bya// 'di ltar yon tan ldan slob dben// las rnams kun la rabyas bsngags// rim pa ji bzhin slob dpon dang // lha rnams spyan drang byon pa la// ji ltar rnyed pa'i dri chu yis// zhabs bkru bas ni gtsang
307b5(rgyud): byas nas// sa yongs brtag pa'i gnas su ni// slob dpon sngon du/ 'gro ba yis// rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye ba bzhin// zhugs na/ sa gdan la gnas par bya// skal ba med dang nga rgyal can// de
307b6(rgyud): bzhin bla ma smod pa dang // dam tshig ma mthong rang gi bu// de bzhin skyes pa bud med rnams// sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yis// dam tshig der ni gzhug mi bya// gal te phyugs ni de rnams zhugs// dngos grub
307b7(rgyud): ring du 'jug par 'gyur// dam tshig smad pas lus sems ni// sdug bsngal de bzhin gnas nyams dang // dpal las ring zhing sna tshogs pa'i// sdug bsngal gyis ni nyer 'tsher 'gyur// de ltar shes nas
307b8(rgyud): spang bya ste// mchod pa'i spyod yul can rnams bsdu// rgan dang gzhon pa'i rim bzhin du// me tog bdug spos mar me dang // tsan dan dris ni khyad par du// blo dang ldan pas rtag mched bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
308a1(rgyud): gyis rgyan pa'i// gtor ma slob dpon gyis rab brtag/ lha ni bsnyen phyir mchod pa zhing // yon bdag yid la 'dod pa yi// gang zhig ni dang rgyas pa'i las// dngos grub don du bris nas ni/ 
308a2(rgyud): gang gang mngon par 'dod pa yi// las de byin gyis brlab par bya// sbrang chang gur chad khur ba'i tsha // ji ltar snyed pa dbul bar bya// gtsang zhing dul dang dpa' ba'i sems// srid dang gti mug rnam par spangs// 
308a3(rgyud): thams cad mtshungs par lta ba ni// las kyi rdo rjer rab tu brtag/ bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin btung // so rtsi dang ni spros de bzhin// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid du// yon bdag gis ni dbul ba zhing // pi nas
308a4(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje ni// mkhas pas rdzas rnams yongs su spyad// thog/ mar lcags kyus mnyam ldan pa'i// dam tshig yongasu sgyu dra par bya// de nas thams cad yongs rdzogs par// slob dpon gyis
308a5(rgyud): ni byin gyis brlab// gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang ni// 'dus dang / dur khrod gnas pa'o// dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma kun la// bdag gi gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo rnams kyi tshad ma dam
308a6(rgyud): cho ga tshad ma dang // des bshad gsung ni mchog tu tshad mar gyur pa ste// bden par gyur pa des na lha mo rnams kyis 'dir// bdag ni rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur ni gyur par shog/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mdun
308a7(rgyud): du ni/ snying kar thal mo rab sbyar te// yon bdag gis kyang smon lam ni// yongs su bsngo ba nyid du bya// srid dang zhi ba mnyam par chags pa bcom zhing yang dag rtog pa 'joms// khyed kyis dngos po thams
308a8(rgyud): cad mkha' dang mnyam po'i bdag nyid gzigs par ldan// mgon po thugs rje chu yi ljid kyis brlan par gyur pa'i thugs kyi chus// bdag la mchod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin tu rjes brtser
308b1(rgyud): ma drugs pa/ rnas khyo du ro gcigags pa pas drugs rnam par dag pa de/ gnas la sogs pa rdul du brjod pas spyan rnam par dag pa'i/ dpal ldan panas kyi dus kya
308b2(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo mchog ma mgon po ni// bla ma mchog la rtag tu mgo bos btud de gus pas phyag 'tshalo// dpa' bo kun gyi sku ni rtag tu mdzes pa ste/ lha mo rnams kyi rin chen sku yis 'khyud pas
308b3(rgyud): / rgyan 'khor los gnas mgon lhan cig skyes dga' dri med pa'i// rnal 'byor snying po bde mchog la yang rtag phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun mkhyen shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas// lha mo rnams
308b4(rgyud): ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas kyis mdzes// 'dren pa lhan cig/ skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba ste// dri med lhan cig skyes pa ma cho ga bdag la phyag 'tshal// tshigs bshad gsum gyis yang
308b5(rgyud): dag bstod// ji ltar de bar phyag kyang btsal// yid smre ji ltar bde bar ni// ca co'i spro ba chen po yis// me tog phreng rnam sa kyis rgyan cing // sna tshogs me tog gis mchod lus// chang
308b6(rgyud): gi ston me'i dga' bcas pas// rdo rje glus ni dga' bar bya// mchog tu dga' bas gar bya zhing // gnas kyi mtshan pa'i stangs stabs gar// phyag rgya sngags kyis gar bya'o// der ni pa Ta ha sogs dang // cang
308b7(rgyud): te'u dang ni bkra shis rnga// rnga rings la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// rol mo yid 'ong bsgrag par bya/ he ru ka bcas dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma mchogs g.yon pa ste// de rjes tshegs kyi gtso bo yis// yon bdag/ 
308b8(rgyud): gi ni dge ba bsam// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma 'dus pas// skad cig shis pa brjod pa sprin// bde ba phun tshogs ldan pa dang // nad med pa dang dge ba'i sems// 'dod dang grol sogs yang dag 'thob/ 
309a1(rgyud): dngos grub phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor rnam par smos pa ni// cho ga bshad bzhin bsdu bar bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus nas ni/ 'thung po 'tshal ba rnams la sbyin/ gnas/ 
309a2(rgyud): dang zhing gnas rnal 'byor ma'i// tshogs la dri zhing tshim par bya// spyan drangs dpa' bo thams cad ni// bde ba chen por gshegs su gsol// 'di ni dam tshig gi brda'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// 
309a3(rgyud): de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i brda// cung zad tsam ni bshad bya ste// sgrub pos gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig ser mo gcig ston pa// de la gnyis bstan legs 'angs lan/ 
309a4(rgyud): gang zhig g.yon pa'i sor mo sdems// bde 'am zhes pa'i rgyar she ngas pa// gang zhig ming med ston byed pa// de la mthe'u chung bstan par bya// gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa// de la mthe bong bstan
309a5(rgyud): par bya// gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa// de la mgrin pa rab ba ston bya// gang zhig pa ni sa ston po// de la rtse gsum bsta/ na par bya// gang zhig nu ma ston byed po// de la skra mtshams bstan/ 
309a6(rgyud): par bya// gang zhig so na ston byed pa// de la 'khor lo bstan par bya// gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa// de la gtsug bud bstan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa// de la rol pa bstan par bya// bud med
309a7(rgyud): gang zhig g.yon nas 'gro// rnal 'byor ma rtag g.yon nas te// skad cig chen pos rab tu spro// g.yon pa'i lta bas rnam blta zhing // bud med rnams la dgar spro ba// de ni dam tshig ldan shes bya// bud med
309a8(rgyud): rnams la gsol btab na// rigs kyi sa bon rab smra zhing // rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dod la// rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// gang zhig rig pa rnam par 'dri// lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mgor// mgo la 'phrug
309b1(rgyud): par byed pa dang // sgrub pa pos ni khyad par du// de yi rang rigs dran par 'gyur// 'khur ba'am ni kos ko 'am// sna dag tu ni sor mo ston// zur gyi lta bas dus rtag tu// rang gi rig la rnam par lta// bden
309b2(rgyud): 'byung 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma// rnyed dka' nges par dam tshig can/ rang gi khyim du thod pa dang // dgra sta ral gri rgyal mtshan dang // 'khor lo dang ni rnga yab dang / rtse gsum bris nas dga' byed cing // rtag tu
309b3(rgyud): dang chang la dga'// 'jigs dang ngo tsha 'joms byed gang // mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs yang dag 'byung // lhan cig skyes ma zhes byar bshad// yul dang yul du mngon par skye// sgrub po rnams kyis rtag tu bsten// 
309b4(rgyud): gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// de bzhin zhing dong nye ba'i zhing // chan de nye ba'i mtshan do ha// 'dus pa nye ba'i 'dus po dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod ste// 'dzam bu'i gling na yang dag gnas// 
309b5(rgyud): gnas ni pul+li rar grags te// de bzhin dzA lan+d+ha ra'ang gnas// u ran de bzhin gnas yin te// de bzhin ar bu da yang gnas / nye gnas go da bar+ya ste// de bzhin rA me shwa ra'i ming // de bi ko
309b6(rgyud): Tir mngon brjod dang // mA la be yang nye ba'i gnas// zhing ni kA ru'i ming can te// oM tIr mngon par brjod pa'ang zhing // nye zhing tri sha ku ni ste// ko sa la yang nye ba'i zhing // ka ling ka dang lam ka'ang // de bzhin tshan do ha
309b7(rgyud): yin te// kany+dzi hi ma la ya ni// khyad par nye ba'i tsha na do ha'o// 'dus pa pre ta ba si ni// gri ha de ba yang de bzhin// so rA Sh+Ta dang gser gling gang // nye ba'i 'dus pa gnyis yin no// pa ti la pu tra dur khrod de// sin d+hu
309b8(rgyud): 'ang de bzhin dur khrod do// ma ru ku lu ta gnyis ni// nye ba'i dur khrod gnas su bshad// de ltar phyi rol gnas su grags// nang gi gnas nyid lus su brjod// rang lus rtsa yi gzugs la 'dir/ 
310a1(rgyud): gnas kyi ming du rab tu grags// de gzugs lha yi rnam pa ste// des na nang gi bdag tu gnas// de phyir de yi gong bu'i dngos// lus 'di sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o// gnas ni rab
310a2(rgyud): tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing ni 'od byed sa yin te// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// mngon du gyur pa tshan dor shes// nye ba'i mtshan do sbyang dka' ba'o// 'das pa ring du song ba ste// mi g.yo
310a3(rgyud): par grags nye 'dus pa// dur khrod de bzhin legs blo gros// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// gnas sogs sa yi rnam dag pa// rim pa ji bzhin bshad pa yin// gnas dang nye gnas sogs bsten pas// mi
310a4(rgyud): rnams dri ma med par 'gyur// blo ldan rnam rtog med pa ni// rgyu zhing mtshan ma yang dag brtag/ sna tshogs gzugs dang 'jigs gzugs ma// drag cing mi bzad dgod brtags la
310a5(rgyud): rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// hUM gi sgra ni bsgrag par bya// the tshom thams cad rnam spangs nas// sgrub pos seng ge/ bzhin du smad// mthong ngam reg la thos pas kyang // myur du
310a6(rgyud): dngos grub rab 'gro 'gyur// 'di ni brda dang gnas la sogs pa'i brdas// sa rnams nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o// 
310a7(rgyud): de nas gang zhig bris tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i// zhi ba la sogs rab sbyor ba// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// gur gum tsan dan bsres pas gang // yar ngo yi ni tshes la bri// 
310a8(rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs drug bris nas ni// yi ge bdun po'i sngags sbyar zhing // phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor// dbus su ming ni rnam spel ba'o// dar ram ras ni gtsang ma 'am// yang na kham por kha sbyar
310b1(rgyud): la/ gsang ste las ni bris nas kyang // srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya// kha dog dkar pos shar bltas te// me tog dkar pos mchod par bya// mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya gnas
310b2(rgyud): par bltas la// bum pa dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi chus gang bas dbang bskur bar bya'o// the tshom med pas thun gsum du// yi ge bdun pa'i sngags bzlas na// de ma thag tu zhi ba dang // bdo legs
310b3(rgyud): sgyid dang tshe ring 'gyur// rims nad dug dang mche ba la// lag pa g.yon par bsgom bya ste// 'khor lo tsan dan gyis bris la// me tog bdug pas mchod par ba// bsgrub pa shar du kha bstan te// mkhas pa
310b4(rgyud): yis ni sbyar bya ba// gtor mchu dang de bzhin me// de yi dbus su dur ba 'am// rma ba'i sgro'am ku sha'i chus// khyad par du ni de la bab// gsang sngags 'di ni gtso bo mchog/ zhi sogs cho ga rim bzhin
310b5(rgyud): byed/ gur gum dri bzang bsres pa yis// rgyas pa'i 'khor lo phra bya ste// ste hA'i yi ge dang spel bar// kham phor gnyis lo br-i sa nas ni// srad bu ser pos dkri bas la// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang
310b6(rgyud): du gzhug / byang du la bltas thun gsum du// kha dog ser po'i sgom byas lo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la// bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam/ bdud rtsi ser pos dpong bskur zhing // me tig ser
310b7(rgyud): bis mchod par bya// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// rgyas pa'i bsam pas bzla ba ste// che ge mo buSh+TiM ku ru swA ho// bau ShaT sngags kyis spel bar bya// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel ba dang // dpal dang bkra shis
310b8(rgyud): mnyam par 'dzu// las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rgyas par 'gyur te gzhan du min// tsan dan dmar dang sen rtsi dang / ming med kyi ni khrag bsres te/ ras sam gro ga'i mdab ma 'am// kham por sa ni ma btang
311a1(rgyud): yi ge ho dang spel ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// srad bu dmar pos bcings nas ni// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag la// nub kyi
311a2(rgyud): phyogasu kha bltas te// kha dog dmar por sgom byas las// dkyil 'khor dmar po la gnas pa'i// bsgrub pa chags pa rnam par bsam// rtag tu yig bdun 'byung ba ni// rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas pa/ 
311a3(rgyud): ste/ myos par 'gyur bas zhabs drung lhung // de ni grub par rnam par bsam gal te dbang du 'ong bar ma gyur mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bral ba'i 'khrul 'khor seng ldeng gi mdab ma la gdung bar byas na// gang
311a4(rgyud): su la tshwa gas ya sa pa nga mo gyu // gzhan du ma yin no// dur khrod kyi ras sa me// zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la// rmya skyegs kyi khu ba dang ldan pas yi ge dzaHhrI dang spel ba'i 'khrul
311a5(rgyud): 'khor bri ba 'am/ kham por ram/ bud med kyi thod pa la grub pa'i 'khor lo bris la/ sra bu dmar pos dkris te/ me to/ go dmar pos mchod la// bsgrub bya'i snying ka nas lcags kyus
311a6(rgyud): dbyug cing mgrin pa nas zhags pas bcing bar bya'o// gang gis de ltar bsam kyang bsgrub pa nam yang 'ongs par ma gyur na seng ldeng gi shing las me sbar la bsros pas 'khral 'khor tshar bcad par
311a7(rgyud): bya zhing / che ge mo A karA ya hI dzaHzhes bya ba des bsgrub bya skad cig tsam de nyid la dgug par bya ste/ rkang pas dgug pa bla na med pa'o// de nas gzhan yang mnan pa yi// cho ga blo med bshad par bya/ 
311a8(rgyud): mo brgyad brgyad mnyam sbyar bas// re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste// mkhas pas de yi bar gyi no// re ru mig bcu gsum stong par bya// zur dang bur du ri'u mig dgu/ gru bzhi la ni yang dag gnas// grwa bzhi
311b1(rgyud): kun gyi dbus kyi ni// ri ru mig stong pa nyid byas la// dur khrod ras la zhal bzhi pa'i// sngags ni yang dag sbyar te bri// yung ba ldeng ros bsres pa'i chus// 'khor lo gnyis la bsgrub pa'i ming // yi ge lam dang
311b2(rgyud): spel te bri/ ri rab brgyad gnas bris pa'o// kham phor kha sbyar nyid du bya/ ri rab steng du dbang chen gyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su lam gyis ni// mtshan cing sna tshogs rdo rje yis// stong nas mnan par rnam par sgom/ 
311b3(rgyud): srad bu ser pos rnam par dkri/ he ru ka ni phyag gnyis pa'i// rnam par bdag lus yang dag sgom// rnal 'byor pas ni lhor bltas te// kha dog dmar por rnam par sgom// bsgrub bya ri rab dbus gnas shing // ri
311b4(rgyud): rab kyis ni mnan par sgom// de stengs sna tshogs rdo rje yi// yod sa su mnan par rnam par sgom// rang gi gnas su de bas na/ dgra yi kha ni gnon pa dang // dpung rnams kun kyang gnon par byed
311b5(rgyud): dgra yi snying yang gnon pa'o// oM su b+ha ni su b+ha ni huM hUM phaT/ la lhas byin staM b+ha ya/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hu hU phaT/ laM lhos byin staM b+ha ya/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hu hU phaT lam lhas bin sto
311b6(rgyud): / ya/ oM A na ya he bi d+yA rA dza// hUM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin staM b+ha ya// sngar bshad rim bzhin 'khor lo ni// de nyid kyis ni nges par bri// me tog ser pos mchod pa ste// ngag gnon pa yi mchog yin no// rtag tu duro khrod ras
311b7(rgyud): la ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te// yi ge ba ni bsgrub pa yi// ming dang spel bas kha bcings pa// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ga'u kha sbyar byas pa yis// lug gi snying khar bsgrub bya ni rab tu zhugs
311b8(rgyud): pa rnam par bsams// sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzla/ nges par lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang nges par ni// bsad pa'i cho ga ka/  bya// lan tshwa skye tshe tsha ba'i mar// nim po'i lo ma de bzhin
312a1(rgyud): / dug/ dur khrod sol ba d+hA du ra// Shang gi sngog mdzub khrag kyang rung // rdzas 'di dag ni sdug tshar bya// lho phyogs kha bltas sbyor bas ni// khA yi bshog pa'i myu gu yis// bsgrub byed de la
312a2(rgyud): ming bzung ste// yi ge hUM dang rnam spel ba'i// 'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri// bre zhing drag po'i nga ro dang // g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis no// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bskal pa'i me 'dra
312a3(rgyud): zhal rnam 'gyur// sngo zhing mi bzad hUM gi smras// mgur ni gang bar rnam par sgom// gyo mo khrod kyi sar bsam pa 'am// du khrod sol ba yi ni dbus// 'di la sogs pa'i sa phyogs su// bsgrub pa gnas par
312a4(rgyud): mkhas pas bsam// rid cing dri ma dang bcas pa// gos hrul gyon par rnam bsam ste// yan lag kun dang mgo bo dang / snying kha dang ni dpung par yang // sngags kyis phug par bsam par
312a5(rgyud): byaHbsgrub bya'i lus la gnas pa'i lha// rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug/ khyim stong lta bur bltas nas ni// phyag na sna tshogs mtshon cha can// khro bo'i tshogs ni spro byas la// mtshon chas
312a6(rgyud): bsod par rnam bsam ste// dum bu drug tu btugs nas ni// tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang sha/ za dang 'thung bar byed pa dang // de bzhin du ni khrag kyang 'thung // ral gri dbyug tho gtun shing dang // dgra sta 'khor lo tho
312a7(rgyud): ba yis// bsgrub pa la ni rdeg cing 'jug/ dum bu brgyad ni bshog par byed// khwa dang 'gru ba pa rgod dang // lce spyang srin po mkhe 'gro ma// de rnams khros pa'i yid kyis ni// za ba dang ni 'thung bar byed// yi ge
312a8(rgyud): sU Ta dang spel ba'i sngags dang de yis bzlas te/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i// dgra yi tshogs rnams bsad par bya// e maho gang phyir bsad pa'i las// bsad par gyur kyang ma
312b1(rgyud): bsad de/ 'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam// de bzhin nyid du yid kyis rtogs// de nas yi ge phaT spel pa'i// 'khor lo gnyis ni bris byas te/ bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang // sngags kyis sbyar te bri ba
312b2(rgyud): byang rta dang ma he mnyam zhon pa'i// bsgrub bya bltas te yang dag bris// thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste// srad bu sngon pos dkri bar bya// khro ba'i sems kyis nyi phyed dam// mtshan mo de yi khyad par la// rab tu
312b3(rgyud): gtum pa'i bzhi mdo 'am// dur khrod 'dzegs pa'i dbus su ni// gsang nas bsgos te gzhug par bya// sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du mchod// rta dang ma he dag 'thabs pas// de yi maud la 'byed par byed// 
312b4(rgyud): gnyi ga khro zhing khro bas 'jigs// g.yul 'gyed pa yi bdag/ nyid che// phan tshun rtsod pa byed pas ni// rnam par sdang 'gyur/ gzhan du min// yi ge hUM phaT rnam spel ba'i// cho ga 'di nyid kyis
312b5(rgyud): 'dir bri// sngags dang bsgrub bya mnyam ldan pas/ dur khrod ras la bris nas ni// thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste// srad bu nage po sa dkris nas ni// he ru kor ni bsgoms nas su// ro bsregs sa
312b6(rgyud): brkos sba bar bya// mdun du yaM las byung ba'i rlung // gzhu yi dbyibs can dbugs gnas shing // kha dog sngon po rnga mo zhon// lho phyogasu ni bskyod pa dang // khro bo'i tshogs kyis khrid pas na// sa stengs
312b7(rgyud): smon pa bzhin du byed// yi ge hUM phaT sbyor ba yi// sngags ni rgyan mi 'chad pas zlas// gang gi cho ga ci bas pa// de yi mod la skrod par 'gyur// sgrub po lhor bltas khros pa yis// ra khrag dur khrod thal ba/ 
312b8(rgyud): dang // dug dang lan tshwa 'bru mar che// myos byed mdab ma'i khu ba ni// ske tshe mnyam par yang dag sbyar// dur khrod ras la de bzhin du// 'khor lo gnyis po nyid rim bzhin// cho ga rdzogs par bri bar bya// 
313a1(rgyud): bsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas// dbye brta dang ma he la// bskrad pa rnga mo la gnas pa// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// mi mo rnams kyi snying kar dbang // rgyas pa glang chen rgyab tu'o// 
313a2(rgyud): lkugs pa lug gis lus la gnas// mnan pa ri rab dbus te dgug/ sha ra b+ha yi seng ger gnas// 'di ltar las ni brtag par bya// las 'di dag dang bral ba'i las// bsgrubs kyang des ni mi 'grub ste/ 
313a3(rgyud): bla ma'i man ngag med pa'i las// stong pa bzhin du 'bras med 'gyuraro// 'di ni las rab 'byam 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// 
313a4(rgyud): de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa yis// mtshan nyid gsang ba bshad pa/ ra bya// ri bo tshong tshong ri sul dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// bzhi mdo dang ni mdun khang gnas// dur khrod dam ni
313a5(rgyud): yid dga' ba// sngon du dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// phyi nas lha yi/ bdag nyid kyis// sngar bshad tshogs yang dag par/ sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ 'i 'am ri be'o gnas su ni/ 
313a6(rgyud): snying po'i sngags ni bzla bar bya/ oM shrI badz+ra he ru ka huM hUM phaT swA hA// 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni// bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg pa// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos grub// myur du 'grub te gzhan du
313a7(rgyud): min/ tshang tshing ljon shing bshams par ni// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bris nas su// nye ba'i snying po'i sngags rtag tu// rgyun mi 'chad par zla zhing smra ba// oM hrIHha ha hUM hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas
313a8(rgyud): nas ni// bzlas pa'o bcu cha'i sprin bsreg bya// char dbab pa dang gter dang ni// ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par bya// ri sul dri med chur bcas par// dkyil 'khor dge ba bris nas ni// rgyun mi 'chang
313b1(rgyud): bar sngags bzlas te// zhal bzhi pa yi gsang sngags bzlas// oM su b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/ grih+NA ba ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ An ya he bid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT// rnal 'byor pa yis bzhi 'bum bzlas// bcu cha
313b2(rgyud): yi ni sprin bsreg bya// zhi dang rgyas dang bcud kyis len// de bzhin sems can don sgrub pa'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram song nas// dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas ni// lha mo'i sngags ni khyab par du/ 
313b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su// ji skad gsungs bzhin cho ga ni// rdzogs pos bcu cha'i sprin bsreg pa// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa na ye haM hUM phaT swA hA// 'jig rten dngos grub thams cad dang // de bzhin mkha'
313b4(rgyud): spyod dngos grub bo// dur khrod du ni sngar bshad pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa sa dkyil 'khor bri// yi ge bdun pa'i gsang sngags ni// 2bum phrag gsum du bzlas la sgrub// bcu cha'i sbyin sreg byas
313b5(rgyud): nas las// rnam par nges pas bsgrub par bya// dbye ba dang ni bskrad/ pa'i las// khyad par du ni bsad pa'i las// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs bzhin// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub
313b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mnan pa'o cho ga bsgrub par bya// mkha'agro ma yi gsang sngags ni// khri bzlas pas ni 'grub par gyur// oM DA ki ni ye huM hUM phaT// bcu cha'i sbyin
313b7(rgyud): sreg bsgrubs na ni// 'byung po ro langs 'grub par 'gyur// gtsug lag khang ngam mdun khang du// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// lA ma'i sngags ni nges par yang // 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas
313b8(rgyud): nas ni// lho mo bcu char sbyin bsreg pa/ oM lA me hu hUM phaT swA hA// mig sman dang ni rkang mgyogs dang // de bzhin dbang du byed pa ni// 'grub par 'dir ni the tshom med// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su ni// 
314a1(rgyud): / rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri byas la// khat+tA ro hi sogs sngags kyis// cho ga sngon bzhin bsgrub par bya/ oM khat+tA re hi huM hUM phaT swA hA// 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas nas kyang // bcu cha yi ni sbyin
314a2(rgyud): bsreg bya// rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te// gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo rnams sgru ba// gzugs can ma yi gsang sngags ni// nges par 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas nas// lha mo bcu cha'i sprin bsreg pa// 'grub
314a3(rgyud): par 'gyur bar the tshom med// oM rU pi tI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA// me tog dang ni spos dang dri// lha ba shos gtor ma de bzhin te// bza' dang btung bas khyad par du// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mchod pa zhing // glu dang
314a4(rgyud): gar gyi khyad par gyis// phyag rgya sngags ni bsgrags par bya// yid 'ong dam tshig rnyed nas ni// phyogasu bzhag nas bsgrub bya ste// las ni gang gis khyad par gyis// de yi rigs sogs
314a5(rgyud): brtag par bya// lha yi rnam pa la gnas te// cho ga ji bzhin bzla/ sa shing mchod// dus gang chen mi smra zhing // der ni sngon du bsti na ba bya// myos byed gtor mar mnyam ldan pas// sngags kyi
314a6(rgyud): nus pa bsgrub bya ste// brgya dang stong dang 'bum gyi bar// der ni grangs nyid mtshon par bya// grangs med sngags ni bzlas pa yis// bla na med pa'i dge ba 'byung // de dag nges par sbyor ba yis// sgrubs na dngos
314a7(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // yang dag cho ga gang gis 'dir// grub par the tshom med pa yi// bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i
314a8(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// gnod sbyin bdag po legs par nyon// gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // de bzhin shel dang dung la sogs// zhi dang rgyas pa dag la sbyar// zhi la ril bu brgya pa ste/ ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni// 
314b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i las la rab bsngags te// mkhas pas rgyal srid ched dam dpal// bde spro phun sum tshogs phyir bzlas/ dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor la// gur gum la sogs dri'i ril bu// byu ru tsan dan dmar
314b2(rgyud): be'i 'bru// rtag tu ril bu lnga bcu'o// ru ra kA dang lung tang 'bras// de bzhin mi rus rnga mo dang // bong bu ma he'i rus pa ni// drag spyod lkugs dang mnon pa dang // dpe bas dag ni tshar bcad dang // bsad dang bskrad la
314b3(rgyud): sbyar bya ste// las kyi khyad par ji lta bar// bzlas pa'i phreng ba'ang bya ba yin// bong bu rnga me'i spu dang ni// khwa yi sgro ni bsre bas la// mnan dang bskrad pa'i las la ni// de yi srad bus brgyu bar bya// rta dang ma he'i spu yis
314b4(rgyud): no// rnam par sngang la srad bu ba// dur khrod skra yi srad bu dang // khyi ya~M spu ni bsre ba ste// de yi srad bu drag po yi// las la bsngags/ phyir sbyar bar bya// dge ba'i las la gzhon nu mas// bkal ba'i
314b5(rgyud): srad bus brgyu bar bya// zhi bo la ni mdzub la bzhag/ rgyas pa rtag tu gung mo yis/ ming med kyis ni dbang shes gsungs// tha ma yi sa ni mngon spyod yin// mthe bong lha yis rang bzhin gyis// las
314b6(rgyud): kun las ni sbyor bar ba// ril bu dgra bcom mdo 'dzin ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i khyad par gyis// mnyam gzhag sgom zhing bzlas par bya// rdzogs ldan dus su gcig bzlas pa// gsu
314b7(rgyud): ldan dus su gnyis 'gyur bzlas// gnyis ldan dus na sum 'gyur bshad// rtsod dus bzhi 'gyur du ni bzla// sngags kyi grangs ni bzhi po yis// rgyan mi 'chad par gsang sngags bzlas// bzlas pa'i phreng ba
314b8(rgyud): sogs sbas pa// 'di ni ngag gis bzlas pa ste/ lha yi gzugasu dmigs pa yis// spro dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can// sngags kyi de nyid brda' yis ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba yang dag bsam// mtha' gsum las
315a1(rgyud): ni rnam grol ba// don dam de bzhin nyid kyi don// 'di rnams sngags kyi bzlas pa yi// cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin// 'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i bgrang phreng nges par bstan
315a2(rgyud): pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa pa// lha yi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa can// dngos grub yon tan kun gyi gnas// 'dod pa'i
315a3(rgyud): yon tan kun khyab pa'i// sa phyogs mkhas pas yang dag brtag/ khrag 'thung phyag gnyis sbyor ldan pas// phung po lnga sogs nga rgyal ba// zhal bzhi pa yi sngags brjod pas// phyogs ni bcing zhing rab
315a4(rgyud): ste/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hu hUM phaT/ shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ dbang du'o// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ nub tu'o// oM A na ya ho bid+ha rA dzA hu hUM phaT/ lho ru'o// phyogs su se gol
315a5(rgyud): brdabs pa yis// gdug pa bdud ni bskrad par bya// snying ka'i chu skye sau hA yig las// 'od zer phreng ba spro bar bya// de yi snang ba sa mdun du ni// bla ma sangs rgyas sogs bltas la// phyag
315a6(rgyud): btsal me tog bdug sogs pas// mchod de rjes la sdig pa bshags// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing // byang chub sems ni rnam par bskyed// gzhan la phan pa'i sems ni byams pa ste// gzhan
315a7(rgyud): / gyi sdug bsngal 'joms byed snying rje yin// gzhan gyi bde bas tshim pa dga' ba ste// sems can kun snyoms btang snyoms rnam par bsam// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+maHswa b+hA bo shud+d+ho ha~M zhes bya bas/ 
315a8(rgyud): / sems tsam nyid la rnam gnas shing // byang chub tshogs ni sgom par bya/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko hoHrten dang brten pa'i gzugasu ni// b+he re b+ha la sogs pa bsam// yaM las byung ba'i rlung
315b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor// gzhu 'dra kha dog sngon po ste// de yi steng du raM las ni// me ya dkyil 'khor gyi ni gzugs// kha dog dmar po zur gsum pa// rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'o// de yi steng du ba byung ba'i/ 
315b2(rgyud): chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar// de yi steng du'ang la byung ba'i// sa yi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa// kha dog ser po gra bzhir ni// de bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum mtshan// de yi steng du sum byung ba'i// zur bzhi pa ni
315b3(rgyud): ri rab ste// rin chen bzhi yi bdag nyid mdzes// rtse mo brgyad kyis rgyan pa'o// de yi steng du hA byung ba'i// sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par sgom// de yi steng du pad+ma ni// lte ba ge sar ldan par sgom// de dbus a li ka li yi/ 
315b4(rgyud): dag pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su yi ge hUM// rdo rje sem das dpa'i rang bzhin las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus pa/ zhugs pa'i// dpal he ru ka rnam par sgom// dpa' bo zhal
315b5(rgyud): gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas brkyang ba yis gdan la bzhugs/ rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yas pa kun da lta bu ste// g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa'o// ral pa'i cod pan gyis rgyan
315b6(rgyud): pa/ 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ mnan cing bde ba chen por bzhugs// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad mas 'khyud// thugs rje'i chags pas shas cher dgyes// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu ni// mnyam par
315b7(rgyud): ldan pas yang dag 'khyud// gnyis pa'i phyag ni mchog gnyis kyis// glang chen lpags pa gos su 'dzin// g.yas kyi gsum pas cang te'u ni// chos kun ngo bo nyid sgra sgrogs// g.yon gyi phyag ni gsum
315b8(rgyud): pa yis// baT+wAM ga rten thod pa bsnams// thod pa'i phreng bas thod du mdzad// zla ba phyed pas rnam par rgyan// dbul sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan// rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzad// zhal ni rnam 'gyur
316a1(rgyud): cher 'jigs pa// sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' can// mi mgo nyi shu phyed kyis rgyan// lha ni phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // gar gyi nyams ni dgu dang ldan// 
316a2(rgyud): de la 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan ma// zhal cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma// gcer bu ban du ka yi mdog/ dum bus rgyan pa'i sgo rags can// skra grol ba dang rnam par gtsigs// khrag la dgyes shing 'dzag
316a3(rgyud): pa'o// phyag g.yon 'khyud pas bdug pa yi// bdud sogs khrag can thod pa 'dzin// g.yas pa sdig mdzub rdo rje can// bskal pa'i me 'dra'i sku chen ma// byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing // rtag tu bde ba
316a4(rgyud): cher dgyes pa'o// mkha 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro haM gzu gas can ma// dngos grub kun gyi bde 'byung ba// pad+ma'i phyogs cad kyi gnas su dgod// gnag dang ljang dang dmar ba dang // ser skya'i
316a5(rgyud): mdog can spyan gsum ma// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste// kha TA thod pa'i phyag ldan ma// g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug ste// gcer bu g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs// skra grol mche/ 
316a6(rgyud): ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par rgyan// mtshams kyi mdab ma bzhi la ni// byang chub sems las sogs pa'i snod// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa dang // glu dang gar gyi dga' bdes mchod// sgo
316a7(rgyud): bzhir lha tshogs gnas pa ste// rtag tu lha rnams bsgom par bya// shar gyi sgor ni kha gdong ma// phyag gnyis sngon mor bsgom par bya// byang gi sgor ni 'ug gdeng ma// ljang ku skra ni grol ba'o// de bzhin
316a8(rgyud): khyi gdong ma ni dmar// nub kyi sgor ni yang dag gnas// phag gdong ma ni ser mo ste// lho sgor yi dgas gdan la gnas// me dang de bzhin badren bral dang // rlung lha dbang ldan mtshams su ni// gshin rje
316b1(rgyud): brtan ma po nya mo// gshin rje mche ba 'joms ma ste/ de bzhin zur gnas lha mo ni// yid 'phrog gzugs ni gnyis ma ste// yi dgas la gnas drag me tshe// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam rgyan pa'o// g.yo
316b2(rgyud): nathod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje gri gug ste// rnal 'byor ma ni de rnams kun// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o// de nas go cha gnyis shes nas// ye shes 'khor lo rnam par sgrom// sngags dang phyag
316b3(rgyud): / phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// dam tshig 'khor lor mnyam par gzhug/ de nas cho ga gnyis bshad par bya ste// oM ha snying khar ro// na maHhi mgo bo la'o// swAhA hUM spyi gtsug tu'o// bau Sha Ta he phrag pa gnyis
316b4(rgyud): la'o// hUM hU hi mig gnyis la'o// phaT ha yan lag thams cad la ste// mtshon cha'o// dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gsum pa pad+ma gar
316b5(rgyud): dbang ste// dpal he ru ka bzhi par grags// lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma yi/ na// drug pa de bzhin rta mchog ste// go cha drug po rnams kyis gsungs// oM ba ni rdo rje rnam snang mdzad ma'o// oM ha yo ni gshin/ 
316b6(rgyud): rje ma'o// oM hri mo ni rmongs byed ma'o// oM hUM hI ni bskyod byed ma'o// oM hA hA ni skrag byed ma'o// phaT phaT ni gtum mo lus thams cad la mtshon cha ste// lte ba dang / snying ka dang de bzhin du kha dang mgo bo
316b7(rgyud): dang // spyi gtsug la de bzhin du ni mtshon cha yin no// oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho haM/ lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa snying kar bzhag ste/ pad+ma'i rgyas pa'i gar bya'o// snying po'i phyag rgya la sogs
316b8(rgyud): lha bskor ba mkha 'gro dra ba'i sdom// rnal 'byor 'di ni gtso bo mchog/ lha yi rnal 'byer rnam par sgom/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ 'di chen 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i cha rnams ni/ 
317a1(rgyud): lus kun dag par byed pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// lus ni sdud cing 'dzin pa yin// lus 'di dpa' ba'i rang bzhin te// 'di de sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o// gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal
317a2(rgyud): 'byor gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang bstan// rjes 'thun rnal 'byor sems kyis no// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni dpal he ru ka'i bskyed pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// 
317a3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// mchod pa yang dag rab bshad bya// gnas sogs bgrod par mi nus na// pi yi rnal 'byor ma mchod pa// rang gi khyim du rnal 'byor ma// mchod de sngon du bsnyen sogs bya// sngon du
317a4(rgyud): bsnyen pa med pa las// de yis don med yongs su ngal// mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu 'am// yar ngo yang ni de bzhin to// khrus dang gtsang sbra sogs ldan pas// dad pa'i sems kyis spyan drangs te// rang gi khyim
317a5(rgyud): du shar bltas par// yang dag gnas pas lha mo mchod// gur gum/ mig sman de bzhin du/ li khri yis ni mgo la byug/ lag pa rkang pa gdong de bzhin// byug pas byug cing mchod par bya// mgo la
317a6(rgyud): me tog phreng ba dpyangs// dri zhim pa yi bdug pas bdug/ gcig dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// khyad par du ni bdun dang dgu/ ji srid nyi shu bzhi yi bar// yon bdag nges par dad pa yis// bza' dang myos byed
317a7(rgyud): btung ba dang // nya dang sha la sogs ldan pas// phyag brgya byin gyis brlabs nas mchod// dpa' bos brda yis bstan par bya// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa'i tsho gas// lha yi bdag nyid rtag tu mchod// gtor ma'i
317a8(rgyud): bya ba sngon 'gro bas// mar me lnga dang bza' ba dbul// glu dang bstod par rab ldan pas// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod// 'dir ni brtson pas rdo rje lha mo rnams// myes byed sha yis rab tu mchod byas te// dpal ldan
317b1(rgyud): rdo rje theg par mos gyur do'i// dad pas ston mos de rnams mchod byas na// thugs ni mnyes pas mchog ni stsol 'gyur te// gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag na gnas// rnal 'byor ma ni mchod nas// 
317b2(rgyud): zhi rgyas mtshan ma brtag pa ste// gzhon nu ma mchod skad cig la// dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras brtag/ gang zhig lag gnyis nyed pa na// yid ni mnyes par ma gyur nas// des na nad rnams 'phel/ 
317b3(rgyud): ba dang // sdug bsngal thob pa nyid du 'gyur// mchod byas de yi skad cig la// gang me'i sgra ni phyung gyur na// nad med pa ni mi 'grub cing // 'chi ba nyid du the tshom med// mchod pa'i mdo la 'du byed cing // mig
317b4(rgyud): gnyis nyed par byed na ni// skad cig la ni 'chi zhes brjod// bsgrub bos rtag tu mchod byas pas// so so sor zung rer ni// phan tshun ga/ dong ni phyogs gyur na// thams cad du ni rtsod 'gyur bar// gnyen/ 
317b5(rgyud): nu mas ni rtag tu ston// rnal 'byor ma ni rgyab phyogs blta// sa ma sa sen mo 'tsho' byed na/ sha yi bza' bas mchi ma ste/ slar yong las ni dgos par 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba thad
317b6(rgyud): kyi// ston mos mnyes par ma gyur na// mchod la sogs pa blo bur ba'i// nad ni 'phral du skye bar 'gyur// 'di ltar glu dang rol mo byed// yang dang yang du rgod pa na// rgyal po chom rkun 'jigs pa dag/ gzhon nu/ 
317b7(rgyud): de ston mkhas pas brtag/ myos byed 'thungs nas yang dang yang // rnam pa du mas gar byed na// de rnams la ni nad chen 'byung // mchod pa'i dus su brtag par bya// ston mo'i bza' ba thams cad ni// 
317b8(rgyud): dor nas phyogs su blta byed na// spyod pa nyams par byas pa'i skyon// lha rnams bdag la 'khrugs pa'o// phan tshun gtam la 'jug pa dang // gal te phan tshun rgod byed na// gtso bo'i cho ga nyams
318a1(rgyud): bar mi/ gzhon du de bstan shes par bya/ khros ma thag tu sdug byed ma/ smra ba'i nad ni 'byung bar ston// mdzes ma gal te 'gro ba'i ma// rgyab kyi phyogs su blta byed na/ slar yang las na/ 
318a2(rgyud): / dgos pa dang // yun ring zhig nas nad 'byung ston// sa la rkang pas nyed pa ni// gnos ni 'pho ba'i don du 'gyur// mchod dus babs par gyur na ni// phan tshun g.yul ni 'gyed par ston// rnam 'gyur 'di dag
318a3(rgyud): braphral bas ni// mchod pa 'grub par mtshon par bya// de bas brtson pas mchod nas ni// sgrub pos rtag tu brtag par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ste// 'di ni rdo rje
318a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma mchod pa'i cho ga nges par bstan pa'i rim par daphye ba ste bcu ban pa'o// // de nas de phyir snod kyi/ ni// mtshan nyid mchog ni yang dag bshad// 'jim pa 'am
318a5(rgyud): de bzhin rus sbal snod// khar ba 'am zangs sam lkugs las byis// gser ram dngul las byas pa 'am// dung ngom de bzhin nya phyis te// bal po se'u yi 'bras bu mchog/ de bzhin
318a6(rgyud): gzhan yang gsar byung ba// rwa las byung dang shing snod sogs// gzhan yang rdo snod khyad par ro// dum bu gcig dang dumi bu gnyis// de bzhin gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dum bu drug dang dum bu bdun// dum
318a7(rgyud): bu brgyad par rab tu grags// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs// dmangs rigs bud med rigs mthar skyes// dkar dang dmar dang ljang skya dang // ser dang de bzhin ser skya ste// thal ba'i mdog dang mdog
318a8(rgyud): ngan dang // sna tshogs mdog tu rab tu grags// lhag pa dman dang tha ma ste// de bzhin dbyibs ni sna tshogs dbye// gsheng gnyis glang po'i rgyab lta bu// de bzhin rdo rje 'amo khA yi rkang // so ni ljang dang ser
318b1(rgyud): pa'am/ lto ba'am srin bus zos te bzhin// 'di kun rnam par bltas nas ni// de la yongs su brtag par bya// sa gzhi mnyam pa'i yul rnams sa// thang ngam bye ma'i gshongs dag tu// sngags pas der ni
318b2(rgyud): sgrub byas la// de yi ltung ba brtag par bya// lhor bltas bram ze 'jigs par 'gyur// bden bral lhung bas ba lang dang // rigs med pa dang rigs ngan 'jig/ rlung bltas sngags ni 'jigs pa ste// byang du
318b3(rgyud): bilngas na phyug por 'gyur// dbang ldan sngags kyi dngos grub ste// brtul zhugs rgyun ni nyam par byed// mer bltas nye bar 'phrog pa ste/ de bzhin 'og bltas chom rkun ma'o// steng gnas gnas pas
